1b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra maN+Da a laM ka rA nA ma mu/ 
1b2(rgyud): hwA tAnA t+yA d+hA drA/ bod skad du/ dpa ma rdo rje snyi m+b+hi rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyun kyi
1b3(rgyud): rgyal po che ni pI/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyings kyi zhabs kyi pad ma la smi
1b4(rgyud): pos gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
1b5(rgyud): na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dang
2a1(rgyud): nor bu dang / rin po che dang / pad ma dang / las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam
2a2(rgyud): bsna tshogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i nAd pa na khams gsum pa'i chos
2a3(rgyud): kye rgyal por dbang bskur bar brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dab
2a4(rgyud): ga chen po de bzhin gi shegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
2a5(rgyud): thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud cing las sna tshogs mdzad pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams
2a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i las mdzad pa/ thugs rdza
2b1(rgyud): ga 'dug gsum du gnas du sung drug sung dang thugs rdo bzhin gshegs ga blan nag shegs ma na gyis pastan cing bsngags pa nar bu pa can nga
2b2(rgyud): ldan pa/ khadag rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dul bu btags pa/ rlung gris bstod pa'i dar gyi bden dang / me tog ga mun po dang / dri ba dang drab byed pas klubs shing nye bar mdzes pa
2b3(rgyud): nges kyi dbyings thams ca de legs par yongs su dag pa/ rjes kyi dbyings kyi khang bzangs 'di mtha' byas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtsug ladra// khang me tog gi ra/ 
2b4(rgyud): shid mchog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho rab tu bkram pa'i sprin nam mkha'i khams yongs su khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas
2b5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa/ mtha' lngas 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'thung po'i dbus/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po 'od gsal ba'i gzhal mod khang / de bzhin gshegs pa
2b6(rgyud): gnas/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyun/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dang gsung dang thugs ni rje/ de bzhin gshegs pam+b+hi labyung mi 'gog 'gog par 'gyur ba'i yan
2b7(rgyud): lakla ge spyong yul yang dag pa'i mtha' gsolnga pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yulo/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang pa
2b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying pos chen po'i pad ma la bzhugs so// de la sangs rgyas kyi ning
3a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskur zhing mdun du/ 
3a2(rgyud): ba dang te chos ston par mdzad do// tsog sIr dge ba bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po che ge 'bri bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su ba
3a3(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par dag pa'i sgo ston par mdzad do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gnyis su med/ 
3a4(rgyud): pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma/ rnam par rgyal ba'i dmachis 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po// chos thams cad
3a5(rgyud): ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/ las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thob pa sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nam mkha' lta ru/ 
3a6(rgyud): chen po rdo rje'i sku/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sku/ rin po che chos kyi sku/ sprul pa'i sku/ las mnyam pa nyi N+DoswA/ byang chub kyi sems de na yod pa/ yongs su bsdus pa/ dge
3a7(rgyud): phel ba rgyal ba chen po snang ba tog/ bzhad po pa chos dang ldan pa shes rab 'khor mo// skad thams cad pa/ sna tshogs pa can/ bsrung ba po// gnod sbyin can mtshams sbyor ba/ 
3a8(rgyud): gtsug tar du gyur pa mchog ldan rdo can 'khor lo can ye shes can khyab bdag chen po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du le gos par bzhugs po
3b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'du bar byed pa/ rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang ma / 
3b2(rgyud): pa'i rje 'byin rlabs kyi ye shes skyed po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kye blan med pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba chen pos
3b3(rgyud): cad du spros pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par byang chub par gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pa de yis chos thams
3b4(rgyud): cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa po// gzugs thams cad yongs su mthong ba'i ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i
3b5(rgyud): slo ba mchog dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham ca ngon yod pa'i bka' lung mdzad pas sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid bla na med pa'i las sna tshogs pa can/ rnam
3b6(rgyud): mi 'gyur mi bskyod pa// rin chen tog te 'od byed pa// 'od dpag med pa rgyal ba'i mgon// don yod pa ni las kur byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me long lta bu'i
3b7(rgyud): ye shes kyi dkyil lo khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la rab tu gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes pa
3b8(rgyud): su med pa brnas pa bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yang dag par rjes su zab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa Na
4a1(rgyud): thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su med cing mnyam pa nyid dmigs pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa ma'ang / 
4a2(rgyud): na pa/ stongs nyid bzhin da nga/ dku dang/ na pa meng pa dang / smon pa me byu /  gnas padzin po dag gas sangs
4a3(rgyud): dugyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid la dmigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug cher pa nyid la byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs dang ma
4a4(rgyud): rnams su kun tu gnas so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nar gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs
4a5(rgyud): thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i
4a6(rgyud): zhal ras kyis de bzhin gshegs pacoms cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drang ba'i don du rdo rjes gol brdabs tad bzhin gshegs pa thams cod bsdu ba'i snying po chen po 'di
4a7(rgyud): ched du brjod pa/ bud d+ha sa mA dzaHAHhAHoM hUM badz+ra sa mA dzaHde das de skad ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
4a8(rgyud): gi gzhi'i skyeng po'i rkyen bkod pa'i rgyud rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sman yang dag par mthong ngo // de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
4b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis lhan cig yang dag par sbyang nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi rdo rje blo'o ye shes yongs su bskyed de gnas thams cad du rnam par gnA
4b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd
4b3(rgyud): skye brlabs te de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'khor mas bsgyur ba can
4b4(rgyud): 'i stong po bdag la med pa dngas shad pa gyu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyis byin gyis rlugs sheg/ b+h+rUM/ den sa ma baspyod de bzhin gshegs padu can 'byu
4b5(rgyud): gnas de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med// don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa
4b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi thugs dpal gyi be'u la rab tu zhugs so// zhugs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor lo la bde 'a thams cad yang dag par smon no// de nas bcom ldan
4b7(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhir gyur te/ zhal bzhi po rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams mtha' med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi tshul dbyangs kyis
4b8(rgyud): ched du rjod pa 'di lta ste/ rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa don 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lte ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di la
5a1(rgyud): ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas so// sred pa rnam par dag
5a2(rgyud): pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// zhe
5a3(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa don 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' gan
5a4(rgyud): nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// mi khom pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub
5a5(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas so// yid sem pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gong yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa
5a6(rgyud): 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lus rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ngag rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin
5a7(rgyud): 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// yid rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas
5a8(rgyud): gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di sa ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dri rnam par dag pa'i kun
5b1(rgyud): ba na de ni 'drisaste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ro rnam par dag pa gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltas byang chub sems dpa'i gnas sa// dag rnam par dag pa'i gnas
5b2(rgyud): gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas sa// dngos po thams cad rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin po de na 'ad lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas sa/ 
5b3(rgyud): na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa 'o// bcom
5b4(rgyud): na 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas gsang sngags thams cad kyi dbang phyug gsang sngags thams cad kyi 'den pa po// sngags thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa/ thams cad ga
5b5(rgyud): dra 'khor los bsgyur ba/ bstan pa la rdzob med pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ b+h+rUM 'jam dpal gang la las chos thams cad bsdus pa shes rab
5b6(rgyud): phyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig tsam yang zos na de'i byang chub kyi snying pa la thug pa'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad dang chod pa dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang las kyi
5b7(rgyud): chen po nye bar bsags kyang nam yang dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan song rnams su ltung bar ma 'gyur ro// sdig pa rnams byas pa tsam na yang sdug bsngal med cing 'ad par 'gyur ro// 
5b8(rgyud): dgis 'di 'chang ba dang / nyi ma re re 'dun pa dang / klog pa dang rgyun ma chad par tshul bzhin yid ma pyod pa de ni skye ba 'di nga chos med panyam pa nyid/ rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob nas
6a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// chos thams cad la dga' zhing mgul rab tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen pa skye ba bcu drug na// 
6a2(rgyud): dazhin gshegs pa nyid dam de rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po rnam par snang yang dkyis sgrar yang shes rab kyi pha sa tu phyin pa'i
6a3(rgyud): ba pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ston par mdzad do// rdo rje bstan pa nyid kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs lnga
6a4(rgyud): byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / don gcig pa nyid kyis don mnyam po nyid mngon par byang chub pe'i byang chu'i chen po dang / rang bzhin rnam par dag pas chos mnyam pa nyid mngon par bya
6a5(rgyud): tab pa'i byang chub chen po dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis la so thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po ste/ 'jam dpal gang la los
6a6(rgyud): chos kyi gnas bzhi po 'di nyan par byed pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'don pa dang / sdom par byed na ji sred byang chub snyingad pa la gnas kyi bar du sdig po thams cad la kun tu spyod pa thams cad kyang
6a7(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad las 'das par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub par 'gyur ro// AM de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams
6a8(rgyud): cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal bas bsdus pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa bka' stsal/ 
6b1(rgyud): / 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags smras pa med pa'o// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'i phyir zhe sdang smos pa med pa'o// gta mug gi smos pa med pa'i phyir gti mug smras pa med/ 
6b2(rgyud): chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa phyi she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smos pa med par rig par bya'o// 
6b3(rgyud): rngam dpal gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang 'dzin cing 'don la klog par byed na de 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar gzung nas khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can
6b4(rgyud): rnams bsad par gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par 'gyur ro// hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag
6b5(rgyud): chos nyid brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs bslar yang chos thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka
6b6(rgyud): stsal pa/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na yul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro// zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ji
6b7(rgyud): dan sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na chos thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro// 
6b8(rgyud): mas cadas khyen pa'i ye shes rnam pa dani phyir satanan thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam por dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi sa ral tu phyin mi rnam par
7a1(rgyud): dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gang sa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
7a2(rgyud): named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro// hrIHde nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag ba
7a3(rgyud): pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i 'byung gnas ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ dbang bskur byin pas kham
7a4(rgyud): gsum po thams cad kyi rgyal srid yongs su thob par 'gyur ro// don gyi sbyin pas thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi sbyin pas chos thams cad mnyam
7a5(rgyud): nyi thob par 'gyur ro// rang ming gi sbyin pas thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid bde ba thob par 'gyur ro// hU~M de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
7a6(rgyud): kyiphyag rgya brnyes pa thams cad kyi khu cher 'chang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes
7a7(rgyud): bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su bzungs pas de'i nan gshegs pa thams cad nyid du
7b1(rgyud): ba dang / gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su gzung bas chos thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su gzung bas ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang
7b2(rgyud): rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung bas sgra dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje mtshig tu 'grub pa'i don du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa
7b3(rgyud): da 'dzin cing 'odon la 'chad cing sgrim par byed na de dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / las thams cad sku dang gsung dang thug
7b4(rgyud): rje sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub thams cad so sor thob par 'gyur zhing myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro/ 
7b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang rdo rje'i yi ge'i 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
7b6(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nye bar bzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan mas dben pa dang / 
7b7(rgyud): las nye bar grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos thams
7b8(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i nang du gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang 'khor lo chen por 'jug pa ces bya ba'i shes ras kyis ris tu
8a1(rgyud): pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor long 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / don mnyam pa nyid la
8a2(rgyud): zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas dam pa'i rje kyai 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / 
8a3(rgyud): las mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas 'khor lo thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ro// hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mched pa'i chog rgyas po'i snod
8a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas
8a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas
8a6(rgyud): padang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bri ba dang / 'brer 'jug pa dang / 
8a7(rgyud): na pa dang / 'don pa dang / rjod pa dang / sgom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i las kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// i de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug
8a8(rgyud): sa cad 'dul ba'i rus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ 
8b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad chos nyid nyid pas khro ba chos nyid
8b2(rgyud): nyid dang / sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pa la khro ba rdo rje nyid de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste/ ha de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mnyam
8b3(rgyud): di lar rab tu gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ thams cad pa haM
8b4(rgyud): nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid dang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi
8b5(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i las nyid du rig par bya'o// hAHde nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
8b6(rgyud): cad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang ba
8b7(rgyud): dag nyid thams cad pas sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang rin po che thams cad
8b8(rgyud): ne po che'i snying po dang / ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying po dang / las thams cad byed pa'i sbyor
9a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad las kyi sbyi ma/ hrIHdanas bcom ldan 'das pan las 'das shi med pa'i mabar byed pa 'di bzhin gshegs pas sbyar ba
9a2(rgyud): byen pa cos dang / smrad ga pa dang yongs sum pa basbyin gyis brgyas pa 'did du kyisams ca mnyam pa sa sas mi tsug pas sbyi gyis
9a3(rgyud): pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtho' med pa dang / 
9a4(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mu med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad gcig pa nyid
9a5(rgyud): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma thar thug pa'i phyir chos thams cad yongs su mthar thug par 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
9a6(rgyud): rnal 'di nyan par byed 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na dan dag cing mthar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa mthar phyin pa la gnas pa nyid kyis sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par
9a7(rgyud): grol bas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ro// b+h+yoHde nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang yang dad bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin ga
9a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi lasang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa/ chos thams car spros pa med pas slar yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje chos mnyam pa nyid
9b1(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus pas grol ba'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po mchog tu grub pas bde ba
9b2(rgyud): mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ching po rnams kyi bde ba chen po mchog tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur
9b3(rgyud): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog tu grub pas bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang
9b4(rgyud): bya chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub pas khams gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sem
9b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas ma mas shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i sems can tham
9b6(rgyud): cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ro// sa rgyu ci'i byor zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa/ 
9b7(rgyud): ngasrid ma nyam med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// ye shes byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub// las ni thams cad rnam dag pas
9b8(rgyud): //  ga rdzus skye/  skye na du//  la sas kyang/ 
10a1(rgyud): mtshogs dmang ba// na kyi na rgya lags gyur// lagachags thun gyi srid padra// rtag tu 'grab na gam ma 'gyur// 'dod chags chen ba nam dgag// / 
10a2(rgyud): na ga/ mas gsum sa rgyag po nas su// dadage nan btan par spyod// lang ma dpal gang sa las shes rab kyi ram tu sbyin tshum byina'i chos kyirnam
10a3(rgyud): gras 'di nyin de bzhin du nang par yangs te/ gong 'don pa dang nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang / brjod par byed na/ des 'de ba dang / lan bde ba thams cad tho' por 'gyur zhing bde 'a chen po
10a4(rgyud): na mod pa'i dam tshig gi dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa skye ba 'di nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// hUM/ denas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 
10a5(rgyud): oM tsin+ta maN+Da i A ni rad+d+hi a dzA ti'i badz+re/ oM drA taM pA re war te/ oM mahA rAk+Sha d+hAn+na ta/ oM hrI d+yA ka btse/ oM sar+b+ba ga mon/ oM badz+ra dr-i D+haM ka pa tsi ti hUM phaT/ oM s+yAn+na tathA ga
10a6(rgyud): oM sa b+hA baM shud d+he/ oM brAd+d+ha pA ra mi tAdz+nyAnA b+ti shud d+hi/ oM karma tha shrod+hanad+d+he/ oM na sr-i thA badz+ri NA~M trA~M phaT/ oM kArma ga/ oM bad+yA hU~M badz+ra/ oM hUM sar+b+bA grA ma Ni oMSh+T+r-i.oM Ak+ka
10a7(rgyud): dmu kha~M i pradz+nyA pA ra mi ho ma ar+m+ma d+h+we/ oM oM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kA ya a gre/ thag badz+ra/ oM sim+ba ta nA ga ti tsi t+ta badz+ra aHoM s+phoT ya sar+b+ba e ShA
10b1(rgyud): san+na sa ma ya badz+ra hUM phaT// sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// de brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po 'am de
10b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 'ja po dpa la 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bstan pa'i sems can rnams kyi rnalam du grag par mi 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsab ma skrun pa'i sems can gyis
10b3(rgyud): ba dang bklag pa dang rjod pa dang rim gror bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang / rjod par bya ba dang mchod par bya bar yang nus pa ma yin no// gzhan du na gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
10b4(rgyud): rdul gyi gA'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di than yo ga gcig tsa mo yang thos nas sems can de sangs rgyaso mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par bya na slar yang mtha' dag mo lus pa
10b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal sems can gang la la gang gA'i klung gi bye ma brgyad cu snyed kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la phyag byas bla mor byas rjod par byas mchod par byas
10b6(rgyud): nades shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par nus so// gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa'i phyogs ngo mchod rten du gyur par 'gyur te gang bgod
10b7(rgyud): yang phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yad la gzung ba 'am/ glegs bam du bris par gyur na de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng mang bar skye ba dran par 'gyur
10b8(rgyud): ro// dmo bdud sdig ti can gyis bar du mi gcod de// rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / gzhan yang lha rnams kyis phyi bzhin rjes su 'brangs te/ de srung ba dang skyob pa dang / sgra
11a1(rgyud): pa byed par 'gyur zhing tshul ma yin pas dus byed par mi 'gyur la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// 
11a2(rgyud): nasangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang yid la 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro// 'angs dpal 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'od ni shes rab
11a3(rgyud): pha rol du phyin pa'i rgyal gyi sla'i chos kyi rnam grangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje'i snying po thams cad kyi rkyen theg pa chen po
11a4(rgyud): don par rtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dam pa chen po 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bzhis yongs su
11a5(rgyud): sku ba de/ nga po/ ni ces bya ba'i snying po 'di byung // mtshan na gcig pa phyi cho sa thams cad gdod namam smras s+ho'o// ma mkha'adang mnyam pa'ing chos mas
11a6(rgyud): cad stong pa nyid do// smras pa coms cad spangs sa rnams cad gdod mnos yongs su dgana'/ mas cad brisams gsal ba mtshan nyid kyi ra sa
11a7(rgyud): mas ca rjes kyi dbyings yangs su kyis pa'o//  dzi nag sheshes pams sbyid ky-i ma tshig 'di brjod pa nas kyis chos g+sa
11a8(rgyud): klas pa sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad de snyed nyid du shin tu gsila'i rgya chen pos snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis smra
11b1(rgyud): pang bsdu bas byon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
11b2(rgyud): bka' stsol pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdorje snying po rgyun zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya yis nyon cig de legs pa de nyin la rab tu
11b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 
11b4(rgyud): shegs pa thams cad kyi shos rab ye shes la zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying pa chen po la byin gyis pirlabs par byos shig/ de nas pang 'ang/ 
11b5(rgyud): bal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig zlos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gar zhugs te/ byin
11b6(rgyud): sa brlabs ni med las 'thon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar rnam par gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
11b7(rgyud): tshig 'byung gnas/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyan byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge'o/ dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos kyis dbyings kyi rdo rje chen po snying po'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa
11b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bkod pa chen po bka' stsal pa// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje snying po gsang chen po// 
12a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun ldan dge/ rdo rje snying po dang mtshungs pa// khams rnams thams cad rnam par sprul// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsi dang / 
12a2(rgyud): gzhan yang bcud len dang mtshungs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin grong // gru zhi pa la ske ban pa// rta babs bzhi ni rnam par mdzes
12a3(rgyud): theg bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog chun pos spras// grwa yi cha rnams thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// rdo rje'i
12a4(rgyud): rnams kyis spras pa'o// phyi rol dkyil 'khor zhig gang 'a bya// de yi'ang phyi rol du bya ba// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi yi ni 'od// khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du// sngags pas kun nas yo
12a5(rgyud): bskor bya// de ltar rnam bzhi'i rnam pa dang // ji sred grong ni rnam pa bdun// sbyor ba bdun dang yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// sgra dang sgo khyud rin chen na// 
12a6(rgyud): dag mchi ba lags par gnas// de yi grong gi nang du ni// rab zhugs 'khor lo 'dra ba ru// rdo rje thig gis yongs su bskor// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje ka mdun
12a7(rgyud): gnas rnams su// dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa'o// de ltar 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis// nang gi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa// tshad mdzes pa yi snying po che// rdo rje 'khor lo sa
12a8(rgyud): / rnam par brgyan// grubazhi pa dang zlum po nyid// grug sum rnam par yang dag byung // bu byed rnam pa dang mtshungs pa// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi slar yang // slob dpon rdo rdzogang dag/ 
12b1(rgyud): 'byung // shes rab chen pos rab brtag bya// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// pad ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// pad ma rA ga'i 'od mtshungs pa// sangs chas gzugs brnyan gnag pa
12b2(rgyud): / la da// sa kyisna thams ca bsdus /  / na gyis ga byug/  nig pa ga shin pazhinan/ 
12b3(rgyud): pal A~M na pa rgyas nyid// de bzhin gtsug tar sde phan// sangs rgyas slob pa thams cadas/ yongs su bcwo nas snam thul// dkyil 'byor k+sha ni khye ste/ 
12b4(rgyud): gyis song na ni// dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhi pa ru// mi bskyed la sogs rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bri// mi bskyed pa yi dkyis 'khor no/ 
12b5(rgyud): mas dun 'amags rgyas pa// kun mi chags mi shA b+hu kA nams// dzardzasra ben skyabs 'o// shes ra gyi chen pos dag par bya// ni chen byung gnas
12b6(rgyud): / rdo rjen chen phyogs kyis dka// rdorje rjems gas gis ngas// dkyil la medapag med pa'o// rdo rdza las lamams ldan pa// den pa sgrib pa 'ad
12b7(rgyud): kyil lasad// da rdza shugs kyim mangs// rnam gtsigs sa sa gsas i chis rnams// dkyi la 'i shin du na na/ 
13a1(rgyud): snying po rgyal po che// khyab bdag gsang ba'i mchog dbang phyug/ 'dod pa'i don kun grub pa'i phyir// 'bad pa yis na bris par bya// blo bras rgya
13a2(rgyud): da s+ho// byams pa 'dag rten po dang // rnam sa/ 'azung ba grags can no// byin du rang ba nyid dgo //  / mdag da de// bkunas ba bas 'bru
13a3(rgyud): 'od// 'jam dpal dbyangs ni rigs kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bzang dri ma med// sgrib pa thams cad nges par sal// de nas sa yi snying po mchog/ nam mkha'i
13a4(rgyud): ni mdzod dam pa// lagan rin chen bla na med// ngan song kun ni 'joms pa ni// dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya// dpa' bo 'di dgags ba che// dkyil 'khor 'di dag bri bar bya/ 
13a5(rgyud): 'khor ma dan dor nas ni// blags ldan pas phyir songs// shar du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gargya gi dem bzhin du dgod// 'khor lo mngos pa'i dag legs
13a6(rgyud): rjedapal ba'u bad ces bya// a tsug tor rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rdo rje padams rnam par brgyan// lhung bzed dang ni mkhor sa la dang // chos gos kyang ni khyad par du/ 
13a7(rgyud): kyise ko snyed par// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs//  sheg 'di ga//  rnams blo lan bdun pa sta na// kya 'dog tan
13a8(rgyud): phyag rgya mtshogs mchog de bzhin te// pang ma uta pa la nyid dang ni// skye blugs pags pa'i gal ga zhi dang // dbyug gu'i shing na mkhas pa yis// ma myo
13b1(rgyud): dbar bya// slar yang lho ru song nas ni// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// phyag tu 'bad pas bris par bya// rdo rje pan+ti sha dang ni// dril bu rab tu
13b2(rgyud): sa pa da // b+hakaM k+Sha nga nan 'dod// byik+ka par rdu ma tshan pa dang // gas smug dang na cug sum yang / 'd-i dag dpa' nan phyug d+hA// dkyil lta bar nub ma
13b3(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dbyings ni blo dang ldan// gsang ba'i chos ni dam pa'i mchog/ brtson 'grus chen po'i phyag rgya bri// uta pal 'khor mo rdo rje drang // ral gri yang ni khyed pa dang / 
13b4(rgyud): da pa dang ni dag sna nyid// mra bya dang ni seng ga nyed// phyag rgya 'di ni brtson 'grus che// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// 'khor ma'i grwani sogs gnas par// rdo rje skrag ma la sogs
13b5(rgyud): gyi mI 'khor le grwa ru ne// rdo rje 'dug pa zhes bya sogs// bdag nyid chen po 'bad pa yis// mchod pa 'di dag bri bar bya// phyi yid dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// gzugs kyi rdo rje
13b6(rgyud): sogs min// kA Tak+sha sa sgra bzhin dri de ni// khyad par du ni nyid dang // reg dang chos kyi dbyings dang ni// mkhas pa yis ni dag par bya// sgro lam thathams cad du// tsung can
13b7(rgyud): dgod par bya// de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis pa d+ma// dong shugs kyi sang nas ni// go rims bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi// sum rnams 'bad pas bri bar bya// nam mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba
13b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba dang // shes rab pa la phyin ma yang // phyag rgya kun dang yang dag ldan// ji srid de bzhin gshegs rigam// thams cad shir du dgod par bya// dmis na
14a1(rgyud): gros ldan pa yis// byang gi phyogs su song nas ni// gos dkar ma dang sgrol mche// khrog yer can dang grags 'dzin ma// khyad par du ni dpal bdun dang / 
14a2(rgyud): mda' bdun dang ni dbyangs can pa// de la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// bran dang bran par yang dag ldan// de bzhin pa 'phonya mo// gsang ba'i phyag rgya ldan ci bri// rdo rje shugs
14a3(rgyud): song nas ni// lho yo phyogs su rab phyin la// mA ma kI dang lcags sgrog dang // khab rtse rdo rje'i mtshan ma mchog/ de ltar bres nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogs su song nas ni/ 
14a4(rgyud): dede ni byin nas shes ldan gyis// skra can stobs che ni bri bar bya// de bzhin 'dam bu 'dar rgyud dang // lha mo zla mdzes 'od zer 'dra// dkyil 'khor kun gyi mtshams rnams su/ 
14a5(rgyud): bzhin nye ba'i skra can ma// 'bad pa yas ni bri bar bya// rab bai kra nor gyi blo gros dang // 'gug byed pho nya lnga dang ldan// gra yi cha ru bri bya ba// rdo rje mdung ce zhes bya sogs// sgo yi
14a6(rgyud): ngan thams cad du// sgo sbyong ba ni rnam par bri// gzhan gyis mi thub lha mchi// de bzhin ral po gcig mchig/ rdorje dregs mo lha mtsho// rdo rje ku ma~M b+hi yang dag bri// de nas n+dan/ 
14a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni// thams cad las ni 'bon nas su// shar gyi cha ni thams cad du// sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa yis// khro chen gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ de bzhin meg yo zhes bya
14a8(rgyud): dang // khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po ni// mnga' bdag brgya phrag lnga yis bskor// shar du bres nas sngags pa las// de nas byang gi char mang ste// tam kris
14b1(rgyud): bo dang // skur pa'i spyan ni khyad par du'o// khro gnyer rim pa rnam bsgyings pa// khro bo blo ldan brtson 'grus che// pho nya bran rnams thams cad dang // mamo stong gis yongs bskor bar / 
14b2(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal te// de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// lho yi phyogs su sa nas su// dong ni phyin te brtson chen po// khro ba chen po stobs po che// rdo rje mtshan pas lag
14b3(rgyud): mtshan pa// shes rab chen pos dgad par bya// khri bo zla ba'i thig le dang // de bzhin khro chen rdo rje 'chang // khro ba gzegs ma stobs pa che// khro ba bdud kyi 'khyil pa dang // rdo rjes
14b4(rgyud): sa 'og dang // de bzhin 'jigs pa'i mig can dang // rkang pas bsnun pa'i rdo rje mchog/ gsang dang rab gsang rjes 'gro dang // bran dang pho nya rjes 'gro ba// rjes 'gro can blo khro ba ni// 
14b5(rgyud): phrag gsum dang phyed kyis bskor// de ltar byis nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogs su phyin nas ni// der ni song skye brtson chen po// gshin rje mthar byed ces bya ba// gdang drug
14b6(rgyud): lalag drug pa// bri bo yi ge bdun shes bya// bri bo'i gtso ba steng phrag ni// bdud dag gis ni langs bskor ba'i// dkyil 'khor chen thams cad du// khrob gtum pa thams cad / 
14b7(rgyud): nas blo ldan 'das nas su// rang rgya mi rgyal ba thams cad ni// dkyil la bar kun du bris par bya// de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ni// rgyal bzhin thos bri bar bya// de nas thams cad na
14b8(rgyud): su// de rnams tshangs sogs lda de dag/ dkyil 'khor kun du rnam par bri// dbang phyug cha dang khyab 'jug dang // zla banyi ma zhes bya dang // gza' brgyad dang ni 'jig rten skyong / 
15a1(rgyud): / rgyal chen rigs ni bzhi po dang // de bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum nyid// 'jab bras rnams dang dag rnams// 'bruH dka' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams/ 
15a2(rgyud): changs can rnams dang / 'a chud rnams dang / tshad me 'ad rnam sa dang / 'dugs la nas pa dang / de// kyang rnams dang / tshad med dag napas nig na kyi rnam seM dge sprin medang
15a3(rgyud): dag shin/ dang/ 'du pal du 'dun byas da / rmA m+b+ha na du rgyunas sa nga / rol du la
15a4(rgyud): 5 gas sna kyi sgyu chen po gyu ba rnam pa chen ga shi / da /  rnaM na sa / 
15a5(rgyud): pa dun /  ga zhis gan la chen 'ad sa gas
15b1(rgyud): dang/ bya bc-i / du 'dang drabazhud pas klubs pa/ dam tha'ad ma mamananam nas ma ba skam par byan// da'abyangam du 'ag ba lnga pa gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du rnguH
15b2(rgyud): rgyam ba sbyin pa 'di pag cad ba kyi skyong brag da mi rnam par bsamanas/ ra'i sted du du rje seng ge la brel bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhag por bya'o// de
15b3(rgyud): khang ngom gyis the kod nas nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyi tshogs mchod nas nye bar zhugs te/ dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang dam tshig gis bcings nas mnyes par byas te/ mchod pa dang
15b4(rgyud): dbang bskur ba dang byin gyis brlabs pa dang spros pa dang / bsdu ba la sogs pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya// 
15b5(rgyud): ba las blang ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid no rnam par snang mdzad nga'o zhes bsgom par bya'o// de lta bu las langs nas de'i snyoms pa'i tshang
15b6(rgyud): byams pa'i 'dren byed dang mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' las 'das pa rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
15b7(rgyud): sprin gyis kun nas bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'bab pas rdo rje sems dpa' hUM mdzad kyi/ phyag rgya rang gi lus la zhugs nis phyogs thams cad tA~M ki yi gol
15b8(rgyud): sa rab tu bskrag par bya'o// bsnun pa bzhis rol pa dang bcas pas phyag byas la bzlas pa byas te/ 
16a1(rgyud): nas bcug ste bcings la dam tshig la gzhag par byas nas rdo rje se gol gyi sbyor ba dang kun nas 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab ste/ snying
16a2(rgyud): bo 'di bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag pa tshungs so snyam du bsam par bya'o// de lo 'di ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i snying po bzhi por 'gyur ro// a A ai
16a3(rgyud): aHbdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs pa yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed par byas nas/ de bzhin
16a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i so gol gtogs nas sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o// de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ badz+ra sa mA~M dza A gats+tsha A gats+tsha nA sa
16a5(rgyud): thA ga ta sa nA bo d+hi satwa pa ri pre te/ pr-i h+ye kA ri he te swA hA zhes so// oM badz+ra sa mA dza A gats+tsha/ A gan+d+he sar+b+ba ta thA ga d+hA badz+ra mi gI shI ras twa na le swA hA ya hAHa hAHde nas de bzhin gsheg
16a6(rgyud): pathams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyu dadangadu gzugs rnams
16a7(rgyud): dang / lhan cig dkyil 'khor du 'dus nas byon par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas meng brgyaHbrgyad
16a8(rgyud): btan mchog de ba bzhin du mchod pa phyis nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byas nas grongs pa rnams sa byung sngags su la chags pasas byas gas
16b1(rgyud): po dam pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzugs par bya'o// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ha su ra ta badz+ra badz+ra satwa dzaHrU baM hoHa d+hi tiSh+Than+tu/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA maN+Da laM zhes so// 
16b2(rgyud): de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsal bgodab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tham
16b3(rgyud): cad la bdag gsol ba 'debs lags kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab du ga sol/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad du
16b4(rgyud): sol/ bdag la dngos grub thams cad stsal du gsol/ ji ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rab byam rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings
16b5(rgyud): maHsa klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul kun nas bkang ste/ byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas 'di
16b6(rgyud): sring po'i rgyan chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug po'i cho ga rgyas par 'gyur ba ni de nas gos dmar po phrag pa dag zar te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tsha
16b7(rgyud): 'i thal mo sbyar nas/ sngags 'dis snyan pa/ san dbab par byas/ sa ma ya hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya badz+ra a d+hiSh+TA na~M ku du ma~M/ sar+b+ba ta tha ga ta sa ma eSh+Tame a d+he tiSh+Than+tu sar+b+ba bud+d+ho mA~M pra
16b8(rgyud): shayan+tu/ pra ti kA la yayAnra/ pU drAny+dza me pra yan+nan+tu/ pra bad+mo smisar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra maN+Da/ a le kA ra ma hA badz+ra ma N+Da le pre ti pa la yan tum+b+ha s+yA cu me pra lan+nan+ta/ de nas slob dpon kyis da
17a1(rgyud): thul mor me tog dkar po'i phreng ba sngags 'dis btags nas nang du me tog bzhi dang sor mo'i rtse mor me tog re re bcug la de nas sngags 'di brjod cing
17a2(rgyud): gyu'o// d+hUd+d+hab+h+rU~Mr+m+mA b+h+yaH/ grAr+m+mA d+hA d+hAm+b+ha Ad+hit+tiSh+Thas/ sa twA gtam ma las d+ha ng+gA'i shA n+te/ nganas smra ba dpan gyi mdo'i ga nga ga myigs bcings ma
17a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i khams rab tu khyab pa'i sbyor bas de bcug la sngags 'dis me tog gtor bar bya'o// 
17a4(rgyud): sngags nis ma yo he sa ma lo s+t+waM sa ma ya tAM/ gangal me tog rnams lhung ba de nyid de'i sgrar byin par bya'o// de nas cho ga bzhin du sngags 'das dbang bar byora'o// na maHsarba tan+tu/ 
17a5(rgyud): ga te b+h+yaHta Ta ta Ta/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ badz+ra hU~M bkr-i ta bir+yAdz+dzi tA dung dran ta da me kA/ has te la bod ro ka ha kaho/ tsu pu tsu lu muny+dzany+tsa s+'uts+tsha in+deTA hA sa dang be deng badz+ra bodzAM ga ta badz+ra ne trabadz+ra
17a6(rgyud): badz+ra pI Ni trai de laM mA~M bi sha mA bai shag+h+nAr+N+Na g+hAr+Na/ pUr+N+Na bAr+d+har+N+Na/ g+hAr+NA pa ya/ g+hur+N+Na pa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya thAm pa/ bta la mod pa/ a e she ra/ dzar+tha/ 
17a7(rgyud): pa/ k+Shapa yi / sa lak+Sha/ sa/  ga r+b+he kA thA buMd+d+harmA/ dab pa 'a sa tshig go// des bab nas kyi spyod sa
17a8(rgyud): gang dge'i'am me dge ba mthong ngem nis dro'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ma dge 'i ma mi dge sa bdag gi 'di la bum mdzang kyis smra bar 'gyur ro// 
17b1(rgyud): de nas slob dpon gyis de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du yongs su gzhaba' mig bcings pa bkrol ya dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa
17b2(rgyud): sa pa de'i dbus su kha dag thams cad kyis pad ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa yid du 'ong ba'am/ seng ge re kri dang nyid kyis bris te de nas de la dar gyi bgo ba dang / me tog bdug pa la
17b3(rgyud): sogs pa rnams kyi mchod la khyad par du gzugs dang sgra dang dra deng ro dang reg bya dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa nye bar mkho ba dang / dung dang rdza rnga dang / rnga bo che dang
17b4(rgyud): dung la sogs pa dang gar dang / glu rnams kyis legs par mchod nas cod pa rdo lnga'i dpung bskur te/ de baphrin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi go 'phang la sngags 'das
17b5(rgyud): hUM gzhag par bya'o// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+raSh+NI Sha a b+hi Shits+tsha oM badz+ra satwa a b+hi Sheny+tsa oM badz+rI rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+dza yai badz+ra badz+ra a b+hi Sheny+tsa spyi bo dang dpral ba dngam
17b6(rgyud): dang / snying go dang lte ba dang rked pa nas rje dar gyis bar du yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la rang gi lha'i gzugs kyi sbyor bas blta bar bya'o// de de ltar dbang bskur nas rigs dang mthun pa
17b7(rgyud): rnams bslab par bya'o// de la rdo rje'i gan mo tshig rnams ni 'di dag ste rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rong gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas
17b8(rgyud): salta ba'i thibs pa thams cad nges par 'o mas par 'gyur ro// rig pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ma reg 'ardo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rjerje gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i dngos po yongs su shes
18a1(rgyud): la 'dug par 'gyur ro// hUM mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir mtshams med pa'i mtha' do rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'das lta bar 'gyur ba thams cad nges pa/ 
18a2(rgyud): A bI ma hA mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir zhe sdang gi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di nyes pa thams cad gcod pa'i tshad du 'jug go/ maiH shes rab sgron ma mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gti mug gim
18a3(rgyud): ji'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis mun pa bsal bar byed par 'gyur ro// raM sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems can mnyam pa nyid la 'jug
18a4(rgyud): don dang sems can gyi nga bzhin rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// hrI sems thams cad sems gcig paste// do rje gnas 'dis sems i pa la 'jun pa'i don dang sems rang bzhin gyis
18a5(rgyud): 'od gsal ba mngon par rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// a sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzas su
18a6(rgyud): 'jug pa'i don dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// oM chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i
18a7(rgyud): sa rjes su rtog par 'jug pa'i don dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtog pa'i don du 'gyur ro// e bdud kyi las thams cad sangs rgyas kyi las te/ rdo rje gnas
18b1(rgyud): de las tham pa cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / las thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'i don du 'gyur ro// hUM ga thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dre/ 
18b2(rgyud): bzhin pa thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / brjod pa las 'das pa'i'o chos rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// d+h+r-i chos thams cad ma skyes pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dre
18b3(rgyud): 'pho med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / skye ba dang / rga dang 'che ba'i las 'da' ba'i don du 'gyur ro// maM chos thams cad ma byung ba ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di 'gog pa med pa'i don dang / chos tha/ 
18b4(rgyud): cad 'gog pa med pa'i don du 'gyur ro// khaM 'di la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa// bdag gis de nyid rab rtogs te// bdag gis de nyid rab brtags nas// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med
18b5(rgyud): 'gyur// de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / gter thams cad dang / 'khor lo 'di dang rdo 'de dang / ral grwa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dang
18b6(rgyud): chu dang / bcud len rnams dang / gyen du 'gro ba dang / rkang 'og dang me snang ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'ja
18b7(rgyud): dang dbang phyug chen pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams des myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// hUM med ni rtse gcig gyur ba~M yis// sangs rgyas rdzas dran pasgoms nas ni// nyam
18b8(rgyud): khor dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bsgom par bya// sbyor ba de yi bka' drin gyis// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam mda' gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ 
19a1(rgyud): 'ad kya kyim mkhor ba gsal 9// kun du bzang po phyag rgya me// lags par mnyam par gan/ pas bsgo mas// lan byed kyi sbyar bayis// kun du bzang po 'dra ba
19a2(rgyud): 'gyur//  na chen phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pa bsgom// rgyal po'i dbang bskur nyid dmani// ya na dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// rdo rjes hU~M phyag // da nas
19a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor brtan por 'gyur// de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyi mchog bsgom pa phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes nyid yin no// 'khor los
19a4(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom// phyag rgya kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// dam pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur// gzi brjed phung po phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du
19a5(rgyud): bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i rgyal srid thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// gdugs dkar gtsug tor chen po ni// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gtsug tor ye shes
19a6(rgyud): 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lha ci zhig smos// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya 9// de ni yang dang yang du bsgom// chos kyi rgyal srid rnam rgyal nyid// mdor bsdus pas ni tho
19a7(rgyud): par 'gyur// rnam rgyal gtsug tor phyag rgyagyig// dam pa'i yi ge bsgom par bya// legs par rab gnas 'od par can// dngos grul ye shes thob par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha
19b1(rgyud): mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang ma mnyam pa// gtsug tor rnams kyis legs bshad pa// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog/ de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// lhag pa'i lhan
19b2(rgyud): gcig bu nyid// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// rang 'byung mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor gi// rnal 'byor dbang phyug go 'phang mchog/ sangs rgyas ye shes dri ma med// 
19b3(rgyud): dachen mnab par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi dam ci ga ye shes kyi phyog rgya rnams so// da ni de ban gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi me ko'i rang bzhin gyi/ 
19b4(rgyud): shes de la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo ste rnam par 'byed pa'i don du shes par bya'o// oM baM a zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos tha
19b5(rgyud): kyiskor bshad do// oM a A oM aH ba zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo// don dam par chos thams cad kyi rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par blta bar bye'o// oM be/ na nas
19b6(rgyud): na chos thams cad kyi ming dang gzugs dang shes rab dang chos dang bcas pa la dbang bskur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM naM/ nga zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba dang nye ba'i pha rol tu phyin
19b7(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor brjod do// yod/ sa zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med pa las yang dag par 'das shing / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang rnam par spong ba dang zag
19b8(rgyud): dang bcas pa dang bag po med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang / khams dang skye mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i bden pa la nye bar len pa/ mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go// oM sru
20a1(rgyud): / ta zhes bya ba na de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par blta'o// oM ta ka zhes bya ba ni lus kyi rnam par smin
20a2(rgyud): dang bral ba'i phyir chos mas su dgas la bar bya'o// srog sa zhes bya ba ste m+b+ha m+b+ha m+b+ha thA tid dang dran pa med ci snying rje che ba dang shes ben pa las byung ba'i chos thams
20a3(rgyud): sgor gsal bar bshad do// oM maM ga zhes bya ba ni zab mo gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM gaM dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang 'chi ba las yongs
20a4(rgyud): la ba'i rang bzhin me phyed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM pa d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi byed pa'i do du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams
20a5(rgyud): sgor blta bar bya'o// oM d+haM sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM she kha zhes bya ba ni gang zag dang chos
20a6(rgyud): dag med pa nam mkha' ltar gapa la zhing cos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go// oM/ 9k+Sha zhes bya ba ni g.yo ba skye ba med pa
20a7(rgyud): me zad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te/ chos thams cad yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi slob 'alta bar bya'o// oM k+She zhes bya ma ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes po
20a8(rgyud): med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi skor blta bar bya'o// oM 'i shes bya ba ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhes yongs su myong ba'i phyir chos tham
20b1(rgyud): dkyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM maM D+ha zhes bya ba ni mthar phyin pa dang mur thug pa med
20b2(rgyud): cad kyi skor ba shad de// me mA dz+ha zhes bya ba ni dri ma'i nan po dmigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi skor blta bar bya'o// oM d+hi/ lus rlom mar 'byed pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ma
20b3(rgyud): mongs pa thams cad spangs te rdo rje snying po'i lus sa sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// a~M k+She snrums rnam par 'byed pa ni nyes pa dang rmongs pa dang bag la nyal ba rab tu
20b4(rgyud): spangs nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ai/ ngag rnam por 'byed pa ni ngag gi spros pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par
20b5(rgyud): dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM l-I tsa zhes bya ba ni grib ma ma dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis dang pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM mo g+ha zhes bya
20b6(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres pa ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyis su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ste/ Ta zhes bya ba ni caco dang bral ba dang rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'i
20b7(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oMT/ pazhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dbu pa gdas pa lta bu'i tshul gyi sogs pa'i'i ye shes gsal ba'i phyir chos kyi sring ba shad do// oM ye Da zhes bya
21a1(rgyud): blta bar bya'o// oM ti chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir nye bar ni ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ ma yuMd tshul bzhin ni nges par 'byung ba
21a2(rgyud): don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM me khon nyid ni smos pa thams cad rnam par spang ba'i phyir chos thams cad
21a3(rgyud): ra rnam par bzhug go// oM te ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM hUM yongs su gzung ba med pa ni 'thab pa da
21a4(rgyud): rtsod pa spangs pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// ma dz+haiM kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor ba
21a5(rgyud): bar bya'o// oM ka kha gA g+ha nga rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid bzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gnas so// oM tsa tshang dz+nyAnya/ snang ba ni gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyir
21a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgo'o// oM Ta a rmAN/ bsgom pa ni chos thams cad kun du sbyor ba 'ang bral la yang dag par sdud pa'i phyir chos thams can gyis 'o// oM ta k+Sha da t+ta na/ gzhi med pa
21a7(rgyud): thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go// oM ba pha ba b+ha ma/ byang chub ni chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM
21a8(rgyud): ral wa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni blo bur ba thams cad ngas par dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang chos kyi dbyings so sor thob cing mngon par shob pa lnga dang ye shes mkhyen pas sangs rgyas
21b1(rgyud): yongs su thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi skor blta bar bya'o// oM shwa Sha sa ha/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam lnga dag pa rnam pa 'byed pa byed pa'o
21b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par nges pa'o// de nas rigase thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chog gyes par gyur pa ni// sngon bzhin nges par byas nas ni// phyogs kun mnyam
21b3(rgyud): bsgoms nas// re rab chen po gru bzhi pa// rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi steng du rdo rjerje// de yi steng du pad ma gzhag/ 'dab ma brgyad pa ches bkrag/ rnal 'byor gnas zhes rnam
21b4(rgyud): shad// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa// yongs su rdzogs par 'dug nyid kyis// sangs kyi semams cad nyid sgoms na// da ni bskal pa'o mar thug gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi phya
21b5(rgyud): 'od zer gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can// rnal 'byor thams cad bsgom par bya// mnyam zed sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// b+ha ga chen po rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor pa gnas mi zad
21b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun padag bsgoms nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur// khams gsum pa yi rgyas sred che// sems can kun lnga thams cad da// gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgom
21b7(rgyud): de ci dngos grul la kun gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal chos// gdod nas dag cing ma 'dus pa// gang tshe ye shes mthong ba ni// de yi tshen dag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad
21b8(rgyud): nga 'grus pa// tshogasasas sa// g.yan mas// mtshags las byed pam gyur/ de ma nin gshes thamams ca kyi chen pa
22a1(rgyud): sa// 'khor los sgyur ba rgyal po ma// kun mtshogs yi dbang phyug na// rdo rje sbyar bas bsgoms na de// mnyam med 'khor los sgyur ba mtshungs// gzi brjid phung pa
22a2(rgyud): phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam pa gzhag pa bsgos// 'byur ba'i phreng bas 'i khrugs shing mangs// pad ma rAg mtshungs pa'i 'od// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// rang nyedag
22a3(rgyud): brjed phung por 'gyur// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nan// 'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor ba lngas// sems can dag pa nyid du 'gyur// rnam par
22a4(rgyud): gsal ba'i gtsug tor rgya// ral gri 'bar ba'i 'od kyis 'khrugs// zag pa med pa'i sbyor ba yis// mnyam med gsol ba'i gtsug tor mtshungs// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor bya
22a5(rgyud): / legs par mnyam par gzhags pas bsgom// rgyal po'i gtsug tor sbyor ba yis// de yi rnam pa'i spyod yul 'gyur// rdo rje dmatshig ye shes che// legs par mnyam
22a6(rgyud): par ka'ag pas bsgos// kun du babang po sogs gzugs kyis// mnyam yod rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs// zla ba'i dkyil 'a khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje sems dpa' sems
22a7(rgyud): dpa' che// byang chub sems dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// gtsug tor lnga ldan stobs po ma// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag
22a8(rgyud): // don dam par ni bsgoms na ni// 'gro ba mams cad 'gugs byed na// skye bo gzhan sa spos ce gos// rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pa bsgom
22b1(rgyud): dbu thams cad chags 'gyur na// bud me gzhan k+ta smos ci dgas// rdo rje legs pa'i phyag rgya tsho// dam pa'i don du masgom par bya// chags sa pa ni rA' gsal bas// bud med rnams
22b2(rgyud): ma par byed// byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag kyi'i la shes so// rdo rje rin chen phyag 6// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// dpral ba'i phyogs su gnas pa bsgob// de
22b3(rgyud): dang thod dbang ba/ ra thAg/ rdo rje ka zi brjed phyag rgya che// nyi ma'i dkyil la bor mtshungs pa'i 'od// snying gar gnas pa bsgom par bya// kun mkhyen ye shes ster bar byed// rin
22b4(rgyud): rtog gi phyag rgya// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa mchog/ sgrub po dam pas rdzogs par
22b5(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom// rdo rje bzhed pa ltar gyur te// de ni skye dgu dga' byed 'gyur// dbang bskur phyag rgya'i ye shes so// pad ma bde chen pad ma la// dag pa'i chos nim
22b6(rgyud): kabs// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// mnyam med rdo rje chos dang mtshungs// shes rab ye shes de rje no// bsgoms pas de ni rdo rje'achang // shes rab pha rol phyin dag
22b7(rgyud): nyid sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// dam pa'i don du bsgom bya de// mnyam med 'jas dbyangs dang ni mtshungs// rdo rjergyu yi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag bsgoms nas
22b8(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo kun mchog ce// mdor bsdus nas ni de yis bskor// de nga smra ba'i phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje bzlas pa'i nus pa yis// sbom po'i da/ 
23a1(rgyud): de yas 'chang // chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// rdo las kyi phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms na na// kun nas kun nas rang nyid kyis// rdo rje las ni byed par 'ju
23a2(rgyud): lung khyams pa//  / sa kyi mas // rang gling ba dang tshu//  na / na pa
23a3(rgyud): dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya me// lus ngag yid kyis de bzhin du// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// rdo rje khu tshur
23a4(rgyud): dzin par 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// sgeg mos mngon par dga' bstar// phreng ba yang na dbang bskur ba// glu mas mdzes pa'i sgo dbyangs byed// gdams rdzu 'phrul
23a5(rgyud): no bar 'gyur// drams bzang po'i dri yin te// me tog byang chub yanal gnyid// sgron mas mtha' dag gsal bya'o// 'dug pas bdug pa dgal btsun// lcags kyus dbang phyug 'brem
23a6(rgyud): dan// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// zhags pas dbang po'iching 'gyur na// gdug pa'i sems can spos ci dgos// lcags sgrog gis ni 'phrog byed dang // tshangs sogs da
23a7(rgyud): ga chen po 'ang 'ching // 'bebs pas thams cad 'babs 'gyur na// dben pa'i de dag smos ci dgos// 'di nyid kyis ni sbyor ba yis// chos kyi yi ge mtsho
23a8(rgyud): be shes rab sbyor bas// sbyar de slar du bsgrub par bya// 'di yi sbyor ba shes par bya// phyag rgya'i la kho lo khyad par du// spyi ga tsug snying ga rkang pa'i bar// yi ge yes ni yongs
23b1(rgyud): nga ba pa/ gzugs brnyan gcig gi ke 'phang gyur// sems ca gcag 'gyur bsam gtan rdzas// sa la rab gnas padaman// dbang chen gyi ni gnas nas pashad// dbang po gnyis na man
23b2(rgyud): sbyor bas// dbang phyug kyang ni bsgrub par bya// dbang chen dag ni gru bzhi pa// dbang chen gyi ni las su bshad// rgya ni rnam par shes par bya// pad ma'i mtshan mas rnam par mtshan// 
23b3(rgyud): kyid pa'i las dang ldan// na'i'i don du 'de ba shad do// me ni grasasam shes par bya// sum mdo yi ni gnas su gnas// de'i du bya ba bsrub don du// pad mA rAg 'ad pa'i 'od// mngon
23b4(rgyud): rtson 'grus che// rlung gi dkyil 'khor brjod bya ste// ral gre yi ni phyag rgya'i dbyebs// dbyar bye sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// ser dong dkar dang de bzhin dmar// nag po yang ni khyad par
23b5(rgyud): dang po'i dkyil lab rgyal gyis ni// ba mra'i bar du rab tu btag/ dang po de rje rab tu gzhag/ de mi rjes su rin chen te// 'dram dang ni las rnams 'byor// grub pa 'gro 'bang rim par
23b6(rgyud): bshad// phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gnyis su
23b7(rgyud): med pas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rtag pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad ni ba dang mtha' dang mtha' med pa'i phyag rgya
23b8(rgyud): bta' pa'o// bang pa'i sgo dang zad pa'i mtha' dang zad pa'i mur thug pa dang ldan pas chos thams cad zad pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 
24a1(rgyud): nyid kyi mtha' rnam par dag pas chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag ces rgyas btab pa'o// mig snga la yang dag pa das pas chos thams na nas
24a2(rgyud): mkha'i phyag rgyas kyis btab pa'o// sems can thams cad namakha'i dbyings nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyid / 
24a3(rgyud): sgra yang dag par 'du ba nyid kyi phyir/ chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// byang chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad pas chos thams cad byang chub kyi sem+ba/ 
24a4(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas bta' ba'o// chos kyi dbyings mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// ngo bo nyid med pas chos
24a5(rgyud): thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tshe ba med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skad cig ma nyid pas chos thams
24a6(rgyud): da mi rtag pa klakaHsa rgyas btab pa'o// skye ba dang ma ba dang 'chi ba mtha' dang ldan pas chos rnams car sdug bsngam kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi
24a7(rgyud): mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gdod mi nas yongs su dag pas ches thaMd yang dag pa'i ma ba
24a8(rgyud): rgyas btab pa'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// spros pa'i dmigs pa/ 
24b1(rgyud): rnam par bral bas chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas byas pa pa la // rab thams cad kyar rnam par gris pas chos thams cad sngon po rgyan pa byin tas n+ya btab s+ho// ngos po med pa
24b2(rgyud): ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan nyid shes natshas mas cad mi rtog pa'i mtha rgyas rgyas bta pas// phung pos yongs smra 'dul ba'i mnan nyid kyis na chos mos ba sdug bsngal gyi byag
24b3(rgyud): rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir chos thams cad zhi ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas pa
24b4(rgyud): pa'o// don dam pa'i bden pa yang dag par 'du ba'i phyir chos thams cad bden po'i phya ba rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tsho ba rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad dri ma med
24b5(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mchog tu mthar phyin pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bcad pa'i phyir chos
24b6(rgyud): cad ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'jal ba'i dab 'du byed pa dang dbang du bya ba med pa'i phyim thos thams cad sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// byed pa po
24b7(rgyud): byas pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ma
24b8(rgyud): sa pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab palo// 'gag pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod pa nas skyo ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas bab pa'o// rtog
25a1(rgyud): kun du spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa phyag+sa rgyag rgyas pa ta 'dra'o// gzugs rnam par lta ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ba
25a2(rgyud): nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gnas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad nye bar spyod pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mi mthun pa'i phyogs nye bar mi da
25a3(rgyud): phyir chos thams cad la rjes su sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi rnam par smin pa med
25a4(rgyud): papa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skye ba dang gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// nam mkha' dang khyad par
25a5(rgyud): memed pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtshan nyid gcig gi phyir chos thams cad gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam pa
25a6(rgyud): shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skyeng pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad phung po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po dang bca' pa med pa'o phyir chos thams cad khams dang
25a7(rgyud): skyemached kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnam pa nyid thob pas chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha'
25b1(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyi chol thams cad mos ste phyag rgyas byas btab pa'o// thams cad kyi las sna chog pa byed pa'i phyir chos
25b2(rgyud): thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas bA ta pra pa'o// thams cad dam chog pathas cad rjes su bsgrub pa'i chos thams cad dmatshig gi phyag rgyas k+Sha swa bi tab pa'o// 
25b3(rgyud): chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas bta
25b4(rgyud): pa dang / theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas
25b5(rgyud): rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / rdo rje ye shos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa / ye shes thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / thams cad
25b6(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / me long la bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / 
25b7(rgyud): rtog pa'i ye mas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / zla ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi myo ga byas rgyas bta' 'dang chos rnams cad chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sdug
25b8(rgyud): rgyal btam tham// de dzin gagags pam kyi ma ma sa da / mamarnam pa dal gas
26a1(rgyud): 'ongs pa dang nga lngar dbyung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyag rgya nyid kyi phyag rgya'i tshig gang gis/ phyag rgya'i tshig 'di rnams kyis kyang chos kyi
26a2(rgyud): po brgyad khri bzhi stong skyed par byed do// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// a e aHI/ sngags pas phyag rgya 'di lta bus rgyu bta
26a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'du'o// hUM myur du ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// bde nas de ni de bzhin gshegs pa
26a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi sbyor ba thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes su gyur pa ni/ snying gi dbus su rtag bsgom bya// pad ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// 
26a5(rgyud): bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// de yi steng du rtag bsgom pa// yi ge yi ni gtso bo mchog/ thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// khab ba ma'i 'od la
26a6(rgyud): dpa' bo kun dgra ltar dkar// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar 'od gsal// zhi ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin sku// kun mkhyen ya shes kyis gang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa dun
26a7(rgyud): / ra sA ya na dang mtshungs mchog/ kha yig mkha' 'dar shes par bya// thig le nA das rnam par spros// gas rab chen po mchog tu mdzes// thog ma tha ma med
26b1(rgyud): ga/ de'i skad du 'od zer che// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug pa'i 'od// rdo dzo ji lta bur gnas// skye 'ang rjem lnga dang ldan// da yi skad du rtag bsams pa// mi sa mchag ga ga
26b2(rgyud): pan ngag mchog las shes bya ste// gzhan du na ni nga mi smra// sangs rgyas mkhas pa thams cad kyis// mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungs so// rnam par grol ba gsum
26b3(rgyud): thob 'gyur 'di ni gzhan du min// lhan rkan la sbyar bar bya// sna yi rtse mor yi ke dz+dza// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya'i go 'phang tshig gis ni// shes
26b4(rgyud): ldan pas rang sems bsgom// snang ba mang cing spros med pa// shin tu mchog tu phrar shes bya// khyab bdag bsod nams ye shes dngos// bsam bya bsam gtan brtson byas
26b5(rgyud): thig dang sgron ma'i 'od bzhin du// ra yig 'bar ba dang ldan pa// mgrin pa 'bad pas bcus nas de// dkar po sa rab ston po'i 'od// dmar po yang ni bdag gis so// 'ja
26b6(rgyud): 'di dka' bad pa yis// 'di dag yang dag nyer mtshon te// snying gar gsal bar byas nas su// de bzhin thams cad spyi 'ong song // gnas de las ni 'ayon nas byung / 
26b7(rgyud): thams cad dgang bar bya// de las 'thon nas 'jig rten ni// mtshungs par kun nas thams cad du// slar yang da du 'ongs nas ni// de ni 'jug par rab tu 'asam// yid kyis de lta
26b8(rgyud): snyoms na ni// rang nyid la kho lo sgyur lta bur// dbang ni go
27a1(rgyud): tha ma tshugs paste// stong pa nyid du mtshan ma ma // skyon pa med pa na sa ldan padag med pa la// blanam kyi na pordzogs ra byu / 
27a2(rgyud): rdzam ni pas// 'angs sbyin pa lams da na//  pa rnam sa ya
27a3(rgyud): yang dri 'dzin rgyal po// yon tamamachag las smras par 'gyur// rkyenarnams kun kya // thad me das su da sa// maus ga
27b1(rgyud): mo ga shes dag nga/ sa maldan // sngags pas du dang kun cigasanas// gas rab pa pa snyen pa rgyangs 'gyur// thung ma de yin na
27b2(rgyud): sang ba do rje rjes su sbyar// rig 'dzin rnams kyi rgyal po ni// stobs chen grub par de 'gyur ro// gsang chen mar ka ta mtshungs// gang gis rtag tu bstam pa
27b3(rgyud): yang ngo rje 'dzin rgyal po// myur du gsang ba'i dam par 'gyur// bud med pad me rag 'dra// rkyen rnams kun gyis rnam par bsta// dbang po gnyis ni sems 'jug pa
27b4(rgyud): ji'adzinams bu bsgrub// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog khrisam pas rtag tu bsgom pa ni// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun da / 
27b5(rgyud): tshungs// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bani// mchog gas gnas kyis bskams na ni// rnal 'byor mchog gas mi ring bar// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'gyur// yang dgra stong
27b6(rgyud): dam pa bani// legs par mnyam par gzhag pa bsgom// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med 'jig rten dbang phyug mtshungs// 
27b7(rgyud): ni// shin tu mnyam panag pas mnani// rdo rjes sa rgyas ting 'dzin mcha/ mnam med 'ja ma pa'i mchog dang 'dra// ma mdzegs panirnam pa bani// rdo rje'i stso
28a1(rgyud): bsgom par bya// dbang po gnas na skams 'jug pas// ngang 'dzin pa lta bu ste// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rkang pa bzhi// shin du mnyam gzhag bskams na / 
28a2(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// tshangs pa yi ni gnas banI pi// tshad med pa yis rgyas kyis ni// rdo nga srur bar bdag bsku
28a3(rgyud): pa di bag nyid / das pa'i dzin kyis bas na/ yang po ni nyis namams 'du sanyam med
28a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas mtshungs// yid kyi stobs ni rnam pa lnga// shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms nu ni// 'khor las bsgyur ba brtson 'grus che// stobs 'dzin su bu nyid du 'gyur/ 
28a5(rgyud): byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun// gsang sngags bskam pas bsgoms nano// rtog pa'i ye shes sbyor ba yis// khyab bdag tshis kun 'dzin par 'gyur// 'dzag la
28a6(rgyud): yan lag brgyad kyi lam// kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa// da ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten shes rab rab tu 'da'// rjes su dran pa rnam pa drug
28a7(rgyud): bdag nyid rtse gcig gis bsgoms na// sngags pa ngo rje 'dzin pa ru// sngags pa dus mi ring bar 'gyur// stobs bcu po ni yang dag bsgoms// bsgom pa'i rnal
28a8(rgyud): ra de nyid kyis// bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs te// rtag tu stobs bcu'i dam par 'gyur// pha rol phyin bcu yongs su rdzogs// stobs rnabs dang ni
28b1(rgyud): dang rna pas dang // sa rnams kun na ngas bskrad nas// myung du mtshan ma dag par bskur// nam grol gas kyis bsgrubs nas sa// da yi nu ma shin tu bsnun// rjedza kyis kyang / 
28b2(rgyud): babed de// margya mes mchu ni yongasas gal// 2'dabs dam du sprul / byang chub sems ni bskal par \u0f7f// dza rje la shes brtson 'grus ma// deHdbyings su bdas
28b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor shes pa de 'asnyen bya// zung med rnams kyi dam tshig 'grul/ ngo sems dpa' mtshungs par 'gyur// bud meng rnams
28b4(rgyud): za gar bsnun// lding gi myur du gang bar 'gyur// sbyar ba 'di ni mkhyen pa yi// stabs chen sangs rgyas rab tu grub// gsang ba 'di ni dam pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob
28b5(rgyud): pa'o// gsang ba 'di yi sbyor ba yis// yi ge'i dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dras pa'i// chos su grags pa gang yin pa// de rnams sgom byed gco
28b6(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad rab tshogs pa'o// ma 'dres po yi chos bco btad// sangs rgyas chos su grags pa ste// de rnams bsgom pa dang ldan pa sa// sangs rgyas bya
28b7(rgyud): chu ba rab ster byed// bsam gtan bzhi po thob nas ni// gzugs med pa yi rtag par yang // 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ldan pas// sapas rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa pa// 
28b8(rgyud): ngarkub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// chos ni mchog tu rmad byung ba// de rnams bsgom pa dang ldan pas// byang chub sems dpa'i skyob pa'o// sngags rnams thams cad
29a1(rgyud): 'grub cing // sbyor ba thams cad thams cad du'o// des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas chos nyid bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i la
29a2(rgyud): shes sbyin tshun dbe na dang 'o// mcho dpang bang bam+bur byin brlabs pas// nad 'dra gzhan dum y-i na/ shags dang gsol ba gdu da/ bdag da
29a3(rgyud): de bzhin no// sangs rgyas sogs la yi rang zhing // de bzhin yongs su bsngo ba dang // byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// khyad par du ni dus kun du'o// 'og ma pad
29a4(rgyud): ma reng du// nga lta bzhin du rdzas bsgoms pas// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgrub bya ste// 'di la the tshom yod ma yin// 'gro ba sems kyis spro ba ni// brtan pa'i snying
29a5(rgyud): lags par bshad// stong nyid nga bzhin nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dper de bshad do// 'gro ba thams cad bkug nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub sbar bar bya/ 
29a6(rgyud): yor ye shes dag pad// de rje sgal po mchog ces bshad// rdo rdza grags pas chags gyur nas// rang bzhin gyis ni btan par 'gyur/ 'gro lus las meng pa/ 
29a7(rgyud): yi sems ni chags par bshad// chos rnams kun ni rang bzhin gyis// rnam par dben zhing gnyis su med// gang tshe dag pa'i bdag nyid mthong // tshe rjelegs
29a8(rgyud): rabashad// de rje sems dpa' bzhi po yis// maung dang 'ad ni sbyar ba'o// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sdom pa mchog tu dam pa'o// khams gsum
29b1(rgyud): / sa \u0f7fsa rdugs par byas pas// sa /  u sa byung ba// dbazhan gshegs kun lags/ rnag pa ma
29b2(rgyud): khyed rnal la ba ga le badzad mtshas/ 'atan pa rtag pa nyid du gyur// nam mkha' mdzad ni med da chen po// chos rnams thams cad dbang gi myur ba// yid latsun nor bu ngo/ 
29b3(rgyud): tog ni bla na mang // ye shes snang ba rin chen che// rmad du byung bangs par mthong // de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ni// rdo rje 'a nad pa nas su grags// chos kyi bdag med las
29b4(rgyud): gnyis su ba dpa ma shes ma// chos nyid dmi pa bsum du med// dan chos nus bya bar drin// rdo thi gas snang bam// shes rab la gas dri me chogag
29b5(rgyud): sa rab chen po pa// de ni rdo rje rnon por bshad// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor lo// gnyis su med las byung bar mtshon/ yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel ming // nga
29b6(rgyud): sa par bshad// dgas pa'i skad ni smos pa'i mchog/ yul rnams kyis ni bshad pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis zlas paH// da ni dzang smra bar bshad// sems can kun gyi den
29b7(rgyud): yangs kyus kun gyi mchod pache// gdod nas drug pa'i rnal 'gyur che// de ni rdo rje las su bshad// phrin med pa'i byams pa che// bsring ba'i rgyu gan pa
29b8(rgyud): chen po// nga phru nas su thams// shes ma sa sa na mthun pa// rnams mas/ da gan sbyi
30a1(rgyud): lus ngag yid na yang dag sbyor// sgrib pa med cing yige bral// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang // da ni nga rnga mtshams sbyar bshad// rdo rje yi shes rnal 'a
30a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs pa che// po'am bam mngazhi ba// rig pa mchog ces bya bar bshad// de nas yang 'jam dpal gnan nur gyur pa so de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
30a3(rgyud): glus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par mched nas glung blangs pa/ oM sap+pa bud d+ha par me shwar bud shung+ga la l-i heHsu b+hA ga/ su ra ta/ ma hA ma hA A da ma hA prat+ta
30a4(rgyud): lo kI shI ra ta thA t+ta b+hA be tAd ma ka ta thA ga ta/ byang chub sems bskyed las 'khrungs pa// sangs rgyal kun la phyag 'tsha la// mtshas gi dbang phyug dam pa'i chas// gdod nas rna
30a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal// phyi chub sems dpa'i sgrub pa po// de can kun la phyag 'tshal// de bzhim la shugs pa rdo rje tshe// sangs rgyas byang chub la phyag 'tshal// mi dmigs go 'phang la
30a6(rgyud): gnas pa// mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal// 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs po che// drug yi ge ma lus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa mtha' dag dang // shin tu yongs su mya ngan
30a7(rgyud): 'da'// 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon bzang po// rdo rje la shes dri ma med// rnam par dag po dang mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab gsol byed// rnal 'byar dbang phyug rnam
30a8(rgyud): mgan// dus gsum bsam pa dbang sgyur ba// sems can rnams la 'an don du// 'thung la khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// da rje srings rgyan las dkyil lam chen po yang
30b1(rgyud): rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ bcom ldan
