30b2(rgyud): 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje snying po rgyun gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i don tshad du brjod pa// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ 
30b3(rgyud): skyong ba zhes grags pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi sgrib pa'o// gru ba ni pa la sgo bzhi pa// ta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes// sgo khya dang dza' gzugs brnyan dang // phyag rgya dang sran
30b4(rgyud): rab tu mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// 'khor lo gnyis ni rab tu gnas// rtsibs brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs// 
30b5(rgyud): 'khor nang gi ni// lte ba'i gnas su legs brtags pa// pad ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// gesar gtams pas rab tu mdzes// de yi lta ba'i dbus su ni// khyab bdag rnal 'byor/ 
30b6(rgyud): dbang phyug che// rnam par snang mdzad brtson chen po// sems can kun la rjes brtsa bas// de yi nye 'khor kun du ni// de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad rnams dgang// shar du dgad bya'o/ 
30b7(rgyud): lo can// gtsug tor dkar po nub tu gnas// gzi brjid phung po lho ru'o// rnam par rgyal ba byang du gnas// dbang ldan rnam par gsal bar bri// mer ni steng 'gro dgod par bya/ 
30b8(rgyud): 'gra chen po bden bral du// rlung du rgyal 'chen po gnas// sangs ha sa gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ldan pa 'di dag bri// mi bskyad pa ni shar du dgod/ 
31a1(rgyud): lho ru rin chen 'byung ldanan// nub tu 'ad dpag med par 'gyur// byang du dang yod grub pa' meng // zla ba'i dkyil 'khar la brten pa'o// dbang ldan phyags nas 'a
31a2(rgyud): wi/ dzadzasems dpa' las gas bya// thams cad zab 'idakyil 'khor gnas// gzir rnams ng+ge ba'i dkyil lakhor la lo// zung ba rnam par dag byab// radage phyug kyi 'ad ma
31a3(rgyud): 'bar// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i// lha mo 'bad pas dgod par bya// derje 'dug pa la sogs bri// de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa/ 
31a4(rgyud): spangs 'bad pas bri ba ga// phye yi dkyil lakhor la gnas par// kun du bzang sdigs rim bzhin te// rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor rnams dang // mi nyi y-i ni 'khor dag dang / 
31a5(rgyud): rnams dang mngag pa dang // de bzhin po pho nyam// rgya mtsho yi ni dkyil 'khor ni// 'od gyen kyil 'khor gsal po'o// phyi phyi rol rdo rje'i ming // dkyil 'khor la ni 'bad pas
31a6(rgyud): / dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas su// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po bri// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen ming // dbang po lasogs lha thams cad// ma mo kun dang sring ma
31a7(rgyud): rams// rgyal ba chen po bzhi dang kra// de bzhin lha rnams thams cad dag/ brtson 'grus chen po nam mkha' lding // 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// de la'i dmyal 'khor bras ma
31a8(rgyud): / kyang bar du ni mchad pa // ma tag 'dug skyes rim ma mags// da bzhin bze' dang marnams gas// phreng ba'i rgyan rnaM lnga chags kyis/  na sa chags
31b1(rgyud): dkyil la bar kun gyi cho ga yas// mtshad pa kun gyis thams cad nas// 'khar la kun gyi cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mchad par bya// de nas sleb ma
31b2(rgyud): mas cad gzhug/ yongs su dge pa khyad par du// byang chub sems ni bskyed nas sla// byang chub bslab pa rjes spyod pa// chag shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug/ 'dren pa rnam
31b3(rgyud): lnga mchod du gzhug/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur sbyor ba yis// dbang bskur ba nid de nas sbyin// seng ge'i kr-i yi steng du no// dar dang me tog rkun pos sbas// dkar po'i gdugs da
31b4(rgyud): datwenarje// zlar rgya che 'bar ba dge/ de lcig las kyi drung du ni// mkhas pa yis ni gzhag par bya// bdan rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs ras kyis rab mchid pa
31b5(rgyud): yon gyi drung du thams cad nas// 'bad pa yis ni gzhag par bya// rin chen sman kun gyis gang ba'o// bum pa legs par gzhag byas te// rdo ming gi da'ang bskur gyis/ 
31b6(rgyud): del rang gis dbang bskur bya// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba// mkhas pa yis ni slar yang bya// kun gyi cod pan dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// chos kyi cong/ 
31b7(rgyud): pan dbang bskur dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi slob ba ni// sna tshogs las kyi dbang bskur sbyin// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mtshungs pa'o// chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas
31b8(rgyud): kun gyi sgron ma'i sbyin// de ltar slob ma dbang bskur ba// khyad par du ni sngags paso bya// de la nga mtshig chog yis// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbar bar bya// slob da ma brnyas par/ 
32a1(rgyud): mi bya zhing // sgrub po kun la smad mi bya// sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad la// 'da' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // grub mtha'i rigs
32a2(rgyud): pa thams cad la// smad par mi bla blang mi bya// de la mngon par dka' ba spangs// sdig pa thams cad rnam spang zhing // de bzhin bsad nams thams cad bsdu// bza' dang smad/ 
32a3(rgyud): mo du ma la// bza' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'dod pas bcom ldan sems pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras bdag skyes// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// 
32a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad chags las 'khrungs// de bzhin zhe sdang rmongs las 'khrungs// mnyam dang mi mnyam ches kun dang // dbu ma'i gnas la gnas nas su// de nyid
32a5(rgyud): dam tshig shes nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub yong mi spong // lus can kun la 'tshom bya// khyod kyis ser sna mi bya ste// phrag don bya bar mi bya'o// dam pa'i chos ni spang mi \u0f7f/ 
32a6(rgyud): chub sems ni mchog tu bde// chang gi 'byung ba spang bya ste// pha rol bud med rnam par spang // thams cad mkhyen pa yongs mi dor// rtag tu srog chags gsang mi bya/ 
32a7(rgyud): sems can kun la snying derje dang // byams pa yang ni rnam par bsgom// sems can rnams la phan pa ni// yang dang yang du yongs bsdu bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa/ 
32a8(rgyud): slob pa rnams la rjes brtsa bas// mkhas pa yis ni bstan par bya// de nas phyag rgya rjes bcing po// go rim bzhin du bstan par bya// 
32b1(rgyud): thasams pas lams sa pa/  sa skad du bstan// sangs rgyas byang chub zhugs la thA/ bcu rang du byas nas / 
32b2(rgyud): sbyang bas yongs su brtag/ 'dzar los sgyur sogs phyag rgya'o// dam pa sbyin pa yin par bshad// sangs rgyas dpe' pho thams cad kyi// dam tshig phyog rgya 'di yi na/ 
32b3(rgyud): dang drug bcu ces// na yongs su 'o// da nam pa migs par gyur//  chen po zhes su bsgrags// mab cung ldan lag/ 'amar mas// 
32b4(rgyud): nams gags// dag la ba zhes byab// rdzaldan pa bzhin gshegs//  bldan byas pas// gtsug ting rnam pa'i 'byung gnas te// da@
33a1(rgyud): thams cad kyis// steng du 'gro ba nas su bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa yongs su sbyar// dam tshig kun gyi 'byung gnas te// gung ma'i rtse mo mchog tu sbyar// mthe'u chung dang
33a2(rgyud): rim pa bong brkyang // lcag sa gru mda' yi skyong ba yis// lags sa be ni sbyar bar bya// klung mo rje na chen no// bya bra gzi brjid mchog gi mchog/ rgyal mtshan gnas
33a3(rgyud): nges par sbyar// bzhad pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// dbu ma pad ma lta bur bskum// ral gri 'dzin pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ 
33a4(rgyud): los sgyur// kha du phye ba'i phyag rgya che// rdo rje smra ba nyid du 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya che// gar mtshungs rdo rje sna tshogs can// chos longs sdud pa'i sbyong pa yis// rdo rje ba
33a5(rgyud): bar bajig par bya// mche ba gnyis ni rnam par gtsigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes su bshad// khu tshur bcings pa khu tshur gyi// rdo rje thal mo snying gar yi nag/ rdo rjesreg pa nas su gras
33a6(rgyud): yongs su sbyar ba spyi bor gzhag/ rdo rje phreng ba zhes su brjod// thal ma sbyar ba gdang du dkrol// rdo rje kum rjes su bsgrags// bgyad cing 'dud pa'i sbyar ba yis// de ni nga jig dam
33a7(rgyud): bshad// pad mo'i bal mo gdang du dbye// skye bor yongs su sbyar bar gzhag/ snying gir mthe bo bskams pa dang // rab tu brkyang 'byug pa'o// logo ba stedang du yongs brkyang ba/ 
33a8(rgyud): gzugs kyi phag tu nyid du 'gyur// lag gnyis rna ba'i lam du gnag/ swa yi phyag rgya nyid du bshad// dri ni byug pa'i sbyor ba yis// dri yi phyag rgya zhes su brjod// gdong du
33b1(rgyud): bsngags// de nas ral gri'i mtshonatshwa ye// rnam pa rjeni nyer gnas pa/ ga

33b3(rgyud): la ba'iH// pad ma'i mgan po nas su grags// mche'u gtsigs pa dang ldan pa 'i/ khe dang 'dra bar legs par gtugs
33b4(rgyud): 'din rta mgrin phyag rgyas// kha yi phyogs su rab tu
34a1(rgyud): pa rab tu brkyang // ma zad blo gros phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rin chen rdo rje snying gar gzhag/ nam mkha
34a2(rgyud): sa ste// nam mkha'i mdzod nyid ster bar byed// rdo chen po lags par brgya // mab tud mim yodangs par bcig/ lag pa gnyis ni nges par brtag
34a3(rgyud): dadu bsgreng // mdzub mo gnyis po skur bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje snying po'i rgya// rdo rje snying pos bka' stsal to// khu tshur
34a4(rgyud): sa nas sra// mdzub mo gnyis po rtse mo bya// 'di ni 'jam papa la phyag rgya ste// de rje ral gri nas su brtag/ de nyid shag ti'i rnam pa ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldar
34a5(rgyud): 'o// gshin rnga mthar byed mdung rtsir 'gyur// mdung rtsi chen por rab tu 'atag/ mdzub mo bskum par byas nas ni// gung mo'i steng du yongs su bzhag/ zhags pa

34a7(rgyud): gcig ni bskum par bya// 'di ni nye ba'i skra can rgyar// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal to// rdo rje bsdams pa steng bcings te// dbu ma na
34a8(rgyud): sa rnam par pa #/ na ma pa ye// mdzum mamamatsha pas
34b1(rgyud): na yongs su bshad// mdzul mer lcags skabs rnam pa las// rgyu mo'i dbu ma du rubya// 'di ni sdug pa blagaH// darje lta bur yongs su bshad// dang l+h+wa
34b2(rgyud): rtsalnga paM// rgya ba gzigs mar rnam par bshad// mchog gi rtse me rtse gcig bya// rdorjertse mdzod kyis bshad// lag na rin chen phyag rdzun// lag gnyis lags par ba
34b3(rgyud): sor mo pad ma'i dbyibs su bya// skul byed lha mor yongs su bshad// thal mo yongs su sbyar ba las// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong dag/ mig gi tshul du sgyu
34b4(rgyud): nga// sangasaHsa spyan gyi rnam ra // kra/ shis pani skyes klu 2/ rnas na ni yin pa sna lus bsrung ste// lag gnyis ltung bablang ma nan dug
34b5(rgyud): bsam gtan phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad byo// sangs rgyas kun DI don mdzod pa'o// mi bskyod pa yis la reg/ rin cheni tog gi mchog sbyin pa
34b6(rgyud): bsam gtan phyug rgya 'dod pag mad/ tshan nyid kyi don rtogs byes// ngan yod ga shegs pa // mi 'jigs 'jigs pa ma pa skyen// ma ldan rnams
34b7(rgyud): klung gnaso// sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin 'ad// mnyamo byang bzhag pa ga sun// 'tsho pa'am ni chu du gaT+Ta// 'dig ton pa yi phywa la/ 
34b8(rgyud): gcig ni rab 'arkyang ste// dbang sngon gyinagasum pa// mthabs mtha' rgyu mnan par bya// lha yi dbang po'i rdo 'gyur// lag pa g.yas pos brtag par
35a1(rgyud): me yi oM yig lag pa dag/ mthe'o gung ma nyid la gzhag/ ka shin de'i rje ga pa ste// mdzub mo dang ni mtha pad sgyur// de nyid khyab 'jug 'khor las// 2
35a2(rgyud): lo'i yi ge dkod par bya// lag pa gcig gis bde pa ni// ma mo rnams kyis yang dga' shad// so ma gnyis bsko ral gron// srin pa bdag nyid chen po'i'o// mdza
35a3(rgyud): mo mthe bong sbyar ba ni// chu lha'i zhags pa nyid du bshad// mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dag/ phyal mtshan lta bur legs par brkyang // rlung lha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya ni// 
35a4(rgyud): pa gnyis kyis rab tu brtag/ dgra ma gcig blo legs 'byung ba// dbyug te'i phyag/ rgyar rab tu bshad// gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug na// lus ngan bdag nyid chan pa'o// 
35a5(rgyud): mchod phyir bags kyi phyag tani// tshangs pa yi ru legs par bshad// drag pa'i gsal shing shes byas//  ma'i pa Tas ru brjod// tshogs bdagra gi ni snga ru bshad// 
35a6(rgyud): zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor ro// nyi ma'i 'od zer stong phrag ni// lag pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya// tshad kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor pa yis/ dbang po'i ngo rje mtshan tshwa wAr/ 
35a7(rgyud): 'di ni lha rnams kun gyi rgya// dpa' bo kun gyis rab tu gnang // dri ba rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// klu len lta bur rab tu bsgrags// dga' byed dbang phyug phyag rgya che// rdzu nga'i sa
35a8(rgyud): dbyangs rab tu 'bar// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod phyir// lha chen pos ni rab tu brtags// ting ting shig 'dzin sbyor ba yis// ma 'am ci rnams kyis brjod bya
35b1(rgyud): klurnams byer ni lcogs par bshad/ kA sbed pa'i spyong ba yis bzhin no// lag pa'i nags pa dzes bcings pas// de ni b+hag tur rab
35b2(rgyud): rnams dam tshig phyag rgya ru// de bzhin gshegs rnams legs par gsungs// las kyi sbyor ba 'bad pa yis// 'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgyar bshad// phyag rgya ran
35b3(rgyud): sems kyis ni// rin chen yang dang lang du bsam// rnam par rtog med gdod nas ni// chos dbyings mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa// stong phra mkha' 'drar shes nas su/ 
35b4(rgyud): pa yis ni bsgom par bya// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes shing // rmi lam lta bur rab tu gnas// dri za'i grong khyer lta bur snang // 'tshe ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang // mig
35b5(rgyud): lta zur shin du na// 'gro ba thams cad rab tu gsal// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa ru// sred pa thams cad mdor bsdus pa// bdag med pa zhes mthong nas ni// sangs rgyas
35b6(rgyud): kun dang dpa' ba yis// sgyu ma smig tu brag chu dang // lbu bachu yi chu bur dang // gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten ni// de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgangs// thams cad
35b7(rgyud): la ma'i 'kho la su/ brgyan byung mo ji bzhin du// gar gyi gnas kyi yul 'dag// zla ba gnyis dang mtshungs par bas// rtag tu glog gi phreng ba 'dra// sbrang
36a1(rgyud): dang mtshungs par gnas// 'khar ba shin tu bslang bas// rgod ma' kha dang 'dra bar gnas// 'di ltar shes shing rtags nas na// bskam pa'i skabs kya
36a2(rgyud): rang nyid kyis// sems ni legs bslab rnal 'byor pa// de la phyag rgya rab tu bshad// stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin las// lus dang dgra
36a3(rgyud): yid kyis ni// dam tshig gis ma ni btags pa'i// phyag rgya sngagos dang lha nyid dang // da ni gsum ni rab tu gnas// bdag nyid spong ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// mtshan te
36a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal to// phyag rgya yi ge bral ba ste// rnam pa med cing snang ba med// dngos po
36a5(rgyud): bang ba'i chos rnams la// dngos po'i de nyid nyid du bshad// dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin yin// dngos med nyid kyang dngos po yin// dngos deng dngos med rnam par
36a6(rgyud): grol// rnal 'byor ye shes mchog tu bde// rtog ge med cing snang ba med// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge med// stong pa nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i sems// gang tshe de ltar
36a7(rgyud): te gyur pa// de tshe phyag rgya rnams dang sngags// lha nyid du yang rab tu brtag/ stegs las phyag rgya ma mthong nyid// phyag rgya las kyang sngags min la// rang nyid la yi
36a8(rgyud): ni// gnyis mang sngags dang phyag rgyar btags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen pa las phyag rgya
36b1(rgyud): rim par bya ba la// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'das par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los skur ba
36b2(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rigs bskyed par mdzad du gsal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya
36b3(rgyud): dag gis gsol pa btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas 'og min gyi gnas nas byon te/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhugs nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la chos pa
36b4(rgyud): nas zas gtsang gi rigs la mngon par gzigs te/ mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub kyi snying po dag la nye bar mnan nas nye bar 'khod de/ bdud bzhi las rnam par
36b5(rgyud): rgyal bar bstan nas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par gyur te/ bzhugs nas kyang kun nas 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin bya ba brgya stong phrag btung
36b6(rgyud): bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing gas
36b7(rgyud): sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba t+ta thA gA ta badz+ra sam pa/ A kar+Na ya sarba ta thA gra tAnA d+h+r-i/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'kho
36b8(rgyud): rnams legs par byon te chos kyi dbyings su smos nas phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams khyab ste/ nam mkha
37a1(rgyud): khams na gnas 'a thams cad til gyi gang bu wAr 'dzam bu'i klad du 'khod pa 'gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dngal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gas bkug
37a2(rgyud): bcug ste// bcings nas dbang du mdzad de// de nyid kyi thugs kar rab tu gzhag par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gnyis su med pa
37a3(rgyud): rabs byin gyis brlabs te/ sngags 'dis rang gi sems so sor rtogs pa mdzad do// oM Ne t+ta pra ti be d+hi ka ro ma// de'i rjes thigs nyid la sangs rgyas thams cad
37a4(rgyud): com ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku las chos kyi sku rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba sems rin po che nges par
37a5(rgyud): smos par mdzad do// de nyid sems 'od gsal ba// thugs rje chen pos khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid// gzung ba dang
37a6(rgyud): 'i rnyog pa spangs pa nam mkha' ltar gdod nas zhi ba/ de las thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas nas sems can gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzi
37a7(rgyud): mi shes pas rga ba dang / 'chi bas rnam par khyab pa'i 'jig rten la gzigs nas
37a8(rgyud): da pAd yA maM/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la de la ni ma gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gar sems 'od gsal 'ang yongs su rdzogs pa'i bla
37b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lta byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar rnam par gzhag go// legs par rnam par dgu pa'i nam mkha' lur dri ma med pa/ 
37b2(rgyud): khams cad 'angs pa ma ladu sa bar bdun par byas nas gnas twA/ byang mo kyi sems can pa la sngags 'di 'dzi // ma na seM'i drang / dmi mchogs
37b3(rgyud): rarnab pa sna tshogs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par phyung ngo // de byung nas kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du zhugs te/ shes bya'i dkyil 'khor sethams cad gsal bar byas
37b4(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse bsnyil te rab tu rtogs par byas nas gcig tu 'dras te/ rdo rje'i sku chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs par rjes su zhugs
37b5(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rab tu gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs so// oM tiSh+Tha
37b6(rgyud): sngags 'dis spros pa/ oM sbar badz+ra slar yang sngags 'das bsdus so// oM sa dahar badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes rdo rje'i snying po 'di che
37b7(rgyud): 'dod pa/ oM d+har badz+ra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa// maM sarba thAgrA ta dz+nyAn 'ang / de bzhin
37b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes pas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa
38a1(rgyud): pa nyid du nye bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gzigs nas sngags
38a2(rgyud): 'dris byin gyis brla' bar mdzad do// oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA swA hA a haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku sngams can thams cad kyi don ma
38a3(rgyud): pa'i rgyu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku bdag nyid sems can gyi khams thams cad du nges par bstan to// de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten spong ba rnams kyis mtho
38a4(rgyud): nas lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa zhes sgra bsgrags so// de nas tshangs pas gsol ba btab ste/ chos kyi 'khor
38a5(rgyud): lo rab tu bskor nas nga dang des 'dul ba'i skye bo btul te/ gang gis slar ldog pa med pa nyid du gyur te// 'di rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsgom pa'i rim pa'o// de nas
38a6(rgyud): 'acom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting nge ledzin de las bzhengs nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ba stan te sems can thams cad kyi don mdza po che bar bsgrubs nas de'i thug
38a7(rgyud): ka las rdo rje phyung ste nyid kyi phyag tu gzhag par gyur te// de nas 'od zer rnam par phyung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan
38a8(rgyud): ngas kyis thugs kar zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i skur byin gyis brlabs te mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rgyan thams ca
38b1(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa/ dar dang phreng bas dbang bskur ba// zla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis brlabs te rnam par gnas so// de nas thugs ka nas phyung nas zla ba'i da
38b2(rgyud): 'khor la brten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sna dang / rgyab dang drung du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje chos dang rdo rje rin chen dang rdo rje les la sogs pa
38b3(rgyud): ngachub sems dpa' chen po'i phreng bar rnam par gnas so// de bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang bdug pa la sogs pa'i lha khyad par du nges par bskyed ci
38b4(rgyud): gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang lcags kyu lngasags pa'i lha rnams bskyed de 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen
38b5(rgyud): chog gyur pa// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje snying po zhes su gsungs// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// 
38b6(rgyud): dbabs kyis ni so sor spras// de yi dbus su khri chen po// kung nas yongs su gru bzhi pa// de yi stang du pang chen po// ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa// de yi lte ba'i dbus
38b7(rgyud): su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni drung kun bu// sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi nye 'khor du// 'khor los bsku
38b8(rgyud): phyi yi gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras pa rnam par dgod// kha dog ser po gzi brjid che// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba// thams ca
39a1(rgyud): rnam pa sna chags kyan// btsun pa de dag dgod par bya// de skang pa rgyan gyi rgyung chen po las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la khang nas bcom ldan 'das
39a2(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad pa 'i slar yang chu'i lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// chos kyi 'khor
39a3(rgyud): 'dra bas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su brjod// de yi phyi rol gnyis pA laM// zlum pa ru ni rtogs par bya// ri mo mang po sna tshogs pas// sgo drang sgo khyud brtag par bya/ 
39a4(rgyud): tababs rnam pa sna tshogs pa// drar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// de yi dbus su pad chen po// shesar ldan ning rab mangs pa// 'da' ma brgyad kyi ka ba'i mdun// dkyil
39a5(rgyud): 'khor brgyad kyis 'irgyan pa'o// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rgyal ba thams cad dkar bar mchog/ khab pa zho ltar dkar gsal// shel dang zla ba lta bu'i 'od// kun du
39a6(rgyud): ba ltar dkar ba tan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod// thams cad zla ba ldang dkar zhing // 
39a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khar la gnas pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs zla ba 'dra// zla ba 'bar mtshungs mnyam med pa// chu yi ming zhes bya ba yi// rdo rje snying po rgyun gyi rgyud chen po las tra
39a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cha ga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag ba
39b1(rgyud): byas dkyimasas cad po chog byang ba// nga rdza la gas ga'i ya margyan// rnam ma rnas pa ya tsam su 'a zun su mam cad bya// sung ma dang / rje rnam pa mtshungs// 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs
39b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa'o// kha dog dmar po stobs po che// 'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'dra ba// rtag tu pad ma rA ga mtshungs// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// nyi ma'i kha dog stobs po che
39b3(rgyud): sum mdo'i snying gar gzhag par bya// bal po se'u'i me tog mtshungs// ya ba'i me tog dag dang 'dra// pad ma pad+ma ma rA ga mtshungs// sangs rgyas
39b4(rgyud): dpa' bo blang dgi 'bar// bzang po mtshal dang mtshungs 'dra ba// bya skyegs bcud dang 'dra bar gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// de bzhin sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras/ 
39b5(rgyud): tso bo dang ni mngag pa dag/ mkhas pa yis ni dgad par bya// de dag thams cad kha dog dmar// gzi brjid khams la khyod ldan pa// 'od zer dmar po rab 'phro ba// nyi ma'i
39b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus ston par// thams cad dmar po'i mtshan cha can// dmar po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ dmar po rigs kyis bslab pa'i lus// phreng ba dmar po mchog
39b7(rgyud): dzin pa// 'di ni gzi brjed gter zhes bya// dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba'o// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs s+ho// 
39b8(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos slar yang rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa// de nas yang dag bshad bya'o// dkyil 'kho chen po mchog kar pa/ 
40a1(rgyud): rlung gi khams dang 'dra bas na// rlung ka dkyil la ba shes su bsha// zla ba phyed pa 'arnam pa 'dra// dbyur gyi sprin gyi 'a dang man pa// ma N+Da
40a2(rgyud): dmas dbus su pa chen po// baiDUr+ya yi 'od dang 'dra// shin tu gnag pa'i mig sman mtshungs// sngon dmar gyi ni rnam par gan
40a3(rgyud): dme skye ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dpa'atshar ba 'bar ba// rgyal po lartsal ba 'bar ba'i gagi/ rtswa can mo nag mo la zung ginas// uta pal ston pa 'dab ma
40a4(rgyud): spong pa nam mkha' lta bur gnas// de yi nyel bar thams cadang // rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras rnams bri// khra ba rnams deng mngag pa dang // de bzhin phan po ga sa/ 
40a5(rgyud): sna tshogs rgyan gyis partan// de bzhin nag sa thags son gyi//  dog nas phyo bams cad// bya nArnam pa sna tshogs bsdums// gdugs na rnam pang ma
40a6(rgyud): dgi sna tshogs lags 'bar ba// bla ra rgyas pa mnyam pa ni// kha dog nag pa sna tshogs pa// dngos po kun gyi ring bzhin gyis// mngar bsdus nas ni bsgom par
40a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po 'dis bu// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes skyob pa// bris nas shes rab can gyis bsgom// gal te dngos grub rang 'dod na'o// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi
40a8(rgyud): cho ga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhus
40b1(rgyud): ldan 'das de rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kha na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bskyed du gsol/ 
40b2(rgyud): danas bcom ldan 'das po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pa de rnams kyis gsol ba bta' ba'i tshiganye bar dgasan nas/ sgrub pa'i babs kyi tshig mchog tu gsang ba chen po
40b3(rgyud): stsal pa// sreg sa sogs pas mchod bkus// yang dag mdang bsdus byas nas mA~M// sangs rgyal kun gyi su chen // baidag gis rtag tu bskam par bya// sngags kyi
40b4(rgyud): ling dag ldan// 'dod pa ster ba'i sku ru thA// sgra dang gzugs dang de bezhin sbya// yi ge'i phreng bar bzhin te// bla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sngags pas bam
40b5(rgyud): cad rnam par bsam// hUM sngags pas snying gar son pa bsgom// gsang stogs dge ba brjod nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// dung gi sgra ru rab tu brjod
40b6(rgyud): la sgra ni rabakrus pa'o// rlu ma rdo lce 'byor dbang phyug// sa min rten gyi zla gas// sa mu sgyu grog// du dzin chen dbyung phyul gis// smye dru bzhin klu shA
40b7(rgyud): rnams gsung // nor bu las kyi rigs kyi yang // rnga tshani sgra ru rab tu bshad// po wang gling bu de bzhin gru// gar gyi rgyan gyi sgra dang mi
40b8(rgyud): rab tu bshad// rtog pa kun la rnam par sbyar// sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las rnams dang // bcas gzugs kyi bzlas pa mchog/ ga mje bzhin rab tu bshad// dgug
41a1(rgyud): gzhug dang bcing ba dang // lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste// de la rang gi tshu la rab sbyar// sngags dang phyag rgya rab tu sbar// de rjes rnam pa kun gyi mchog
41a2(rgyud): ga tu lus chen bsam bya bsam// lha ye sku gzugs bskam par bya// lag pa'i phyag rgya bo nges pa'i// phyag rgya'ang snying gung lon zhes bya/ rang gi rigs
41a3(rgyud): de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing // sgron ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba'i khyim// de ltar kun nas thams cad du// kun nas ba spu'i rtse dag nas// 'od zer 'bar ba'i phrang
41a4(rgyud): dag pas// gzugs kyi bzlas pazhes su bshad// de nas sor ba'i bzlas pa ni// gsang sngags sgrub pas brtsam par bya// mched dang byin brlabs dbang ba
41a5(rgyud): spro lnga sogs rim thams cad du// sbyor ba'i bzlas pa gtso bo 'di// 'bad pa yis ni rab tu bshad// snying ga mgrin pa maN+Da lce min// rkan dang skye bo nyid ma
41a6(rgyud): nang min phyi dang gnyis par min// chos ni 'ba' zhig kho na lnga// bzlas pa'i sgra yang 'byung ma yin// 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byorache// shes rab pha rol byan
41a7(rgyud): gsal ba// bsgom pa'i bsngags pa de nyid ni// rnal 'byor pa yi gnas su bshad// de nas stong du mdor bsdus te// snying ga'i dkyil 'khor rab zlum pa// zla ba
41a8(rgyud): nga ba ltar bsam bya// dri ma med cing legs par gnas// de la yi ge rnam par dgod// tshig gi phreng ba ma chad pa// mu tig phreng ba ltar smras pa/ 
41b1(rgyud): da'i 'od// dacha thams cad gsal bar byed// lha yi lus ni snang byad cing // ji lta ji ltar yi ge'i phreng // mchog ga lus la rab 'jug pa// de lta de ltar sngags kyi lus/ 
41b2(rgyud): dag nyid nyid du 'gyur// mthu skabs lha dbang thams cad ni// tshangs pa khyab 'jug las char lhag/ bzlas pa de nyid mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsdogs pa
41b3(rgyud): ltar sems ni bsgom pa yis// de ltar dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las bzlas pa'i de kho na nyid kyi le'u'o// de nas bcom ldan 'ad/ 
41b4(rgyud): ngarnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa rin po che bka' stsal pa// mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can
41b5(rgyud): gas rje'i bdag nyid 'gri ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad smin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog
41b6(rgyud): yon tan shin tu phra ba'i tshe la 'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yid ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams
41b7(rgyud): mas can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsal// rtag tu dri ma med pa thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gog pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ 
41b8(rgyud): pa dang grub rab tu batshan mi mapa lams pa// thugs rdo chen pa'i bajig nyid tag kyi rnam par snang// char ma kyang 'dzi gal ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi// ba par ga
42a1(rgyud): ba'i go 'phang dam pa brjes gyur kyang / khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog sul mdzad pa yi// thugs 'aspyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yang ma
42a2(rgyud): 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog spyan rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub
42a3(rgyud): mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med pa rab mkhyen pos// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la gsol// 'di de sangs rgyas thar
42a4(rgyud): cad kyi/ yang dag yon tan rgyas pa sa// lan cig tsam zhig brjod pas kyang // gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ 
42a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs de kun bstod na// rab yangs dngos grub stsal 'gyur te// bskal par gnas shing bskal par bskul// lus ni g.yo ba med pa ru// 
42a6(rgyud): brtan par byas pa yis// mgon po chen po rnam snang mdzad// mi bskyod ran chen 'byung gnas dang // rgyal ba dag pa 'od dpag meng // don grub rgyal po thams cad
42a7(rgyud): dngul chu bcung ldan da nyid dang // mchog kyang rab tu gsol bar byed// dngos grub yid 'ong ma lus pa// rgyas pa'i don du phun sum chags// re ba thams ca
42a8(rgyud): yongs rdzogs pa// yid la 'dod pa ster bar byad// ye shes che dang stobs dang shugs// mchog tu dge ba gsol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
42b1(rgyud): bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa
42b2(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ chos grangs med cing rgyu skar med// smyud par gnas pa'i chog med/ ji ltar ba shad pa tshogs bslab pa'i gnas nye bar gnas bzung ste gang yang rung ba'i
42b3(rgyud): yid dga' bar ji ltar rung ba'i dkyil 'khor byas te kho me tog sil ma bkram la bdug spos kyis bdugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ji ltar rus pa'im
42b4(rgyud): la sogs pa'i na tshad pa rnams kyis mchod par byas te/ sngags 'dis yid kyis kyang sdig pa bshags te/ oM sar+b+ba pA pA ta kA yi kA bA tsi ka ma na sang b+ha tA na rA ga dA
42b5(rgyud): mo hA mad mA na d+hi Sh+Tha ma mA kra tra~M tan tre kA le kai hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT sar+b+ba pa pI snroT yA mi s+yAh+na/ oM sarba pA 'i pra tid sha yu ma sa hU~M/ de'i rdzas thogs la bdag nyid kyi
42b6(rgyud): dbral bar bya ste/ I sarba ti thA ga tA nIn Atamo b+hI 'o nir yA ta yA mi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga taHpra ti gr-ih+Na tu mI swAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams la
42b7(rgyud): rjes su yi rang ba ni/ oM sarba ta bA ga ti pA N+ya dz+nyA na sa~M b+hA ra Na a nu mo da yA mi swA hA/ yang dang yang du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags kyis bya
42b8(rgyud): ste/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa man ta b+ha dra ma hA badz+ra si ma li ma hA bo d+hi tsat+ne uta pA da yA mi swA hA/ man ser mo rtsin ta pe ta/ de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs
43a1(rgyud): zla ba'i kha dog can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug nar bu rin pa che chen
43a2(rgyud): byung ba ma mang+ge'i skye ga tu sas par rgya/  / skyegs 'dis bdag yongs su dag par b+h+yas/ sa ba kA d+hu sar+b+ba k+Shak+Sha
43a3(rgyud): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par bdag nyid
43a4(rgyud): su shing gas sa gangs pa \u0f7f/ na du smras sa da sangs rgyas dad/ 
43a5(rgyud): le bskyed la bdage skye dgu ma lus pa'i dpung gnyen du byas la/ chos kyi dbyings yangs pa 'od gsal bar lhag par gnas par bya ste nye bar rgyas par thun martsams
43a6(rgyud): nga pogs pa 'am pa / thun ma mas kyis sa ngas pa migs nas sugan mi pa'i ying kyis ma thag pa ma ra chi
43b1(rgyud): cad kyis mchod pa byas nas cho 'phrul gyi zla ba 'ams ga nya gang ba la mar tha mar ma stong phrag brgyad sbar la rnga rjeskyil krung gis gnas te snang ma'i me tog gam me rtog par
43b2(rgyud): mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mchod rten la mchong dang srid 'brugs sgra spags pa mthas pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sra bdas
43b3(rgyud): gsal bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// de nas sreg thugs 'bum phrag cig dgang bar byas pas mtshan ma thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ro// bye ba phrag bzhi bzlas pas dbang phyu
43b4(rgyud): chen po la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa chen po byed par 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang po'i tshad kyis de bzhin gshegs
43b5(rgyud): mchod rten byas la mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag re re bzlas pa 'am/ yang na dri'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'bum lhag pa'i bye ba phrag bdun bzlas so// bde bar gshegs pa'i mthog
43b6(rgyud): tshad kyi mchod don rnam ri mar rang mi bye 'khrug bdun zlas pa rdugs pa srid du tha'o/ ma ma yid mchod rten 'bar ba'i 'angangs sgrub pa'i lus la zhugs byas brgya byis
43b7(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs nas ji srid dag pa'i gnas kyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams me tog gi char 'bebs par 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lha dang kwang
43b8(rgyud): dod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa 'ongs nas kyang bstod par byed cing ji srid aH
44a1(rgyud): mas skam par DU // ye dgas rnams kyang skye sa sugs snga las ma pa rnam sa sngag pasngal ba rnams byas sems ma/ 
44a2(rgyud): la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par gzigs par 'gyur ro// de'i rjes la lus deng ba gser gyi mdog lta bu dang / 
44a3(rgyud): gnyis kyi rnam pa can dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes thob pa dang / kha dog dang / tshe dang stobs dang shugs dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 
44a4(rgyud): rten gyi khams su rgyu ba dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar che ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod cing steng du 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por
44a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba dang / 
44a6(rgyud): bum bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba dang / phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
44a7(rgyud): la mchod pa chen po'i srin gyis legs par mchod cing grub pa thams cad 'od kyis lhung bar 'gyur ro// bad+mo byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba'i snyan phyed ster bar 'a
44a8(rgyud): gzi brjid dang gzugs dang dpa' bas rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad zil gyis gnod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yang so sor thob par 'gyur ro// 
44b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'dul ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// phyi ma'i mab men byim gyil brlabs che/ sangs mas thams cad bskyed pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
44b2(rgyud): dbri bya ba nges par sman par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i sprin thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ba// byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal
44b3(rgyud): dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// / sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
44b4(rgyud): cad mchod par byas te/ 'gi wang ngam ldong ros pad ma'i snod du gzhag le ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sems can thams cad dang
44b5(rgyud): du 'gyur ba dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa thams cad ledzin par 'gyur ba nyid do// rig pa 'dzin par gyur nas nyi ma snang shor ba'i kha dog dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par sgra
44b6(rgyud): me 'khyil ba dang / gdu gu dang ldan mi cu'i bum bya ba phrag dums yangs su na rig pa de 'i 'grub pa rnams cadan kyis mngasas bskor ba dang / byas su
44b7(rgyud): po'i mo bar gnas pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// rim pa 'dis rtsa gsum bsgrubs na dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ro// mchod phyir
44b8(rgyud): sa bsgrubs na tshangs par 'gyur ro// 'khor los khyab 'jug tu 'gyur ro// grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa gzung ste sa bsrungs kyi bu byas la de la zhon te bzlas na dbang
45a1(rgyud): gis brdzun ma bzungs/ ngas de'i longs spyod la spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rim pa 'dis dngu le rgyu 'am bcud lan gang bsgrubs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal tam/ 
45a2(rgyud): grub na de'i cha sgrub pa lan bdun bya'o// 'dun byas pas ci nas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes de 'anan thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bas bka' stsal pa// 'bum phrag
45a3(rgyud): gsum bzlas pas ri ldan pa'i tshad tsam gyi ri bo lang hUM zhes brjod pas ltung ba dang / rgya mtsho skems pa dang / ldan pa drungs nas 'byin pa dang / bum pa nam mkha' la 'phen
45a4(rgyud): glang po che rengs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi sde mngon par 'joms par byed pa dang / bar snang na gnas pa thams cad ltung bar byed do// sems can thams cad
45a5(rgyud): 'bebs par byed do// sgrub pa po las gang dang gang sgrub par 'dod pa de dang de thams cad byang ngo // yang zla ba gcig tsam mi sme bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
45a6(rgyud): bdag nyid bsgoms na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// sgyu 'phrul dra ba thams cad spen par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la gnas shing 'chag par byed do// 
45a7(rgyud): ba dang glag 'gyur ba la sogs pa smon par byed do// gcig tu gyur nas med par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyis khams stong phrag kyang g.yo bar byed de// sgrub pa pas bye
45b1(rgyud): dun bzlas nas 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// rim pa 'dis lhung bzed dang / chos gas dang / snam sbyar dang / mkhar sel las dang yang rung ba bzung nas ji srid dag pa
45b2(rgyud): dzin par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / sprul padu ma byed pa dang / 'dod na 'chi ba dang / skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams
45b3(rgyud): thams cad du 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyinye par gnas par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang byed do// sgrub pa'i thabs
45b4(rgyud): gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtha'i tshad kyi mchod rten 'bum phrag gcig byas te rma med pa'i ral gri blangs la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis ma
45b5(rgyud): na pa'am sa stsas na g+sa / ma sa pan ma da la du rnams kyi sgyu sa
45b6(rgyud): nga nas me tog kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// lhan cig pa ji snyed pa dang bcas pa steng du 'gro'o// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rdul ba
45b7(rgyud): chen por 'gyur ro// ral gri'i rig pa'i dren pa chen pa'i la las spang ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'amazhugs dang rgyan 'chang ba'ad ngad dgu zhub dang skad cig nam gyis 'jig tan gyi
45b8(rgyud): thams cad du rnam par myong ba dang / ma shi med pa dang ni ma re re zhing se sa rgyas kyi 'jig nyid che ba mthong ba
46a1(rgyud): pa'i char 'babs pa dang / bskal pa chen pa stong phrag tu 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa 'thabs gzhan yang 'khar lo 'am 'bris blangs te 'bum phrag nyi
46a2(rgyud): 'azlas pa yongs su rdzogs par dang pa la mi sangs/ ma pa maman ma khal btags pa sam drug ga cag grags thugs bya'o// l+h+wa ma yin gyi 'phrul la
46a3(rgyud): cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad 'ang bar 'gyur ro// gal te ma grub na 'bum phrag gnyis sam gsum du srogs blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams
46a4(rgyud): cad bsregs bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs nas kyang sgrub pa po la zhu bar byed de/ kyai skyes bu dpa' bo 'dug tu gsol zhes smra'o// de nas grogs dang bcas pa 'jug
46a5(rgyud): bya'o// ral gri'am 'khor lo de gzung nas lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// sa 'ag gi rdzas rnams kyi mnga' bdag lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad kyi bdag po/ 
46a6(rgyud): gsang sngags grub pa gzhan thams cad dang lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi dbang phyugs 'ag thams cad kyi bdag po// lha ma yin chen por sprul pa byung ba po bsal pa
46a7(rgyud): chen por gnas pa/ khyab 'jug gi 'khar lo hUM zhes bya ba brjod pa tsam gyis brlag par byed pa/ khyab 'jug kyang hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis brlag par byed na/ gzhan lnga smos
46a8(rgyud): nga ci dgos// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang / bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'bum phrag sum cu byas te mched rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad pazla bar bya/ 
46b1(rgyud): thams cad la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mtshang la tha mar me tog can gyi lcags las byung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa mtho gang tsam pa gzung nas cho 'phrul gyi zla ba byed pa la skye
46b2(rgyud): ma krung bcings te/ ji srid 'bad pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de blangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor las skrang bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad
46b3(rgyud): mnga' bdag dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha thams cad 'dul bar byed pa/ bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag de gu bcu rtsa dgur 'tsho ba dang ra 'jig rten gyi khams stong rje

46b6(rgyud): nyid thams cad dang ldan par blangs la khrus byas nas nye bar mkhro ba thams cad kyis mchud de ji srid ma langs pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// langs nas dngul chu dang
46b7(rgyud): bcud len dang mi snang ba la sogs pa thams cadangal sbar bar byed do// gal te mi sbyar na'i srid kha las lcem phyung ba srid du'i bla bar bya'o// de nas mtshan rnon pas deb

47a1(rgyud): phrag drug cu 'tshab sangs rgyas kyi zhib thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / ri bo phur po bye ba phrag stong sprul pa dang glang stong phrag 'phan pa dang / rnamachas

47b7(rgyud): hr-id tsam pa'i mchid rten 'bum tsam byas te/ gang yang rung bar grangs mi gzung bar ji srid bdag yongs su dag par mthong ba srid du bzlas par bya'o// de'i rjes su mang gas
47b8(rgyud): kyis sngags pa'i pad ma 'bum dang snga ma'i me tog 'bum phrag gsum dang / a ka ru ri li shing 'bum dang / tsan dan gyi yi shing 'bum phrag gsum dang / til dang 'bras 'bum
48a1(rgyud): bzhi dang / zho ban 'bum dang / mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag gsum dang / sman thams cad pa'i sreg zugs 'bum phrag gcig rgyal ma sbyin sreg yongs su
48a2(rgyud): bya'o// 'brar nas kyang rig pa 'dzin pa gi/ non nu gdong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sba li zheng 'khyil pa dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par rkyen thams cad kyis brgyan po phyogs bcu

48a5(rgyud): kyi sems can bskor nas slar de nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mngon par rdzogs par byas te lus de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang nga
48a6(rgyud): papar rdzogs pa'i byang chub par mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sgrub thabs kyi le'u la bris sku dang shing l+h+wam dang / mu tig gi phreng ba yang yid

48b1(rgyud): bya'o// yos su rdzogs pa dang / me tog can gyi lcags sam/ lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje rtsam lnga pa sor bcu'i tshad dam 'de bar gshegs pa'i mtho tshod ca mtsho 'phrul gyi bla
48b2(rgyud): la mtshan thogs thag lag pas rdo rje dag zung nas mdun du khri'i srang du lag pa bka' la ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa srid du bzla bar bya'o// dgazung nas rdo rje'i reg pa 'dzin pa la
48b3(rgyud): skur 'a chen po nyi ma bya ba brgya phrag dang rjes su 'tsham pa rdo rje 'chang ba ltar gzi brjid dang ldan zhing 'od gsal bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu zhing dbang phyug cha
48b4(rgyud): la sogs pa'i lha rnams la ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur/ lha ma yin rnams sgrub pa dang / srin po rnams 'joms pa dang / sems can thams cad de'i tse bsgre ba byed pa de 'gyur
48b5(rgyud): rabacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khar los skur ba chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las de bzhin gshegs batham
48b6(rgyud): cad kyi rdzas kyi sa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u yongs su rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang ting nge 'dzin lam
48b7(rgyud): par gzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
48b8(rgyud): gsang ba chen po kak+Sha sbyar ba ste/ mtha' yas pa kha sbyar ba zhes bya ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen
49a1(rgyud): gsang sngags kyis kak+Sha ma dka' stsal ba// danas yang dga' sharang bya ba// sangs rgyas kun byangs su byab// gsang sngags kak+Sha s+phar nas bya// gsang chan
49a2(rgyud): rmad du byung // grub ni pal tshad mangs pa// kun nas yongs su ba'ang nyi nga// dmas pa ni dra zhedas pa// mdor bsdus nas ni sngags pas bya// dang pa'i brang ba byung gnyi
49a3(rgyud): oM migs blo gas ldadru pas dgod// gsogs lhag ma'i mig la// sngags pas mad bsdus// / sbyang ba ji bzhin mi gsun// ma bzhin du dgod par/ 
49a4(rgyud): mig stong pa dag la ni// k+Sha leg dang ni rdo rje bri// rim pa 'di dag bkod nas ni// rang sde'i 'og tu 'brar 'i mchog/ dang po dbyangs la de'i rjes su// yi ge phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa
49a5(rgyud): tsaT ta pa ya sha/ dag cing chu yi dkyil 'khor ldan// 'di rnams myur du 'grub par byed// pad ma'i rigs kyi lha nyid do// don kun grub par yang dag ldan// me yi dkyil 'khor
49a6(rgyud): srabashad// 'bar ba'i ma dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// khatsha' ba pha ra She/ dbang rkyen gyi ni dkyil 'khor ldan// gadzan dpa las// dngos grub kun byed rlung gzugs ldan// dbya
49a7(rgyud): smin ltar shin du 'jigs// b+ha\u0f88\u0f90r+thad+ha thA wa ha// srang 'gres dngos grub byeng por brjod// slar yang bte Na nA ma// chos kun dbang du byed pa mchog/ thog ma'i dbyangs yig gang yin
49a8(rgyud): de ni de bzhin gshegs stabs bcwa// khyad par yan lag bcu gnyis bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bcu gnyis/ ma ning yi ge bzhi po spong // ri r-I li kI zhes bya ba/ 
49b1(rgyud): byas dang nade bzhin stabs// de dag yi ge ru yang bshad// dbang tu byed pa'i sna tshan ldan// thig le sgrag d+hag zla phyung nas// rdzas dbyas kyin phrad nas bshad// sangs rgyas
49b2(rgyud): byangs pas ma// ma ger brjod pa de bzhin zhing // gsal byed ces kyis gsal ba'o// de bzhin ya ras la rung // ma dang shAng can tu dgaste// 'thung ba chen po khams rnams pa
49b3(rgyud): ma bdud rtse'i bcud ces bshad// mnyam dang ma mnyam cha dbye bas// thams cad nyid kyi lam shes bya// phyag rgya dang ni dkyil 'khor sngags// ting 'dzin mdor bsdus bshad
49b4(rgyud): teg sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chos rnams kun gyi sdom du brjod// song ba mtshan med sman med pa// rnam par thar pa gsum du be shad // phung po khams dang skye mched nam
49b5(rgyud): sa pa yis ni shes par bya// da ni sngags kyi 'i sbyi ba la// ragaN+Da btus bsgyur ba ding bral ba 'i shad par bya'o// yi ga rnams kyis byang chub stod// sangs rgyas te
49b6(rgyud): na'adas// lhan cheg nyid du sbyar bar bya// dbyangs rnams yig rnams bsdus par bshad// mtshan nyid kyang ni rab bshad b+ha// dbyangs ni bya chu pa gzums nyid de// gzhan da
49b7(rgyud): snur bar bya// de la ngas par sangs rgyas nyid// ser pa nyid du legs bIr bshad// thog mang sangs rgyas rnams cad kyi// gsang sngags dri ma med pa 'byung /

50b1(rgyud): kun gyen de bzhin nyid// gang bsgrags de nyid thams cad du// 'bar ba ma yis blon ldan// spyod pa yi na stad du gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor na// rin chen 'byang
50b2(rgyud): zhes pa gad / sa rnams kun gyi byed pa ni// med pa nyid du'ang bshad pa mo// maM yis yi yang dgaldan// na pa 'dabyangs kyis skye ba // mnan baN+Dal ba 'od pa
50b3(rgyud): sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa kun// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// don yod pa yi snying por grags// sde lnga pa yi gzhi pa ni// dngos
50b4(rgyud): dngos med reb rtogs byed// 'ber ba me yi sa bon gyis// 'khor lo'i dbus su rab tu gnas// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// theg le sgra yis rnam par spras/ 2
50b5(rgyud): pos sgyur ba ye shes che// rnam par rgyas pa'i nor sder byed// gang zheg sde lnga pa yi mtha'// sgyu ma'i chos la rab tu gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// gdugs dkar zhes
50b6(rgyud): su bshad pa'o// brgyad pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// spyi bor thig le mnan pa'o// 'dzab pa'i dbyangs
50b7(rgyud): dang ye shes che// mA ma kA ru de bsgrags so// lnga pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'jam pa'i dpal zhes rab tu grags// spyod pa'i gar mkhan rab rtogs ming // sdig pa thams
50b8(rgyud): darengs byed de// sdig kun rnam par sbyong byed pa// rnam par sel ba rnam shes bya// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs chan dang // gshin rje mthar byed khrab
51a1(rgyud): yi ge gsum ni stobs chen po// thog mar dgu pa yi ni dbyangs// de yi dbus su spyod pa gzhag/ tha mar sna tshogs zhes bya sbar// sku gsum du ni rnam par bskum
51a2(rgyud): ba rgya'i sde tshan gsum pa ni// gang yin kun du bzang por bshad// sde chen dang po'i gsum pa'o// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba'o// de ni bcom ldan mgon pa'o// nam ma
51a3(rgyud): dzod ces rab tu grags// rdo rje khro bsebs po che// de nyid rab tu grags pa'o// 'di kun thams cad stong pa so// sku ni rab tu spangs pa'o// dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan/

51b3(rgyud): 'dzad pa'o// sgyu mo'i cho sa la rab gnas nas// bsrod po'i don du rab gsol byed// mA ma ke zhes bya ba'i meng // rig pa mchog tu gsang pa ste// rgyu mi dmigs pa'i chos

51b5(rgyud): gdug sems gzhan kun lta ci smras// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyar byas pa// rang gi sa bon gnas shing 'phro// 'gro ba thams cad skrod byed na// gdug sems can gzhan
51b6(rgyud): dgos// de nyid me dang ldan pas ni// dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams dang // bgegs dang dgra rnams zhi ba ni// khyad par mi g.yo ba yis byed// don dam bden pa'i byin
51b7(rgyud): rlabs// rnam snang mdzad bya gnas las 'byung // gzhan gyi dmag dpung 'joms pa ni// rgyu ni ma yis gsal byas pa// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// theg le
51b8(rgyud): pos rnam par brgyan// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis drangs pas// ti se man dA ra la sogs// de yi phye bar rlog par nges// rdo rje lag
52a1(rgyud): 'khor lo yi// dbus gnas 'gro kun rengs par byed// gnas nas bskyod par byed pa yis// 'byung po rnams ni dbang du byed// rtag pa'i gzugs su gnas
52a2(rgyud): / mi g.yo ba yi skang gar son// chos kyi dbyings mtshungs thob nas ni// bdag gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya// rlung gi sa bon rin po che// spyod pa'i steng du yang dag ldan// 
52a3(rgyud): las byung ba med la gnas// 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par byed// sde tshan dang po'i dang pa gang // sa ya~M yi ge steng du gnas// sde tshan lnga pa'i tham no// drug pa'i sgra
52a4(rgyud): ngadu gnas// 'og tu me yis bon ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su te// sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar byed//

52b3(rgyud): legs par bsgrags pa/ nam mkha'i mdzod kun nas rdo rje rgya che ba tshangs pa chen po'i sgra yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi 'khor la

53a5(rgyud): rnams// mgrin par son nas sgra gyur te// srin dbyings nyid lhag pa'o// slar yang lce ru son pa dang // the ga mchog tu dge ba'o// lce yi yi ge cher 'bar ga/ gni kau nas

53a8(rgyud): yang na lha ni gzhan pa yi// ngag gi sgrub thabs chen po mchog/ rang khyed rje'i rang bzhin 'asam// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yang /

54b1(rgyud): ban+dan ces bya ba las dgrag sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gra shegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das

55b1(rgyud): de yang 'khor lo 'dzin rngam po// mkhor los sbyar ba legs 'bar ba// de la de bzhin rin chen bdun// 'khor lo 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gam

55b3(rgyud): de yi phyag rgya rtag tu bas pa// nam mkha'i rnam par legs par gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa// 'od zer phreng bas rnam par khyab// de dang bdag nyid rdo rje rab

55b6(rgyud): an pa la kA t+ti muN+Di ti ting dashi dz+wa la dz+wa la d+haka d+ha ka/ da ra da / bi ThA She b+h+yad+hu b+hA pha paT swAhA/ rtse ba'i sngags so// oM ti d+ha shes hA/ snying ba'o// yi la te dzo na
55b7(rgyud): swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// dag pa'i sngags tshig 'di rnams kyis// nyi ma'i ye shes rab tu gas la// kun du 'gri ba bsgrub par bya// rig pa 'dzid pa nyid thob 'gyur// gzi brjed pung
55b8(rgyud): kaseng sngags kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// kun nas snang ba zhes bya mchog/ yi ge gsum pa stobs po che// gsar kye ba'i dog legs 'bar zhing // gtsug tor stongaso na 'od gsal pa/ 
56a1(rgyud): sngags pa rang bdag gis bsgom bya// kun nas snang ba lta bur 'gyur// oM A hUM gsang sngags rtse mo dam pa 'di// sgob pa tsam gyis thams cad du// brtan pa dang na
56a2(rgyud): ba yi// 'gro kun kun nas snang bar 'gyur// kun nas snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thangs so// chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya // legs par mnyam par gzhag pa
56a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun nyid kun gyi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor la rib bskor byed// 'khor lo 'di ni rtsibs bcu gnyis// rtsibs bcu gnyis pa yongs su gnas// rnam gsum gsum na/ 
56a4(rgyud): yongs 'askor ba// phyi ba'i don du dag pa ster// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// nam mkha'i khrugs na gnas pa ste// chos kyi dbyings ni khyab pa ni// legs par mnyam
56a5(rgyud): bdag pas bsgom// 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba ni// 'di kun rten cing
56a6(rgyud): oM d+hun pA tA ya ts+tsha swas kyeN/ badz+re Ni thaMgs sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis med 'char// skad cig rgyas gyis thams cad du// dam pa
56a7(rgyud): rab skor byed// chos kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thab so// / pad ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// sangs rgyas sku gzugs legs 'bar ba// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog bsgrubs na// 
56a8(rgyud): 'dra 'ar 'gyur// snying gnas rdo rje gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de yi skyed la rdo rje me// dri ma med pa skyes par 'gyur/ 
56b1(rgyud): /  las rgya 'ang bya// 'dod pazhin rdzogs pa na// bad pa gas pa ra// sngags / oMHshAm gan myul/ 'don nyan
56b2(rgyud): khi le gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas rang bzhin stobs po ci// bdud bzhi las ni rnam rgyal ba// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bskum// bden pa bzhi yi wa tshur che// lus
56b3(rgyud): dag de zhin meng // lar+g+ha sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gnyis med skye ba'i mtshan nyid de// dadza'i dbus su bsgom par bya// dang nyid sang+yas rgyas yin nanas// brtan da
56b4(rgyud): 'gro 'a ni// 'di dag nyams cad ma skyes par// rdo rje khu tshur bsgoman no// rdo rje khu tshur 'dra bar 'gyur// de la sngags su gyur pa ni// oM be ye haHde bzhin gshegs pa la
56b5(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyen gsal ba// sngags pas drug tu bsgoms na ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thag/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
56b6(rgyud): dngos po thams cad gyon 'phags pa/ gad donas ni zhing mtshan nyid med// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su'o// rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgo
56b7(rgyud): 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis// 'di yis 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du de// 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad du// kun nas phun sum chags pa kun// 
57a1(rgyud): nas gus pas sbyin par bya// sngags ni/ oM nga la dz+wa la de pya dI pya u dag to/ ga d+hu na d+hA na hUM/ steng 'gro'i gtsug tor zhes bya bar// sangs rgyas dpa' bo kun gyis
57a2(rgyud): gsungs// 'ad ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' myed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tir gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// // sangs
57a3(rgyud): rang bzhin phyag rgya/ legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom// tshad skyob gdugs dkar chen po ni// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
57a4(rgyud): gnas par// zla ba'i kha dog cher 'bar zhing // chu yi dkyil 'khor rnam dgra po// dri med pud da ri kar gnas// ri mo bdun gyis yongs su gang // bcud kyis len gyis mtsha
57a5(rgyud): // sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'di yi sbyor ba yis// sems can rnams la thams cad du// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// 'di ni gtsug tu
57a6(rgyud): gdugs dkar che// sngags ni oM ma ma ma ma hUM ni/ 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ne// ye shes tshe dang stobs mgyogs 'gro/ dpa' bo thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas te/ 
57a7(rgyud): rnyed dka' min// gedugs dkar po'i sgrub pa'i babs so// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ne// 'bar ba'i phreng la thugs ral gro ni// sngags pas snying gar bsgom pa
57a8(rgyud): dge bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin chen pos// nam mkha'i mthings rnams yongs gang ba// bdag nyid gnyis mad dza ba yis// rnal 'byor gci
57b1(rgyud): slob par bya// sngags kyi la ga 'khor mche// 'bang ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// sngags pas snying gar bsgom par bya// rgyal bdam pa nyid du 'gyur// sngags na a dz+wa la la k+sha 'jal dz+wal ban
57b2(rgyud): dpangs du ma du med ha da ha na hU~M// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor ral gre tshe// shes rab la shes dri ma med// sngags pas kun nas bsgoms nas ni// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'dra bar 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i gtsug to
57b3(rgyud): srab pa'i thibs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin su// 'brang ba'i phreng bas krugs pa'i 'ang// seng ge'i khre yi snyeng du bsam// ya na rje'i gdan la gnas// kun du gtsug tor che 'bar ba// skyes
57b4(rgyud): ngas su bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// yi ge dam pa yi ni gnas// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// chos kyi sku ni mchog tu che// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// kun tu gtsug tor stobs
57b5(rgyud): srid cig de la zlab 'gyur te// de rje sangs rgyas kun gyi bka sbyin no// sngags maM badra ban d+ha hU~M/ gsang sngags 'di ni dam pa mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bsrung byas// d+hak+Shanas
57b6(rgyud): byas pa // dan can byed m+b+ha s+ho/  kyi khyod kyi sa pa'i sa so//  da can sa bya rgya chen po las dazhin ga shegs pa
57b7(rgyud): sa rgyas pa'i sa par skyeb yongs so rdzogs so// dadas pa ma ldan nas de bzhin gshegs rnams pams sa sang yang 'dus smra gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das do man
57b8(rgyud): lags pa bta pa/ sa ma ldan das byang chub sems dpa' mas thams pad dkyigs sngags kyi sgrub pa'i gtus pa paka' sngal dugasoso// denas ma ldan mes da ni mi byer bye pa
58a1(rgyud): yapa shA phyugag gis lagasad N+DI klu nas/  la sbyid pa lta mas/  ched ni sel 'as
58a2(rgyud): na soga'i brjed ce// 'bum pa da ci 'i drug/ sangs rgyas ku bdas shes rab mchog rten mangs thams cad 'dabar byed// dang kun 'din 'an pa 'o// kun du 'gro ba'i dam pa'i don
58a3(rgyud): lce me mchog tu gas pa 'o// reg pa mchog se bdag nyid 'de// na bajug pa la phyag drug satsug sa / rdzuna'i de \u0f7fde na sa myor pa yes// phyag drug dpa la slobs po
58a4(rgyud): ga di yangan stobs kyis kyang // dud nas yongs su gsal ba po// gzugs sa ches skye ban pa'i khrums narnam par gnas/ pa na phyag gnyis sa par bya// ting nge 'dzidakar
58a5(rgyud): sdig pa bcom// dpa' bo bdam la gnas pa// zla ba'i mdog can 'od po na la 'byor pa yi ye shes phra// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'bar// gdon narnam ma skyes pa zhes pasam// sangs rgyas rnams
58a6(rgyud): kyi ye shes mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// de'i sngags ni oM pA kye de na ma gas sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsang // nagasang chen gyi ni dam par bzhed// rnam thar gsum gyi sgrol
58a7(rgyud): pha rol phyen drugang btugs la// rang nyid shes rab yin nogs ga sngags pas tug su mapa bya/ napa 'jug der ba 'asgyur stenasas rgya mazhin ni ral 'byor las// pad ma drug su bu ma
58b1(rgyud): shug thams cadadu sadun dganas// kun gyi rgyal po sngags pa nyid// rang nyid kun gyi rgyal po bachungs// reg pa'i tshed pa thams cad dang // byang chub kun gyi pha la sa ma// dbang phyug sun dang mang+ge
58b2(rgyud): chos rnams kun gyi yon tan mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang // yang na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// kun du 'gro 'tho 'byung na// dngos grub gnan sa smos ca gos// dngub chu bcud len de nyid du
58b3(rgyud): ta pas spyod pa dri med mchog/ ril bu dang ni me snang ba// thams cad du ni ster bar 'gyur// dpal ldan 'jam pa'i mchog 'di ni// chos kyi gsung gi mchog las 'khrungs// sangs rgyas rnams
58b4(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs// 'jam pa'i dbyangs nas rab tu grags// 'di ni bsgrubs ba tsam gyis no// bsams pa'i phun sum tshogs kun gyi// sangs rgyas kun du btan 'gron// gzhan pa'i wa g+ha spos ci dgos// 
58b5(rgyud): 'dam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// snying gar pad mtshan po la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gnasa'ajig rten dbang phyug dpa' tshache// thugs rje chen po'i thugs ldan pa/ 
58b6(rgyud): bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ dung dang kun nga zla ltar dag/ chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung // chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po la// bdag nyid
58b7(rgyud): nga bzhin gyis ni 'di kun dka/ gdod nas ma skyes mthung ba// gsang sngag
59a1(rgyud): / ye/  'bang ba 'phreng bas 'asregs shing ni// ram pa dzin tugs 'dzin pa po// ral pa'i dbus su dbar ba ca// 'od dpag med pa ldan pa'i bdag/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bur gsal// kun du
59a2(rgyud): nam mkha' yongs gang ga/ gsang sngags stong bdag bsgom par bya// rang nyid 'jig rten gsus rnam rgyal// chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa// pad ma'i lus kyis yang dag gang // kun du padas
59a3(rgyud): dmas la ni//  ba'i dkyil lakhor yang dag gnas// 'ams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i gru// khyad bar du bdag dag bar bya// 'gro ba brtan dang gsol kun// snang dang pe snang dngas pa ni// yang dang
59a4(rgyud): lta bar bya// gdu 'byam lus sems la ni// stobs po chos de dgang bar bya// kha dog dbyings ni 'di bzhin du// sna tshogs gzugs la cher 'bar ba// kun nis yongs su bsdus nas ni// snga
59a5(rgyud): mdun du gzhag par bya// de nas sngags pas de ma thag/ slar yang rtse gcig sems kyis ni// bkug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya ba bsgrub par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug thub chen
59a6(rgyud): bcom ldan rnal 'byor can kru de// dpa' ba sems cad stsom 'gyur zhi // rang yi dngos grub mtshag rnams dang // dal 'byo rnams na 'dzin nyid dadu// rnam par rgyas pa'i nor snyer 'gyur// 
59a7(rgyud): dzod dang 'khor lo can// sa dang pha rol phyin sogs dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyang stsol 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lha smos ci dgos// de'i sngags ni oM A ro le ka/ gsang sngags dpal ldan mcho
59a8(rgyud): // 'anyes pams gsus rnam par la/ 'angs skyong bams gan y-i// gad kyi gyi rnam par sbyor//  sgrab ben gyur ba yis// bang /  la ga rten dang
59b1(rgyud): srid nga// srid par namarnam pa sopa/ log ta byug+sasasgrub pa yangs so// thams cad da 'i rang bzhin gzugs kyil ma dge bste// de yid
59b2(rgyud): la du dang pa ma rgyas pa//  sa / maman rgya la ma/  ya pas su /  / du le b+h+rUM //  sa
59b3(rgyud): dra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// tshangs pa'i yul sa thams cad du// kun nas yongs su gsal bar byed// hUM gi yi ge sgra zab mo// 
59b4(rgyud): kyis pa dang mtshungs pa// ba ma le ni be tog 'dra// 'bar ba dmar pos 'bregs shing 'jigs// bskal pa'i me dang 'dra bar gnas// num bzhi pa la mcheb yin// 'jig pa'i rus kyi thal ba
59b5(rgyud): sprid gyi sgra dang mtshungs pA ye// hUM ge yi ga nga ni dang ldan// rdorjehUM mdzad ces bya ba// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom// sngags kyi tshig ni/ oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM br-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM gr-ih+NA pA ya gr-ih+NA pa ya
59b6(rgyud): sAn la~M he b+ha ga wAn bid+yA rA dzA hU~M phaT/ rdo rje 'dzid pa'i rgyal ba 'di// kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'jig rten gsum yang 'gugs byed na// bud med gzhan dag smos ci dgos// tshangs pa
59b7(rgyud): kyib 'jug dbang rten sogs/ chung ma dang bcas phyag rgyar bcas// de dag thams cad 'azhugs byed de// sdug bsngal can gzhan spos ci dgas// nyi ma dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// da khri gzugs
59b8(rgyud): desnying gar son// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje can gyis sngon du bsgrub// bsam pa thams cid rdzogs byed pa// bcom ldan rdo rje rngan 'grub 'gyur// rgyal po thams cad sbyin kur na// dngos
60a1(rgyud): chug gnan dge slos ci dgos// sngags ni 'dir/ oM kr-i ni rlu rgyagasang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yi// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// longs spyod de snyed thams cad rnams// de skad thams cadan
60a2(rgyud): pa sted// de rje 'dzin pa sgrub pa'o// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ byams pa chen po'i bdag nyid su// snying gar zla ba'i gzugs brnyan 'o// dong 'bar pa'i phreng ba ldan// 'jig phyir
60a3(rgyud): byam zas pa// rang bzhin gcig tu byas nas de// da rdza las ni slo ba dang // dbang bskur ba yi rang bzhin dute// gser gyi dog legs 'bar ga/ ral pa'i tho tshugs 'dzin pa / 
60a4(rgyud): ral pa'i dmas su mchod rten rtse// rlung dang thun da 'od 'ang // ba sgoms nas sems can tham sa na la// brtan pa'i don du dbang bskur bya// yang na sems can thams cad la// bu gcig la byu
60a5(rgyud): rnam par so// bsgom pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// gnyis med sa rgyal ba las rgyal// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang // thim sogs phyogs dbyes rnam par dbye// byams pas kun tu rnam par smai
60a6(rgyud): sa dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// thams cad bdag dang bdag gi bar// 'das shing shin tu dri ma med// re rab lta bur brten pa'i sems// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral// de ltar sems
60a7(rgyud): tan byas nas// mnyam med sems can kun dang mAnyam// bdag nyid byams pa yin no zhes// dga' ldan gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// cung bad le zhing la khyil ba'is// pad ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i
60a8(rgyud): nasems nan ma dag pas// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni gsang sngags rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni/ oM ya dzi ta lA la sar+b+bas hA sa ma mA nug ta sA thA ka sang sngags bdag zhi
60b1(rgyud): // byams pan grags pa rtse// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par khyab/ khyams pa 'thugs ni yad du'o// dang po sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// sgrub pa'i thabs mchog du sgom par bya// ma mdzal
60b2(rgyud): 'di ni bsgrubs pa cam gyis kyang // dga' ldan du ni gnas par 'gyur// slob pa nyan dang bral ba'i bdag/ rang nyid lha yi bu dang mtshungs// byams pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// 'di ni byams pa lta sa
60b3(rgyud): 'gyur// byams pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du ni// rang bzhin gyis ni skye bar 'gyur// de mdun chos ni legs mnyan nas// sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang // dbang dang ting 'dzin thob nas ni// de ni byang chub sa
60b4(rgyud): dpar 'gyur// mthar yang sangs rgyas thams cad ni// byams pa'i yid kyis thob par 'gyur// byams pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / rang gi lus ni thams cad ni// nam mkha' mtshungs pa nyid du
60b5(rgyud): bsgom// chos bdag med pa bskyed nas kyang // rang nyid nam mkha'i snying por 'gyur// gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// mkha' mtshungs dpe las rnam par 'das// nam mkha'i 'od zer gyur pa
60b6(rgyud): sems can rang gi sems las sgo// thams cad sems las spros nas ni// slar yang rim gyis bsdu bar bya// nam mkhar mnyam par 'gro ba bal// rang gi de nyid kyis sbyar bya// rin chen dkyil la
60b7(rgyud): dasu gnas par// rin chen la dog 'od pom// can rnangs kun gyis lus brgyan pa// lagan rin cheni stobs po che// den chen sbyor ba bsgoms pa yis// nam mkha'i dam pa 'gul ba yin// sngags
60b8(rgyud): oM Ak+Sha sha ga d+hA ya sA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po srubs po che// com ldan rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi dngos grub thams cad ni// steng bar 'gyur te dpyad me dgos// dpa' bos 'i
61a1(rgyud): thams cad kyis// dngos grub ji snyed bka' stsal pa// nam mkha'i snying po bsku zla pa li/ gde dag thams cad myur du ster// nam mkha'i skang po sgrub pa'i thabs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi
61a2(rgyud): rang bzhin sa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis// kun du bzang po 'od 'amang ba// zla ba'i dkyil la 'ong bus su ni// sdigs pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ 
61a3(rgyud): da pa'i// rang gis phra rab rdul rnams kyis// de dag thams cad mtshungs par bya// sangs rgyas sku yi sku nyid du// yang na ba spu'i khung rnams su// rang gi 'khor los yongs skor nas// sas
61a4(rgyud): rgyas kun dang mtshungs byas te// bdag ni tsun tu bang ba zhes// yi ga lnga pa zhes su pag // 'di mi sngags chen ba zlas par bya// yang na 'di ni lha gnan gyis// rtag tu sngags su gur pa'o// oM sa rbe
61a5(rgyud): 5\u0f7f/ gsang sngags rgyal ba chags zhing // gdadonas dag rang 'thung ba/ da ni bsgrubs pa rgyas kyis ni// shes rab sa med par gyur// de ye yeshes dri med cing // gzugs mngos pa ni
61a6(rgyud): sa// na ma pam sgru/  bzang ga /  /  bang po'i grub pa'i rdzus so//  nas pa/  kyi
61a7(rgyud): 9 yam sa pa // gas sngags pa sa/  ma nas
61a8(rgyud): a byu// gas byung ba// mamanan pa Na nas kyin sa sa lar mes la bogapa sngags di 'dzin pa// rnam pang sel par grags pa ste// thams cad kyi rlom pa'i / 
61b1(rgyud): phyag rgya kun gyis thams cad du// gdod nas skye med rang bzhin gyis// gdod nas dag cing 'gyur ba med// de ltar chos 'di shes nas ni// lha nyid dang ni mnyam byas nas// rnyog pa med cing zag med pa'i// rjes su
61b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub bya// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dang ma lhur// gsal ba'i rnam par gnas pa'o// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i// me yis yongs su bskor ba yi// phyag na ral phrig pa
61b3(rgyud): yang nas yang du sems byed cing // dngos grub 'di ni gzi brjid che// rnam sel mchog gi dbang phyug ni// mtha' las 'das pa'i dngos grub mchog/ thams cad nas ni stsol ba nyid// rnam par sel ba
61b4(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs so// / dbang chen dkyil 'khor snyeng du ni// rdo rje yin dbus na bzhugs// bser gyi mdog can sku chen po// 'bar blta bu'i gci 'dzidu cam// snying gar rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnas// sa snying zhes kyang
61b5(rgyud): bdag nyid bsgom// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// rang gi gsang sngags brjod par byags snyi zhes byang bdag pa snoms nas// sngags kyi yi ge mchog pa de 'dre// ik+She haHrA tra \u0f7fswA hA/ bas ma yas sngags
61b6(rgyud): btsag 'di yis ni// dngos grub thams cad rab gsol mdzad// sa yi snying po zhes grags pa// dam pa'i don du rnal 'byor pas// sa'i snying po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// zad pa med cing 'khrul pa med// 26
61b7(rgyud): sred mchog ke shes rab ca// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gyu // shes rab de rje'i bdag nyid dge/ blo gros pa yang rnyed dga' la/ 'bad pa yis ni bsgom par ma// me'i dkyil 'khor dbus su me// gse
61b8(rgyud): ldan pa cas// rgyam pa chen po zlam ma//  byed kyi mi sa chags // sngags ma mthams rdzu kyi shegs // kham sa tha sa
62a1(rgyud): ye shes me 'ang 'dod pa las// 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste// dngos grub kun gyi mchog shes bya// shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob gyur na// dngos grub
62a2(rgyud): gzhan dag ci nig smos// rno gros mi zad pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// kud nas shes rab chen po can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten par// gser gyi khadog ka'i brjid ce// rgyan rnams thams
62a3(rgyud): pas cad rdzogs par mdzad// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor ba// nam mkha'i bdag po bdag yin zhes// lus dag yid kyis thar
62a4(rgyud): cad du// thams cad rig pas brtan par bya// shin tu dri mod byang chub sems// rang snying me long lta bur bsam// de nas yi ge cig bkod de// mkha' mdzod bdag ces bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms
62a5(rgyud): nas rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag/ mkha' la rin chen 'byung gnas dang // yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing // de bzhin bum pa bzang po sogs// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug gi// nya bar 'khor ba 'ams
62a6(rgyud): 'bag// 'jig rten kun gyi rdzas thams cad// ji snyed yod pa de dag kun// 'dir ni skad cig tsam nyid la// dngos gru ba dam pa stsol bar 'gyur// oM ga gnag s+ho ki swA hA// nam mkha' mdzod kyi
62a7(rgyud): grub kyi// nar gyi rkun gyi rab 'bebs pa// nam ma/  mdzad ni skabs poche// skad ci gnam gyis byed par 'gyur// nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// dem chen dkyil 'khor las
62a8(rgyud): byung ba// rin chen phung po cher rab 'beb// rin chen gzi brjid ma tshig tshu rol// lagan rin chen de bsgrub bya// lagan rin can phyag kya re// gla nga'i dkyil 'khor dayul gnas par// rdorje sbyor bas
62b1(rgyud): zab par bya// bdag nyid rin can nas bya dang // rin chen thams cad sul bar mdzod// thams cad rdo rje bzhin bdag nyid// pri yang su mdog sngo sangs 'od// dbang chen dang ni mi las byung // phrag na rim tsham
62b2(rgyud): gas pa pa// rag tu 'dud pa zhes byur \u0f7f/  rdzun kyi mr-i hA/ gsung sngags 'di yi // dab tu 'ab de u ga te/  ni// de mamam da
62b3(rgyud): / chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems// bdud rtsi chu yis rab gang ga/ stong gsum nas ni bsam par bya// pad ma gcig gi steng na gnas// de yi skye
62b4(rgyud): mi 'arjid che// chu lha yi ni gzugs kyi mchog/ de steng du yang gsang chen po// me'i dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// de yi steng du brtson 'grus che// rtse mo brgya pa'i rdo rje byung // de yi steng du pad chen po/ 
62b5(rgyud): brgya pa 'od gsal ba// de steng rtag tu bsam pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che// rgya mtsho'i blo gros nes grags pa// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dung dang kun da zla ba'i 'od// rgyan rnams
62b6(rgyud): kyis rnam par brgyan// de yi lag na phyag rgya me// da rnga drung du rab tu grags// rang gi lhag pa'i lha stor bas// rang nyid rdo rje yin no zhes// rgya mtsho'i blo gros shes rab che// slar yang gsang sngags pa
62b7(rgyud): /  ga sa nyis sahA/ sngags ma // shes sa // de tshu sa /  sbyangs 'a
62b8(rgyud): rgyas 'jam pa'i dbyangs// zugs rje 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal// dngos grub gzhan lha smos ci dgos// rgyam rgya blo gros kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ 
63a1(rgyud): sngon po 'dab 'dra'i 'od// rdo rje snying po brtson 'grus che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ji snyedas steng mtha' dag tu// khyab la sug cing mtha' la// phra zhing skad pa ma dag
63a2(rgyud): mchog gi yi ge 'gyur med pa// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ni// chos kyi sprin la spyod mdzad pa// bsam yas sa ni yang dag brnyes// in dra nI li mtshungs pa'i 'od// de yi sngags kyur mdzes
63a3(rgyud): yi ge mchog ni steng du 'bar// thugs kar rdo rje cher gsal ba// rang nyid rnam par 'phro ba bzhin// sngags ni oM badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ 'di ni sngags mchog gtso ba ste// sangs rgyas byang chu
63a4(rgyud): bsgrub byed// ye shes yangs pa spel mdzad cing // rnam pa kun tu phun tshogs kun// sangs rgyas nyid kun stsol mdzad na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 
63a5(rgyud): bcing ba dang // dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed// bdag nyid rdo rje yin no zhes// ngargyal rab tu bskyed nas ni// rdo rje snyed po bzhin du gzhar// bdag gi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// thugs kyi rdo
63a6(rgyud): r+yA nas// chos rkye byings dang mnyam pa zeg// des na rnam pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje snying pos yang dag byung // de rje sri po mkha' dang // sbyin byed rtse mo drug pas b+hAb// rdo rje myong po sgrub bya
63a7(rgyud): dbang chen mo las yang dag zung // rnyor bu rin chen 'dra ba'i lus// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// nyi ma'i dkyil labar mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen 'byung ba sems chen po/ 
63a8(rgyud): 'asung bar byed de gnas/ yad ma mtho sri rnam pa can// phyag kyi 'i steng ga gnas// den chen sbyor bas bsgom par bya// ngan chen cad pa'a'ab par 'gyur// sngags nam
63b1(rgyud): ga da da g+saH// na chen 'byung kunas rgyal po 'di/ chog rnams sbyinas dbang phyug// sbyong ba kun gyis bsgrub paraH//  tshe min rnams sul bar 'gyur// de chen 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i tha / 
63b2(rgyud): dbezhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dade'i snying po rgyan gyi chud rin po las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyi mab pa'i thabs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de 'dre sa
63b3(rgyud): pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa dam pa'i chol gyi 'khor lo bskor bachen po mi so sol ba bta' ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zla bar
63b4(rgyud): ldan 'das bskyed du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo la khor los sgyur ba chen pos de skad ces bsol ba btab ma thag kho nad rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba las ches gsang ba bka' stsal pa/ 
63b5(rgyud): de nas yang dge bshad bya ba// khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ rlung khams rab tu gsal ba la// me ni dbus nas dbus su'o// de yi dbus su rdo rje che// 'od mer lnga yi phreng bas mdzes// de yi mdun duH
63b6(rgyud): ba yang // mdung rtse 'bar ba chen po yi// de yi g.yas kyi ma ru ni// rdo rje chen po 'bar bred nan// g.yon nyid du ni btson che// rig pa'i phreng bas rnam par klas// rgya ra tu ra gri'i phyag rgya ni// rin chen 'bar tha
63b7(rgyud): dam par brgyan// pi ngos rnams su rnam khros pa'i// khro ba thams cad dgod par bya// de yi sngags kyi yi ge gsang // gsang chen mchog tu 'bar ba li/ gzhal du med cing grangs med mchos kyi chos du dras
63b8(rgyud): nyam dang mi mnyam pa// yi ge gcis pa gsang chen po// rgyu yi don du rtogs par byed// dbyangs sde dang ni yang dag ldan// phag le sgra yas rnam par brgyan// de nyid gsang pa'i mgon po ni// dbyangs bdun par
64a1(rgyud): // ni bgrad pa yin//  dugadapal dadza// 'jig pa rla ba chog tu'a' // sems dpa' sngon po'i' ba'i bdag/ 'bar ba'i ma yid kyil 'ar lda// dag pa chen po sum// 
64a2(rgyud): na dang ni 'ad ba 'od// pad mar ga'i rnam pa 'dra// 'byur ba kun gyis rnam par dargyan// dur khrod me bzhini shin tu yang // gsal ba'i sgra ldan stobs po po// no 'i'i drang rtser 'bang ba// thod pa'i cod pan steng
64a3(rgyud): 5// 'jig pa chen po'i dus phyin gyi// sodas kha ye me lnga gnas// srin la khyo/ rnam par 'khrug pa can// dpon rgyangs pa yi zhabs kyis 'azhugs// khro ba la sogs nyams dang ldan/

64a6(rgyud): rnams la// sku 'phrul dra ba zhes byar gnas// phyag drug zhabs drug snang ba can// zhal drug pa ste gsus po che// char sprin mchog 'dra cher gnag pa// dus mtha'i me dang 'dra bar gnas// mdog

64b2(rgyud): shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis// de nid gshegs rnams khro bor mdzad// zugs rje khro bo'i drang tshul can// 'jig rten gzub kyang nges sres mya nga // de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyi// 
64b3(rgyud): rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sku// thugs rjes khro bo ma lus mchog/ gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa bskyed// gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// // de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// 
64b4(rgyud): po gzegs ma zhes su grags// dmar po 'bar ba'i khro bo che// 'jig pa chen po'i dus dang 'dra// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma bzhin// de yi kha dog rnam par bsam// drag pa chen po'i zhal bzhi pa/ 
64b5(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// spyan gsum pa la khro gnyer bster// phyag drug pa la mchog tu 'bar// me yi khams dang 'dra ba'i mdog/ li khri'i mdog ltar shin du dmar// de yi khro gnyer bsnyer ba/ 
64b6(rgyud): yis// gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'byin par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis pa ni// yang dang yang du bsam par bya// ma lus sa rnams thams cad du// son pa'i bdag nyid chen po des// 'gugs pa dang ni
64b7(rgyud): dbang byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sngags ni oM ka Ni kaN+Di bruM phaT/ khro bo 'di yi sngags 'dzin pa// 'jig rted gsum mchog stobs po che// sa rnams thams cad srog byed na/ 
64b8(rgyud): bo gzhan lta smos ci dgas// khro bo galegs ma sgrub pa'i thabs so// / de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje sems dpa' de zhen gshegs/ pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug kur/ 
65a1(rgyud): zhes su ba shad pa phyin// rtag tu 'chang ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rgya skyugs mdog ltar 'bang ba po// chung dga'i brji can reg pa// me yi dkyil 'khor da
65a2(rgyud): seng ge ltar gnas mcheb pa ni// te mgrin rgyal po chen po de// dam pa'i dbang phyug
65a3(rgyud): ma gyi/ na bcu ba skye// zhwabu'i sbrul klas rgyasas // 'dug rten mas ca pany-i // pad ma da bang phyug rgyal po lta// kun mchogs yi

70a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang many+dzam sbyo ba// mkha' 'gro ma ya dre bsdog// 'dod chags med cing chags bral med/  su ma dadamigs par mi 'gyur ro// bud med ku
