70a4(rgyud): 'asher ba yangs bskur sa// sna tshogs sgyu mra'i phyag rgya 'di// shes rab rol phyi mor bshad// kun la sna rdzogs phyag rgya ni// kun la sna tshogs sdom pa yis// sangs rgyas kun da
70a5(rgyud): nyam par spyod// stong pa nyid kyis de nyid bsol/ kun la kun nas thams cad du// nam kun kunaN+Di de nyid kyis// sangs rgyas bsas cadag ni dngag yo// 
70a6(rgyud): nyid 'gyur// sems dang sems can ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs 'di// sa dang pha rol phyin spyod pa// dbang nyid du yang de bshad do// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba
70a7(rgyud): bzhin/ sheg/ sog zheg/ dzin sa'adzi'o//  'drenan nyid/  na la//  bu
70a8(rgyud): ral gri la gri 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor lo de bzhin 'khor lo 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum rgyal nyid dang ni// 'di rnams kyi 'ang rigs
70b1(rgyud): de nyid chags dang chags bral ba// 'dod dadu thar pa du'ang 'gyur// dus gsum dang ni srid gsum mchog/ 'jig rten gsum dang / 'bras gsum pa// brtan pa thams cad de
70b2(rgyud): mas kyi mtha' klas pa// dngos po kun tud 'byeng // de nyid bcom ldan na ma byor te// gcig pa nyid ni ldeg pa'i sgra// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs nA dpal// rdo rjesems dpa
70b3(rgyud): nga bzhin gshegs// dpal ldan sgyum tshon mo 'chang // rnam snang rtag pa thams cad du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso chen khyab// sangs rgyas 'khor lo can mi bskyod/ 
70b4(rgyud): brang stobs me// tshe dpag med pa kun nas mchog/ dan yo sna tshogs ma da pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' ltar sdug/ dgug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang // legs palnga mdzad pa
70b5(rgyud): na byenas de bzhin te// de gad pa snang // de kyi myed rlob //  sa tshig bdu rje dang/ dang gi drug no sbyin no// brjor de bzhin gshegs pa gyu/ 
70b6(rgyud): bcom ldan rnal 'byor 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' stobs po che// rdo rje hUM mdzad rje mad // ta ma grin zhes ni rnam par grags// he rba ni dpal rdo rje// mchog gi dbang phyug gshin
70b7(rgyud): gi gi sa // ji na chen po// gzug na ma / zhe la ma mtshanagaso// 
71a1(rgyud): stobs na tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bani// dbang ni mchog tu 'bar ba dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// dbang po rnabs dang stobs rnams dang // rjes dran drug por byung ba
71a2(rgyud): gang // bsgom par bya ba ba tuganas// de nyid bcom ldan gcig sas// byang chub yan lag bdun pa tags pa// mtha' gcig yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// sum \u0f7f gnyis mchog gi
71a3(rgyud): 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam po che// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad btags pa/ 
71a4(rgyud): chen po// rnam par dbye ba sum cu bdun// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug ni// dgul gnas par gyur pa dang // bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhis// sems can bsdubs bslad pa dang / 
71a5(rgyud): soso yang dag rig pa bzhi// de bzhin bsrung ba se mnga' ba// skal ba chen po'i yi lajigs pa// mchog tu gyur ba nyid nga ni// bsam gtan gzugs med pa ni blag gnyis// tshad med pa
71a6(rgyud): de bzhin no//  chub sems kyi spyod pag no// bden pa bzhin ston pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byung // zag bcas pag pa med pa'i mchog/ de ny-id bcom ldan nal 'byor
71a7(rgyud): du rgya gi shi bang phyug da // skye bu'i bdag pa sgru gyun/ gag ga da sa 'ad// kun du rjo pa rnams pa da// mas cini spyo ra/ 
71a8(rgyud): med cing spros pa bral// sring pa mkha' mnyam mtshungs pa med// tshig mtha' sgra yis nam dgod pa// 'jig tan paskad tshul du rtogs// de tshe lus sogs dbye ba yis// sa rnams kyis
71b1(rgyud): niyongs su btags// sA ni sprul pa nyid du 'gyur// longs spyod rdzogs pa yang dag brnyes// rdo rje'i sku dang de bzhin du// ye shes sku sogs yongs su brtags// mtha' yas sku dang sku
71b2(rgyud): chen po// rin chen spyan 'od byed pa// pad+ma'i su ni snang 'tsho// thams cad smanI la sa babang byed// rtogs par bya ba lngas kyi sku// rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan
71b3(rgyud): / byang chub sems ni 'dagasal bri// kun tu 'od kyis chen po// mo dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan// gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya// zla ba'i 'od ni 'od gsal ba// gsum
71b4(rgyud): pa nam mkha'i 'od ces bya// mkha' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas// 
71b5(rgyud): subasngags// lnga pa rin chen 'od ces bya// dbang bskur bar ni rab tu gnas// drug pa pad mo 'char zhes bya// pad bzhin rab tu rnam par snang // rang bzhin gyis ni chos nyid dag/ 
71b6(rgyud): bdag gi med cing yongs bzung med// bdun pa las kyi 'ad ces bya// sangs rgyas pri ni las mdzad pa che// btsud pa dpe med pa zhes bya// dbe ni de mi yod ma phyin// dgu bde pe dang bra sa
71b7(rgyud): dang sus khams cad 'jug// bcu pa shes pa 'di ces bya//  mildan med// bcug zug / chen yin 'dug / 
71b8(rgyud): mi sor bdag rig pa// rnal 'byor ye shes longs rdzogs nyid// sa chen po na 'di dag rnams// sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du// sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos// rnal 'byor ye shes
72a1(rgyud): / gang brjed pa// thams cad nyid ni mtha' las mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo phreng po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las snga
72a2(rgyud): kye de kho na nyid de// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang cam med pa chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba rnal 'byor gyi dang
72a3(rgyud): phrag chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gisu gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi de ma thag nyid du de bzhin gshegs
72a4(rgyud): thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag na so mnyam par gzhag pa'i de ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca
72a5(rgyud): kye thugs rdo rje la rjes su bcug nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus dang ngag dang lid mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas rnam par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan
72a6(rgyud): 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid rtogs nas te nge 'dzin pas bzhengs te/ 'jam dpal gzhan nur kru pa la 'di skad ces bka
72a7(rgyud): stsal to// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi meg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yod do zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa
72a8(rgyud): de nas 'ang ba dpal gzhan dur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis pa rlabs kyis stan las langs te// bu gos brag gcig tu ga'ar nas bcom ldan
72b1(rgyud): 'das kyi kun kyang bus mo g.yas pa'i lhung sa la btsugs te bral mo sbyar nas btud de 'di skad ces gso to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs
72b2(rgyud): theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas sems can rnams thabs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grubs
72b3(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal legs
72b4(rgyud): so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod gang slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs pa ni 'jam dpal khyed legs so legs so// de legs pa
72b5(rgyud): rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang theg pa chen po mngon par rtog pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de
72b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po mngon par rdzogs pa zhes bya ba
72b7(rgyud): kyil 'khor 'di bka' stsal pa// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad byab// dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog/ snying po chen po'i rgyan ces bA// klu ni
72b8(rgyud): bang byas// thig bzhi dang ni mnyam par ldan// 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje snying po yangs bskor ba/ 
73a1(rgyud): rdod dkyil 'khor grwa rnams dang // sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rjerjen chen rnams kyis smras// rdo rje pad+mathams cad du// las kyi rdo rnga thams cad du// 'bar ba
73a2(rgyud): ba 'thigs pa'i 'od// dril bcas sna tshogs mchog dang ldan// rgyal mtshan snye ba dang bskyed pa'i// gos dang me tog chen pos smras// babyed pas nye bar mdzes// ral gri nga
73a3(rgyud): ba la// lugs kyu la sogs sna tshogs brgyan// chu yi dkyil 'khor yongs bskor ba// khyer yug bzhin du rnam par gnas// de la'ang sgo dang sgo khyud sogs// mkhas pa yis ni / 
73a4(rgyud): bya// de yi nang du bri bar bya// 'khor lo chen po rab tu gnas// cha brgyad kyis ni yongs su bskor// dkyil 'khor legs par rnam par spras// rdo rje'i thig gis yongs su bskor// ngo
73a5(rgyud): 'khor lo cher 'bar ba// de yi dbus su snying po che// rdo rje'i snying po nas su bshad// de yi steng du rdo rjeche// rdo rje pad+ma rab tu gnas// pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje che// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag gis
73a6(rgyud): gsang ba che brlabs brgyan// 'grel ba' bshad par 'di bzhin 'dug/ dru dang kun dbu ba dra kang // sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan du bshad// de yi steng du legs 'azhugs pa// khyab pa
73a7(rgyud): ma par snang mdzad che// zla ba'i mdog ldan 'dzum bcas pa// ting 'dzin ldan gnas sdig pa bcom// de rje'i phreng bas rnam par spras// sna tshogs 'bar bas 'khregs pa'i 'od/ 
73a8(rgyud): chen po'i phreng ba ches// sbal ba rnam par dgod par bya// de sngags rtag tu shes bya ba// yi ge yi ni mchog gtso bo// sha sa'i sde pa gsil byed ni// mchog gi dbang phyug rgyag ce
73b1(rgyud): chug pa'i dbyas sdes migs gsal ba// cig le na ngas legs pang na// rten cing 'bras 'byung mardzam 'o// don can ra tu brgyang dang bya// denyi bcom ldan na lnga 'a
73b2(rgyud): gcig pu nyid ni ldog pa'i sgra/ chos kyi sku ni ye shes che// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bshad// de nas yang dang nin gshegs pa rdzi bskyod pa dang ye shes kyi 'odaper dang / de bzhide gshes
73b3(rgyud): bstan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nyid du rang gi bdag
73b4(rgyud): kyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir 'khod de// dbang chen dkyil 'khor mi bskyod pa/ 
73b5(rgyud): trai le dkyil 'khor ye shes 'ong // chu yi dkyil 'khor 'dra dpag med// rdo rjes rnam gnon du dkyil 'khor// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang bar
73b6(rgyud): tshig las byung ba sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pad+mod zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg po chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin
73b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i rkyen gyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ba'o// oM badz+ra satwa/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas
74a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul phrag rab dang banyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus 'jig rten gyi khams rna su gshegs nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar
74a2(rgyud): mdzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba mngon par rdzogs nas slar yang gcig tu 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen pa kun tu babang po'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rje
74a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i rdo rje snying po'i thugs kar gnas te ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e maho rdo rje snying po bdag
74a4(rgyud): shes rnam dag pa// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid gyur nas// byang chub sems dpa' brtan bskyed de// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// gang zhig btun phyir lus min yang // sangs
74a5(rgyud): hAs sku nyid du gyur to// de nas de ji'i sgra byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'gron nas bcom ldan 'das mi spyod pa'i nye 'khor thams cad rnam pa bzhis
74a6(rgyud): dkar ba ser po dmar po ljang gu'i mjug tu mngon par sprul nas rang gi sngags kyi yaM gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te gnas par gyur to// dgug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ 
74a7(rgyud): oM badz+ra da dang rjes su chags pa'i/ di 'dzin no/ myi badz+ra drug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca la legs par ma 'i'i te na ni/ 
74a8(rgyud): 'byung ldan gyid dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ e badz+ra han/ nyi ma'i dkyil la khod kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra te dza/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' mang
74b1(rgyud): kyiting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra ke tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bshad pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra hA sa/ de bzhin du 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor yang thugs rje
74b2(rgyud): 'dzin ni/ u badz+rad+harmA/ shes rab kyi pha ra phyin pa'i ting nge la ni ni/ a badz+ra hrISh+Ta/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor po'i nga 'dzin ni/ oM kyai / de bzhin gshegs pa thams mas
74b3(rgyud): las sna tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ maM badz+ra kar+m+ma/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin
74b4(rgyud): badz+ra rany+dza/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khra bo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM 'adz+ra yak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur bcings pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM
74b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag cu'i dam chog rdo rje dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge la
74b6(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka nis 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra d+hAr+m+mahUM/ rang gi rige pa mchog ni/ oM badz+ran+na d+hi shwa ri ba che nas de lazhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhi dag ce
74b7(rgyud): thams cad car rje sems dpa'i dam ga ye shesuM phyag na kyi khrel bar byin gyis 'arlabs pa zhes zla ba'i ti 'dzi nas skems par zhugs te/ da kyi thugs ku nas rlu ga ga
74b8(rgyud): chog 'di byung ba/ oM a b+hi Sh+ya oM oM dz+nyA na muSh+Ti tsi t+te badz+ra badz+ra Ni hU~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes
75a1(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs gnas rang gi rig pa mchog 'dri ba gar stsal pa/ oM rata nas
75a2(rgyud): b+ha ba tA oM badz+ra dz+nyA na gar b+ha sI hU~M de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes
75a3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs gnas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsam pa/ oM a me tA b+hUhrIHoM badz+ra d+ha ri ne hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gnon pa
75a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka'
75a5(rgyud): stsal pa/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi e/ oM badz+ra ma hA ba le hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la rnam par gzigs shing de bzhin
75a6(rgyud): shegs pathams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par smos pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma tI dz+nyAn 'dze trAM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di dag bshad tsam
75a7(rgyud): sa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i bdag nyid rtogs nas mi mnyam pa nyid spros
75a8(rgyud): byed papa 'ams pa/ oM batha ma dan ng+tha/ de ya di ga makyis da zhon gni gis ma cad kyi skye byan rje mtshang 'gyu// dem khyenan pa
75b1(rgyud): nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid smos pa'i snying po 'dabyung // oM sah+la d+ha zlas mahA dz+nyAn badz+ra hA/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis kyang spang ba daphyag na derdo rje thugs kar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
75b2(rgyud): sa dkyil 'khor thams cang byin gyis brlabs bu mdzad nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'khod ba mthong po// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams da kyi zugs gnas de bzhin gshegs pa bcwa
75b3(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba satwa sa ma hA pra bany+tsa bud d+hA hUM/ de nas 'di phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyag na rdo rje rnam par phyung / 
75b4(rgyud): slar yang de ban gshegs pa thabs cad kyi spyan sngan gnas nas bkre' nang cing byed // bcom ljin de bzhin gshegs pa stan// bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bkye/ 
75b5(rgyud): baM thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kye dkyil 'khor napal sa byin gyis brlab par byas shig/ de de bzhin na zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ba'in
75b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gnas dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs te brtan par gyur nas rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bya'i lha rnams phyung ste/ lha myod rnams dkyil labar thams cad kye bla/ 
75b7(rgyud): rnams su de bzhin du rnam par gnas so// sgornams su so slong ma rnams dang / mtshams rnams su gzugs dang / smad dri dang rong ga bya rnams bshad do// de dag gi sngags su gyur ba ni ma ma
75b8(rgyud): TaM nAM/ 'khor lo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya'o// i smar ba dz+ri Ni he oM sha rang badz+re ai ma tsam badz+ri Ni ki li ki la hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadang
76a1(rgyud): 'khor gradang / mtshams rnams su dri rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar gnas par dgod par bya'o// oM badz+ra ga de hUM/ oM mdzu dwi Ni klu d+hA
76a2(rgyud): nod pa / oM 'dzi she shi he haM// de bzhin gshegs pathams cad kyirol pa chen po'i sgyum skra'i mtsham ldanams su gzugs la sogs pa'i oM badz+ra pa/ oM d+h+ri ga / oM ba~M dz+dzag+harA
76a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dga' ba rdo rje'i snying po ni/ oM sa pa ya hoHsur s+yAM/ dga' bde chen po'i rdo rje'i snying po dis
76a4(rgyud): debazhin gshegs pa thams cad kun nas mnyes par dkyil 'khor thams cad la brtan par gyur nas/ dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad/ 
76a5(rgyud): gnas su sa rab nyid// kun nas dgyes mdzad sadas rgyas kun// dngos grub thams cad bsnyen dge/ sngags kyi tshig rnams kyang / oM a h+ye hi b+ha ga zhan 'jas ku na dza~MHoM pra
76a6(rgyud): ga ta/ yis sa ma N+DI b+hag zhan/ oMg+sa tothug ldan 'ad na ya 'di ga ni dkyil lakho sas dkyi spen pas so// des bu'i kyi lakhor 'brub la byams zung
76a7(rgyud): dab dpel dang / kun tu babang po dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgod par bya'o// sngun du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs slob ma bcug se/ da
76a8(rgyud): shin gshegs pa thams cad la nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o// de la dang po kho nar re shi ka
76b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi slob dpon na dam tshig thams cad shes pa/ bcom ldan 'ang rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sa dos grub thams cad kyis byin gyis brla'as pa/ dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa/ de
76b2(rgyud): rnab 'byor kyad bang phyug lta bu/ thams cad pa khyen pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma tshig gi phyag rgyal bslab par bya'o// de nas 'dir dam phyigs phyag/ rgya brjing bar 'gyur ba
76b3(rgyud): ni phyi la dkrung bcings nas dril sogs pa rnams rjes lag pa gnyis byugs nas phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu bsgrub par bya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa byas te mongs can tshun bcings nas skyil
76b4(rgyud): klung gi dbus su rdo rje bsdams par gzhug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni gar gyi tshogs kyi sbyor bas so// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid rked pa'i
76b5(rgyud): su gzung ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo lcag ku ltar gzung ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid mda' 'phen po lta bu'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid
76b6(rgyud): legs so sbyin pas rgyul tu 'jig pa ni rdo rje ldegs pa'i'o// byang chub kyi sems sa phrag rgya rnams so// dong ba sdams phyed nyid dpral 'a 'jog pani rjo byen gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams
76b7(rgyud): rje bsdams pa de nyid kha'i bad du bskor ba ni rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying kar byas pa ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid 'khor lo ltar longs su bskor ba ni rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgyar// 
77a1(rgyud): de nyid snying gang bsgreng ba ni rdo rje smra ba'i'o// chos kyi phyag rgya rnams so// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid kar nyid du stor bya ni lus sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa
77a2(rgyud): gnyis spyi bo dang snying ka dang mgrin par 'jig pa ni rdo rje ba srung ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa'i gram pa gnyis su 'jog pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// de rnga ba sdams pa de nyid
77a3(rgyud): snying ga re bcing ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du sgeg mo dang bdug bam la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha mo thams cad
77a4(rgyud): me 'khor dgod pa dang // srog dang snying rje'i bdag nyid dang // dpa'adang khri sogs chos bdag nyid// rang nyid zhi ba'i bdag nyid nyimaso// phyag tu thams cad rab chags po// gal
77a5(rgyud): denges grub mchog 'dod na// bdag nyid rdo rje'i'agrang byed dam// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu sbyar// thams cad grub par 'dod sogs kyis/ 
77a6(rgyud): krung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dpyir gnyis mid dang cano// sangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sgo// skrag pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi pa'i spyan/ 
77a7(rgyud): bcas rdo rje can gyir dgongs// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje spyan// ting 'dzin dbye ba las shes bya// 'khrugs pa'i lta stangs khro rnams kyis// btsun mo rnams kyi rol pa
77a8(rgyud): // 'di pa yis rnams // TIg spyod me kyi klung pa nyid/  ma na gyi gyu la/  sa / tsho ma po sa
77b1(rgyud): stasta sa rnam pa sna tshogs nyid// mchu yi phyag rgya yongs ldan pa// g.yo ba med cing mi 'gul ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// ma
77b2(rgyud): chung bang yang dge ldan// rnam 'gyur med cing mtshangs med gnas// rol pa'i yi ge yang dag ldan// mchu yi phyag rgya rdo rje can// rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor ba car// khro bos so na yongs su
77b3(rgyud): 'di ni khro ba'i phyag rgyar bshad// mchu yi phyag rgya gzugs la ngos can// 'jig rten pa rnams mchu'i phyag rgya// rnam 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral// shin tu mnag dag
77b4(rgyud): 'dod chags dang // sdang dang rmongs las thams cad du// ngom cing rnam 'khor dang ldan pa// g.yo bcas rab tu 'phro ba yang / 
77b5(rgyud): sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ lha stangs pachu la sogs pa'i ming // phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdu ba// skyob pa rnams kyis kun shes bya// ji srid sku yi dbye ba dang // dbang po la sogs
77b6(rgyud): rab byed/ de dag phyag rgya mtha' las mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis brtags pa nyid// sna tshogs sman gci hrI 9// tshad 'di man tan 'byung ba'i gnas// sangs rgyas rnam sa
77b7(rgyud): rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// rdo rje snyid po rkyen gyi rgyud chen po las dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid gsang ba zhes bya ba'idakyil 'khor chen pa yongs su rdzogs so// 
77b8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'di bka' stsal pa/ de nas dkyi
78a1(rgyud): 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// sna tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog/ dar
78a2(rgyud): dang me tog chun pos brgyad// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// sna tshogs pad+mod+mad bzhin gzhan// dasngal 'khor de yidathAs su ni// sangs kyis sku gzugs yid 'ong ba// mgon
78a3(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// 'bar ba mchog gis brgyan papo// de sngags rtags su shes bya ba// dang po'i dbyangs dang gnyis pa'o// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// 'khor lo can brgyad rtsi
78a4(rgyud): par bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// 'khor lo kun tu 'ber ba gzhag/ 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// pad ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas// sgeg sngogs sangs rgyas 'am
78a5(rgyud): cad ni// ji ltar sngon bzhin bri bar bya// nye bar mkho ba'i mchod kun gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya// dgug sogs cho ga'i sbyor ba ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma nge ni
78a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nye bar spyad pa kun// cho ga 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rtog pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad byag/ 
78a7(rgyud): rted gsum las rnam rgyal zhes// bya ba de rje rje mdzad sregs// bu bzhi pa la sgo ba ni ba// ta babs ba nis ni ma nges par byas// de yin du 'khor lo ni/ dkyil 'khod gud pa lta bu'o// 
78a8(rgyud): dbus su khro bo che// 'jig rten gsul las nam rgyal yang // khrog nyer ldan shing smin ma 'khyog// spyan gsal 'bar ba chen po pa// cung ma dam che ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// rnam par dgod cing
78b1(rgyud): / g.yon pa brgyad pa'i zhabs kyis ni// bka' zlog dbang phyug chen po gnod// sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras// in dra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi
78b2(rgyud): la spyan gsum pa// zhalnga bzhi pa la grub par dka'// bretsun dang ni nags par brjod// dang po ni ra bshad// gnyis bzhags pa sdigs mdzub tsAn// phyug gnyis tshu dam
78b3(rgyud): par badzang // 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya ba'i// phyag rgya mchog tu thub par dka'// sngags ni ming gi de nyid ldan// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam par 'khrigs// dkyil 'khor de'i gnas
78b4(rgyud): swa// cha rnams kun ni thams cad nas// phyag rgya thams cad mnyam par bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas par// ral gri 'khor log zhu dang mdang // de bzhin du ni dgrag nyid// de las
78b5(rgyud): mtha' yas mchog/ mdong bsus nas de phyag rgya dgod// de sbyang khro ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par bkod nas nye bar mkho ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o// 'dage
78b6(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khod do// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba
78b7(rgyud): su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// darang dang me tog chun pos brgyan// de dbus dkyil 'khor chen po ni// chu zhes bya ba'i med can no// de yi dbus su bad chen po// 'da' ma 'argya
79a1(rgyud): pa yid 'ong ba// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba// zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i mdog/ ral ba'i tsan pan 'dzin pa can// phyag ba'i ba
79a2(rgyud): zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas smras// sku rnams thams cad kun nas spro
79a3(rgyud): dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam la// de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// shaSha'i sde yi mthing dge ba// k+Sha yig don ldan sngon byung ba// rgyu mi don du rab sgrub byed// bzhi
79a4(rgyud): dbyangs kyis spyi bor mnan// me yi sa bon gsal bar byed// thig le sgra ni mchog tu sbyin// 'jig rten dbang phyug zhes bya'o mtshan// de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// 
79a5(rgyud): thal mo rab tu brkyang // bris pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bshad// dbyug gu ril ba spyi blugs bri// mdun du bgrang phreng pad ma yi// rgyal ba zla ba'i dkyil khar gzha
79a6(rgyud): pamatha' yas mchog/ phyag rgya mchog tu 'bar de dag/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ji ltar rigs par dgod par bya// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba// dkyil 'khor
79a7(rgyud): / gzhan ni rab tu bshad par bya// dpa' bo rin chen snying po yi// rdo rje rin chen zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo ba ni pa// rta babs bzhi

79b3(rgyud): gnas rnams su ni gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas dpa' ba thams cad kyis// de yi sngags su lings grags pa// bzhi pa'i sde yi dang 'o gang // me yis can gyis gsal byas//

79b6(rgyud): thig pazhi dang ni yang dag ldar// rdo rje phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus su na pa bzhi pa'i// 'khor lo bzhin du yongs bskor ba'o// de yi dbus su ba
79b7(rgyud): kha dog sna tshogs yongs 'bar ba// de yi dbus su brjon chen po// rdo rje sna tshogs yongs su mi// rdo rje khu tshur mid ni mdzes pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// 
79b8(rgyud): kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// sangs rgyas phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de yi sngags ni yang dag bshad// bcu gnyis pa yi dbyangs kyi mtha'// mya ngan 'das don legs gsal
80a1(rgyud): byas// sreg sogs rig ma thams cad kyis// de bzhin rang gi phyagra rgya yis// rdo rje'i rig khe yongs su ldan// sna tshogs bkra ba mchog tu 'bar// de yi dpa
80a2(rgyud): bskrar phyag rgya yis// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas// kun nas yongs su bskor ba yi// las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// lis kyi dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'a
80a3(rgyud): mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// shes rab ye shes 'khor lo che// sngags kyi yi ges rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu ma
80a4(rgyud): lte ba'i dkyil du ni// gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa// sku mdog dmar zhing 'dzum bcas pa// sna tshogs gzugs can ral gri can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// ral gri'i phreng
80a5(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// gsang sngags chen po yi ge lnga// de yi drung du legs par gnas// dbyangs kyi bcu gnyis gsang sngags ni// thugs gdu ni yang dag gnas// phyi rol nyid ni grub
80a6(rgyud): / theg pazhi dang ni yang dag ldan// ta babs bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor// sgo bzhi yis ni shin tu mdzes// shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyid// de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//

80a8(rgyud): rab ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ro// // de nas dkyil pa ror chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu
80b1(rgyud): de mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// bye yid dkyil 'khor breb bya// de yin du bri byab// chos kyi 'khor lo blan med// rten cing 'brel 'byung phreng ba ni// 'bad ba kyis
80b2(rgyud): bya// 'khor lo'i dbus su brtson chen po// de rgyu ni stobs po che// phyag 'azhi pa lan lnga bzhi ga/ rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa 'o// kha dag nag po gri'i 'arjod che// chos kyi 'khor lo
80b3(rgyud): bsor mdzad// de yi sngags kyur mengs pa ni// rgyu mi na dus sor bskyed// dbyangs drug dang ni yang dku rdzun// thig le phyi mos na ma bar bgyud// rang gi yi ge'i phreng ba che// 'khor lo gnyi
80b4(rgyud): rnam par 'gyur// de yi mdun du dung yin sa// rgyag tun grapar marjod par bya// de rje bal mo phyag rgya che// 'khor lo bzhin du rab tu gnas/ mchod pa thams cadangab tu brtag/ de ltar dkyil 'khor sngam bzhin//

80b7(rgyud): rab mkha'i mdzod// pad ma'i rgyal po rab tu bzhugs// zla ba'i mdog can gaN+DI brjid che// sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog/ gzhon nu rab tu 'arjid pa'i zhal// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tug
80b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas smras// rdo rje kyil 'khor brgyan par yang du// 'di yi gsang sngags gzi brji che// dbyangs dgu pa la leg le dang // nAd yis ni rnam par brgyan// sde tshan dang po
81a1(rgyud): ba la// thig le nA das rnam par brgyan// de yang gtso bo gsang sngags 'gyur// nam mkha'i mdod ni rabaskor ma dang // dega'i dkying 'khod byis nas ni// sngags kyi phreng
81a2(rgyud): ldan pa// ma lus pa yis rnams kun// thams cad nas ni nam mkha'i tshul// tog ni phyag rgya gyur pa de'i// de yin du ni ngas par 'acing // de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// nam mkha' yin

81a4(rgyud): 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad theg gdab bo// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// der yang rdo me yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor

81b1(rgyud): drugs kyu yes ni rnam pas mdzes// dbus su bcom ldan do rgyal// lugs kyul ni rab tu bshugs// phyag 'ani ba la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu 'bar// rdo lcags kyu

81b3(rgyud): dbyangs drug pa yis legs par phye// zla phreng thig les legs par brgyan// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya legs par sbyar// 'gugs par byed la don yod pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/

82a2(rgyud): chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje chags pa zhes su ba shad// gru bzhi pA la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par
82a3(rgyud): byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// chags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// thams cad dmar pos rab dregs pa// dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin// de yi dbus su pad chen po//

82a5(rgyud): can// de yi phyag rgya mchog tu ni// mdzes pa yin mda' gzhur 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i lus// 'gro ba kun la ches mchog gyur// de yi gsang sngags ma
82a6(rgyud): gyur pa// rdo rje chags pa mchog tu bde// sha Shir sde yi mthar gyur pa// k+Sha yai yi ge'i sngon du gnas// dbyangs dgu pa dang yang dag ldan// sngags kyi phreng bas yang dag brgya ni// 
82a7(rgyud): me tog mda' ni yongs su 'phen// re bathams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// de sti'i dkyil lakhor bris nas ne// sangs rgyas thams cad dab mchod byed// dod chags pa'i dkyil 'khor // 
82a8(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje legs pa zhes grags pa// gnyis su med pa'i dga' ba'ang 'phel// grubazhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// ta babs pazhes
82b1(rgyud): par bya ba// de yi dbus su cher mdzes pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa gru bzhi pa// de yi dbus su pad chen po// be 'bru yis ni nye bar mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang
82b2(rgyud): dka'abar// der gnas dpa' bo bsam par bya// rdo rje lags pa stobs pa che// dung dang kun du zla ba dkar// khab bzhi'i 'od ltar mdzes// legs so stsol ba tshim par mdzad// ting nge 'dzin
82b3(rgyud): rje sgeg mo sogs mchod pa// de bzhin me tog bdug pa sogs// sgo yi skyong ba nyid kyang ni// rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// gsang ba
82b4(rgyud): po mchog tu 'bar// ha yi yi ge sngon gang de// sems can don ni rab sgrub byed// thig le gnyis dang yongs su ldan// legs stsol pas ni rnam par gnas// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod
82b5(rgyud): thams cad rab tu bskor// bdag nyid dag pas gtsug pa sogs// thams cad yongs su spyad par bya// rdo rje legs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag
82b6(rgyud): bshad bya ba// rdo dwa ga 'i brjid shes su grags// rdo rje nyim blo gros ldan// byab ni pa la ske yin pa// rtababs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// theg bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khong dam pa
82b7(rgyud): ra bya// de se nang du bri bya ba// rdornga nyi ma 'od chen po// de rdo nyi ma'i steng du na// mug sum rnam pa las byung ba// de yi dbus su gzi 'arjid che// 'bang ba ye ni me lta bu// bed ma chen po 'das brgyang ba/ 
82b8(rgyud): be bru yis ni shin tu bangs// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// rdo gami brji stobs pom// bzang po'i mtshal dang mtshungs pa'i 'ang sgra rgya skyegs thub mtshungs pa'i mdog/ phyag 'ardeb la rnam bzhi pa// 
83a1(rgyud): rgyu pa na gyi bcas pa'o// de se sngags su mongs grags pa// can dmas su rgyas mtshungs pa nyi// dbyangs mig bdug na /

83b1(rgyud): yang dag ldan/ dkyil lalo chen 'a brelar bya/ dkyil la 'i na tu grum po ni// en dra nI la ma tshungs pa'i'o// de bzhin du mi da'i 'dzi can// phyag rgya lakhor los rnam par mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus
83b2(rgyud): // snron ka'i rnab 'du da// 'gyubam pa dag sgyu ma // rgyun nams kun na pa/ g.yin pa la na myu ba nI// da ga tums ca ldang dgAldan/ 
83b3(rgyud): thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje bzhad pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// bruM bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhes
83b4(rgyud): deme sa par gyug// tshig bzhid ni yang dag ldan// sa byad kyi ma'i ming yang dag bri// de'i steng du ma // bad ma rnams ma da byung // thug ma mchog tu mdzes pa/

84a1(rgyud): bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyong ba yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// de yi dbus su 'o che che// rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi dgra
84a2(rgyud): mubartson chen po// rdo rje bsrung ba yang dag zi// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhig// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan papo// bdog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// thams cad bsrung ba mchog tu dge/

84a4(rgyud): dri nA ngas brgyan par byas// kun nas kha dog du ma yis// yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya// sngags kyi phreng ba yongs su ldan// klog gi phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lta'i dkyil la
84a5(rgyud): khris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad rab bslab bya// rdo rje bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu ba shang bya ba// gru bzhi pa la skye bzhi pa/

84a7(rgyud): mcho// 'dub ma brgyud pa ying 'ong ba// de yi steng du ga'i brjid che// rdo rje 'tshur stobs pa rje// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// sna tshogs rgyan gyis btsun pa po// kun dbu dang nab
84a8(rgyud): sur de bzhin gshegs kun kye// sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur// rdo rje nyid du mnyam nyid mchog/ gnyis su me ba mchog gsang ga// khu tshur gyis ni spang bar bshad/

84b2(rgyud): lha'i dkyil lakhor bris nas ni// ngo du tshur mcho par bya// rdo rje 'a kur byed dkyil 'khor mo// / de la sogs pa mtha'am chog/ dkyil 'tshor mchog tu 'bar gyure// chos kyi dbyings

86b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi she rab kyi ye shes rdo rje 'duzhugs par gyur to// zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po shes rab ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar mdzad cing brtan par gyur

86b3(rgyud): mdzad nas sems can thams cad kyi'ang shes rab dang ye shes rnam par sbyangs te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bkug cing rjes su mnyes par byas nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par gnas te

88a1(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad don dam par mi spong ba dang / mi spong ba ma yin pa'i ched du rtogs par bya'o nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'di bkang
88a2(rgyud): sprus to// oMs mu/ prag+h+ra \u0f7f sar+b+ba thA ga tus mnyam d+hiSh+Tas b+h+rUM/ yang dag par srung brjod pa zhes bya ba shis rab kyi rol tu phyin pa'i ng+ge'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dun 'di
