88b7(rgyud): pa yam nyid kyi gams di de 'dzin la dang sbyang bas paka' sam / oMs sa rba k+Shi ti Ta tus pa d+ma sha~M hU~Mdz+dza hUM/ rjes su dran pa drug gi shes // rgyang chub kyi lam
88b8(rgyud): bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba la
89a1(rgyud): dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang
89a2(rgyud): byu chub kyi yan lag ste/ byang chub kyi yan lags nyam pa nyid skye ba mdo po'i mtshan 'a nas bya ba shes rab kyi rol// srin po ka stsam // i sahAtrAs d+ha N+ya ga
89a3(rgyud): dra pi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag par rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho
89a4(rgyud): ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// lam zad mi shes pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po la 'jug pa legs par so sor rig pa thams cad ma
89a5(rgyud): pa'i ye shes so// oM Ar+yaSh+Ti ga mAn ma Ta/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gsum ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pang
89a6(rgyud): don pa med pa'o// de la stong po snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhed/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / gsog dang gso bzhi rnam pa dang / rang 'azhin med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pasam
89a7(rgyud): gcig pa ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces brjod// de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ gang lnga mtshan mar mi byed pa dang / 'dod med pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / dri ba'i rnam pa dang / 
89a8(rgyud): bral rnam sems ci gcigs de sa ca meda'i sa byar// de ba ldan mad pa'i 'dzin nga nan/ me ga pa nas pa dang / sdug 'asngal rnam pa
89b1(rgyud): dang / mos ba sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sdug bsngala'i gon pa mi sor mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i spobs dang / 
89b2(rgyud): du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nul par gyur cig/ 
90a1(rgyud): mtha' las su mchang la nye bar bsgrubs ca gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha bstsa 'o// de rnam pathams cad du rnam shes mtha' las kyi mcher lam yang dag par 'das phung zad ma yod do nas chung ba
90a2(rgyud): ba'i skye mche la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba drug pa'o// de rnam pathams cad du rnying ming med ba'i phye ma cher lam yang dag par 'das te 'du shes med 'du shes med men skye mched
90a3(rgyud): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam 'thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang / mir ba 'gog pa'i snyoms
90a4(rgyud): 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// chos thams cad spros pa meng pa'i mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa/ bsam gtan med kyi
90a5(rgyud): bsam ga tan mengs mi yin pa snyoms par 'jug pa med pa ma yin pa 'di bka' stsas to// oM sa man+ta b+ha d+he sa d+ha sa b+hA ba'i shud d+heH/ waM/ gnas dang kan se ma yin pa dang bral ba zhes
90a6(rgyud): rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dmi bcas na chas 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs pa sangs mo rgyas so zhes
90a7(rgyud): bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan ci yang rung ste 'jig rten na chos dang
90b1(rgyud): sasu ba la song ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag med pa thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 
90b2(rgyud): 'khor ze nang dus gi'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rtenan dge ltung ngam/ bral ze'am/ g+ha'am bdud mtshangs pa'am/ skye dbu'i tshigs gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par
90b3(rgyud): bskor bar ni nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa 'ang gis dam bcas nas de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur te zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ 
90b4(rgyud): lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dku'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi
90b5(rgyud): dbar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro// gang yang bdag gi lam 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba 'i lam du bshad pa de yis nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te yang dag par sdug bsngal ba
90b6(rgyud): padang / yang dag par sdug bsngal mthar ba bar gal 'gyur zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye bu'i tshogs su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos pang ldan par rgol
90b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro shes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su min mo la la sogs pa 'i ltar gyur pa mams cad yongs su smos te brjod par bya'o// mi legs pa na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid deng
90b8(rgyud): de pa dang yer 'dzin pa dang bral 'i phyir ro// ma'i shar bya
91a1(rgyud): dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa dang rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
91a2(rgyud): de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar ni nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pom tog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dgo' ba dang / bdeb
91a3(rgyud): ran bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dka' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms su gnas te/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can bde ba lus kyis myong la
91a4(rgyud): 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan po'i bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas te// de bde ba
91a5(rgyud): nga spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde bsnga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med/ btang snyoms pa dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan
91a6(rgyud): zhipa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi/ 
91a7(rgyud): dpas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das
91a8(rgyud): ma par she ba mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bskyabs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung
91b1(rgyud): 'dam yong de nas cung bad med pa'i sgomatshang la nya bar bslabs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung 'ang med pa'i sumached mas yang dag par bdas te 'dugs meng 'du smras med min ma mched lam
91b2(rgyud): bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de nam pa mams cad du 'du shes me 'du shes mye sbyin snye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang / char pa 'gag pa'i snyoms dang 'a drug la 'byer bsgrubs
91b3(rgyud): gnas so// rnam par thar ba brgyad po dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob nas dngos por rtog par mi byed dngos po med par rtog par mi byed/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs so// 'di ni ma
91b4(rgyud): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mnyam pa nyid do// oM a nan+taHbi mo k+Sha mu khe shaM/ dngos po thams cad mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi
91b5(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi
91b6(rgyud): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu yin bdadud/ snron lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / skyobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi
91b7(rgyud): phyin pa dang / thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rab tu phyin pa dang / smras pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad
91b8(rgyud): kho na nyid kyi don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pad ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa
92a1(rgyud): nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ brtan pa'i rjes su rtogs pa'i sbyor bas so// oM sar+b+ba bAng+ka me ta aR+sha pa 'i khrur ti/ tsarmA dz+dzi taM/ thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes
92a2(rgyud): dbas pa rol 'a phyin pa'o// de las btsug shen/ rab tu dka' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od byed la nas bya ba dang / 'od 'gro ba zhes bya ba dang / spyad dka
92a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur ba zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhe 'a bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi smin zhes bya ba dang / sa thams cad de
92a4(rgyud): cig ste 'di ltar ye shes kyi don to// ye shes kyang ci yang med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa yi ge med pa don med pa/ gdod ma nas dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ 'ang gsal brjod pa dang bral ba zhes
92a5(rgyud): oM b+hU mi bi sho d+ha ne san+na d+ha pa ri pU ra Ni baM b+h+rUM/ sa yongs su spong ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub se
92a6(rgyud): dadapa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang / gnon nur sbyor pa dang las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye ba nas skye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang / bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / byir mi ldog par
92a7(rgyud): dbang bskur 'thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis sogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dor ba ste don dam par gnas pa gcig yin pa
92a8(rgyud): khyer te 'di ltar gnas pa med pa'o// i sar+b+ba bya ba stan pa gsuM hUM/ rnam par gnas pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems pa' rnams kyi dbang bcug
92b1(rgyud): tshol dbang ba dang / las la nga'ang ba dang / ye byad la dbang 'a dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam kha dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skyeb la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba
92b2(rgyud): dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o// dbang ba dang mi dbang ba dang rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba thams cad la dbang ba dbadu phyug thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa/ chos
92b3(rgyud): thams cad legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro// oM sar+b+ba ba shi he hUM traM hUM/ thams cad la dbang ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi
92b4(rgyud): dres pa bco brgya gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul ba mi mnga'o// ca com mnga'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs
92b5(rgyud): mAnga'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o// 'dun pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// dran pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'i/ 
92b6(rgyud): 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol bayongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa
92b7(rgyud): semanga'o// 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// da ltar byung ba
92b8(rgyud): ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gtsigs pa 'duna'o// mu 'a phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du gres skal shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi phrin las thams cad mi shes sngon sa
93a1(rgyud): ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'di chos rjes skye ba'i skur 'phro lags/ rgya dpal
93a2(rgyud): gtugs shing slob dpon rabazhi pa shes gnyen gyi 'grel pa dang yang bskrun nas/ zhus dag byas shing / mi btsas su mi rung ba re re tsam 'grel pa dang btun nos
93a3(rgyud): yar khral du blangs nas/ bu ston gyis bgyis pa'o// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de las bcu rnams ci zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med 'a zhes bya ba dang / 'ad phye
93a4(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros shes bya ba
93a5(rgyud): dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba'o// sa rnams thams cad don gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi don no// ye shes kyang don dam par ci yang med pa nyon mongs pa med pa 'gyur ba med padon yod
93a6(rgyud): pa gdod ma nas dag pa dri ma med pa 'od gsal brjed du med pa'o zhes pa'i don gang yin pa'o// oM b+h+yA me bi shod+ha ni san+naR+sha ba re lAng NI baM thAM/ sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab
93a7(rgyud): tu sbyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa bcu rnams ci zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang byis par gyur pa dang la sol dang rnal 'byor
93a8(rgyud): da pad skye ba skyed pa dang skyor bgran su ma tshogs pa dang / bsam pa tsun mtshogs pa ga / byor mi ldog sa dang / dbang bsrur ba thob po dang / skye ba gcig gis sogs pa ste/ 
93b1(rgyud): ba sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa ni don dam par na rnam par gzhag pa dang bral ba ste/ rnam par gzhag pa gcig nyid kyi phyir na 'di lta ste/ rnam par gzhag pa med pa'o// oM sa nA bya ba sma ra bi gte
93b2(rgyud): dpa par gzhag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu rnams ci nar/ tshol dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang po dang / mas
93b3(rgyud): la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skyab la dbang ba dang / stobs la dbang ba dang / chos la da'adra ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o// dbang rnams thams cad kyang don dam pa
93b4(rgyud): dad med pa'ang bzhin rnam par dben pa kun rdzob tu dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjes su zab pasdu chos legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi byed // oM sarbA ba shi ta N+Ta hU~M hUM/ dbang thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i
93b5(rgyud): sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams ci zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / thugs
93b6(rgyud): mnyam par ma gzhaga' med pa dang / tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran
93b7(rgyud): pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med cing rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzegs pa nyams pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la
93b8(rgyud): chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes
94a1(rgyud): gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngor du 'gro ning ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye
94a2(rgyud): kyekyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni yul thams cad du dus thams cad kyi tshe thams
94a3(rgyud): cad mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa ste/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir na shes rab yongs su dag pa'o// oM A we Ni ka bA r+d+ha d+harma sa ma te AHbI ra tAM/ 
94a4(rgyud): pa'adres pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// // de la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los mtshan pa nyid
94a5(rgyud): de'e phrag dang zhabs kyi 'thil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs stong can lte ba dang bcas pa me khyud dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa
94a6(rgyud): bas kyi mthil thams cad kyis sa gzhil reg cing de yang 'di'i rnam pa ni dma' ba dang dma'i ba ni mtho ba'o// phyag dpa na ras kyi sor mi rang pa'i rgyal po lta bur dra bas 'brel pa ste/ de bzhin gshe
94a7(rgyud): rnams kyi phyag dag dang zhabs de dag gser gyi mdog can gyi ri mo'i phreng ba rnams kyis rkang pa brgyad pa yinan du mdzes pa'o// phyag dang nabs 'jam ning gzhon sha chags pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'ang
94a8(rgyud): 'di'i phyag dang zhabs dag ras pa la 'jal po bzhin dang / skyes nas zla ba lon pa'i byis pa yinan du gzhon sha can dang / ka tsa li nad ltar 'jam pa reg na 'de ba'o// bdun mtho bar
94b1(rgyud): dang / 'bas gnyis dkang ba/ dag gong dag dang / mgrin pa'i phyogs gcags/ sang ma dang bste 'di 'i napas kyi sor ma rnams rim gyis rnyeng pa nyid do// rting pa yangs pa ste 'di'i ting ba che'ing
94b2(rgyud): rjes su 'tsham par yangs par 'gyur ro// su che zhing drang ba nyid de 'phye bo ma yin ning zhom pa ma yin/ ma tshang ba ma yin 'bras pa ma yin legs par skyes pa na ma 'a thams cad pa 'du
94b3(rgyud): dpa'i sras mtho 'di srid dang rjes su mtsha mo pa'i zhing du 'gyur ro// nubs 'brur mi mngon pa nyid de 'di'i bus mo dang long bu mtho bar 'gyur ro// rba rje'i rtse mo sngon du phyogs pa de/ 'di'i
94b4(rgyud): rnams rtse me gyen du phyogs par 'gyur ning ba spu rnams g.yas phyogs su 'khyil la 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te/ 
94b5(rgyud): / byin pa dgos e na ya'i lta bu ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dag zlum ba ri dgas e na ya rnams kyi lta bu'o// phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste rgyas shing ma btud pa nyid du phyag mthil
94b6(rgyud): dag gos rang gre bus mo'i lga nga la reg pa'o// 'doms kyi sku ba sbubs su nub pa ste/ sbubs kyis rab tu g.yogs pa glang po che'i gas gnas ltar bur 'gyur ro// spyi mdog
94b7(rgyud): 'drag ste/ 'di'i kha dog gser lta bur 'gyur ro pags pa srab bi ste shin tu'ajam pa gser shog lhur 'jam pa'i pags pa can du 'gyur zhing rdul med pa'ir bema' 'dzi 'o// sma rar
94b8(rgyud): nang skyes pa ste/ 'di'i bskul khung bur mu mis ra 'gyur ro// smi ma'i dbun na mdod su can te 'di'i smin mdag gi dbus rangs srung legs pa rgya bu dung bcag la ma ga car g.yas
95a1(rgyud): su 'khyil bar 'gyur te/ mdzod spu nyid kyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bu shin tu gsal bar byed do// sku stod seng ge lta bu ste/ 'di'i sku steng du yangs pa seng ge'i lta
95a2(rgyud): zar 'gyur ro// dbungagago zlum pa ste yongs su rnam pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur ro// thal gang rgyas pa ste/ 'di'i nye bar chug par 'gyur zhing gser shig bzhin du rnam par ga stsal
95a3(rgyud): do zhes pas na ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid de/ 
95a4(rgyud): pa dang ban kan la sogs pa rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par gsol ba'o// shing n+ya kro d+ha wAr ma chu gleng ga' ba ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mchu dang zhing dag mnyam pa'o// dbu/ 
95a5(rgyud): gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ da'u zlum par 'gyur zhing gtsug tor gdugs lta bus yas bkab pa gtsug tor yang shin tu mtho ba'o// ljags ring ba ste snyan gyi mtha'i bar du ljags kyi
95a6(rgyud): rnams reg par byed cing / dbu skra'i mthar thug par yang / dpral ba'i mthar ljags kyis khebs pa'o// tshangs pa'i dbyangs de 'khor stong phrag du mar dbyangs nang du ji lta ba
95a7(rgyud): deltar phyi rol tu 'ong pos shing bA ka la ping ka'i bzhin du snyan pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 'gram pa seng ge'i lta bu ste/ 'gram pa dag seng ge'i bzhin du zlum por 'gyur ro// tshoms
95a8(rgyud): dkar ba ste dung dang kun da dang zla ba'i kha dog can gyi tshems rnams so// tshems mnyam pa sta ha cang dma' ba ma yin ma tho ba ma yin mi mnyam pa ma yin pa'i rtse mo can gyi tshems rnam
95b1(rgyud): su 'gyur ro// choms zhags pabang ba ste choms rnams par med pa'o choms bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste/ choms 'og tu nyi shu dang / steng du choms nyi shu'o// sman mthon ma nyid ste/ spyan dga'i snga
95b2(rgyud): ba kang yin pa de shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te ri mo dmar po rnams dang / ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir la/ gang dkar po yin pa dkar po kho na shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rngam pa
95b3(rgyud): bu ste/ sman gyi rje ma rnams khyu mchog gi bzhin du gang 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang / gang steng ma yin pa de rnams steng / kho nar gnas pa ma 'dzings pa legs par gzhal ba'o// sems
95b4(rgyud): can 'ga' zhig rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mdog can du mthong ba 'ga' zhig rnams kyis shel gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis pad ma dgi' kha dog dang / 'a
95b5(rgyud): zhika rnams kyis in dra nI la'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyi sa ma ti ka dmar po'i kha dog can dang / 'aka' zhig rnams kyis dung dang kun dadang zla ba ltar dkar ba dang / 'ga' rdeg sa
95b6(rgyud): drog sna tshogs pa dang / 'ag zhig gis nam mkha'i kha dog can dang / 'ag nig gis khru phyed dang bcu gsum pa'i tshad dang / ji srid du dpag chad 'bum gyi chad ngam/ dpag tshad bye ba'i tshang
95b7(rgyud): du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'bum rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa rnams su snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yong
95b8(rgyud): su rgyas par mdzad pa dang / ji srid du me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rkyen bkod pa'i rgyam ma rnams snang bar byed cing / chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdu la gsus
96a1(rgyud): bya'i dbang las thams cad snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyangs kyis rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / stong gnyis dang gsum dang / ji srid
96a2(rgyud): nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i bar thams cad 'di dang / dbyangs kyis snang bar byas nas rnam par dag par mdzad pa dang / chos dang 'dra 'i dang / don mthun pa dang / don bya ba'i bsdus
96a3(rgyud): mamani rnams kyis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs shing / pha ni btagaso nas byang chub chen po la rab tu dgod par mdzad do// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa ga
96a4(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyis chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing mAnyamA pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan mngon par 'grub par blta bar bya'i mtshan ma yin pa
96a5(rgyud): mngon par 'grub pa ni ma yin no// byang chub mtshan nyid med pa nyid kyi kyir chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'dis ste stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no// de bzhin gshegs
96a6(rgyud): thams rgyad kyang stong sa nyid du mnyam pal// de bzhin gshegs pamams kyang dang / byung ba ba dang / chos rnams thams cad kyang mtshan ts+tshed gcigs/ 'diste/ sbyin ma ma
96a7(rgyud): / stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can/ zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can rnams so zhes pa'o// oM sa r+b+ba ta thA ga tra bar A kyA NA s+thA ma hA d+hAm+ba/ a mtshan thams cad sa nyaMm pa nyid ces
96a8(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// / dpe byad brgyad cu rnams ci zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sen mo langs kyi mdog lta bur 'gyur te/ san mo snum pa dang / sen ma
96b1(rgyud): ba dang / sen mo rnams zlum par gyur pa dang / ser mo rnams rim kyis phra ba dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / rtsa rnams mdud pa med pa dang / yong ba mi mngon pa dang / zhabs mi
96b2(rgyud): mnyam pa med par mtshungs pa dang / glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / g.yas phyogs su lag cing gshegs pa dang / drang par gshegs pa dang / 
96b3(rgyud): mdzes par gshegs pa dang / rim gyis gshegs pa dang / che zhing yangs la yongs su gyur pa'i bus ma'i lung can dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gom pa snyoms pa dang / sku ma pa
96b4(rgyud): dka' dang / sku 'jam pa dang / sku rnam par dang ba dang / sru zhum pa med pa dang / sru rku ba med pa dang / kun tu smod pa gtsang ba dang / khyu mchog ltar kun nas rab tu dad pa can dang / gzigs pa
96b5(rgyud): yoyongs su dag cir mngon par 'dod pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang / sku bum pa dang / skye skabs phyin pa dang / skume parnyongs pa dang / sku rgod gzhu'i lag cangs lta bu dang / lte ba zab pa dang / lte ba'i
96b6(rgyud): yo ba dang / lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / lte ba pogs pa med pa dang / yan lag dang nying la ka shin tu rnam par 'byis pa dang / bags pa skyon dang bral ba dang / gnag bag dang
96b7(rgyud): med pa dang / sku brtan pa dang phyag shing bal lta bu dang / phyag langs pa dang / phyag gi ri mo snyam pa dang / phyag gi ri mo ma ya ba dang / mchu'im ba lta bu dang / zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang / mnyen 'ang smra
96b8(rgyud): la dmar ba'i ljags dang / glang po che ring ngo can dang / snyan cing mnyan pa'i dbyangs dang / sgra phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs 'jam pa dang / shangs mtho ba dang / mche ba rnam pa dang / ma
97a1(rgyud): dkang ba dang / mche ba byin gyis zla ba dang / spyan gtsang ba dang / sman yangs pa dang / spyan mkhyen mthing dang / ji ma gnag pa dang / smin ma sdug pa dang / smin ma 'jam pa dang / snun
97a2(rgyud): dkar gnag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu dang / smin tshugs ring ba dang / smin mi'i sku nag pa dang / smin ma'i spu phra ba dang / smin ma rjes su mthun pa dang / kha dog ma nyams pa dang / snyan mi mnyan/ 
97a3(rgyud): ba med pa dang / snyan skyon dang bral ba dang / dbang po thams cad mnyams shing skyon dang bral ba dang / yongs su rdzogs shing mthol mchog tu gnas pi la zhal gdong dang / dpral ba can dang / 
97a4(rgyud): turgyas pa dang / dbu skra gnag pa dang / dbu skra sdug pa dang / dbu sgra 'jam pa dang / dbu sa dri nim pa dang / dbu skra mnyam pa dang / dbu skra snum pa dang / dbu skram 'khrums pa dang / dbu skra
97a5(rgyud): ma'akhrugs pa dang / dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang g.yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa dang / rgyal mtshan yang dag par gnas pa dang / dpral bdud lta bu dang / dbu mchog tu mtho ba dag gtsug
97a6(rgyud): tor lar 'phags pa dang / dbu gdugs kyi rnam pa can dang kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i dpe byad can mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa gsal phye
97a7(rgyud): gsal byed ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad gsal byed med par mnyam pa nyid larab
97a8(rgyud): chos dang ldan pa la lags par rab tu gnas pa/ dus gsum gyi dpe byad mnyam pa nyid/ rdo rje lta bu mnyam pa nyid thob pa stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad dang / dpe byad mnyam pa nyid thob po ga nyi
97b1(rgyud): bu med pa'i don la legs par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams so zhes pa'o// oM a nu prany+dza na sa ma ta srasu pra tiSh+Tha ha badz+ra d+hun cu pa a/ dpe byad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
97b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po can la legs so zhes bya ba rnams kyis mnyes par
97b3(rgyud): oM byang chub sems chen khyod legs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ sangs rgyas chos ched khyod legs so// ting 'dzin dbang du 'jug pa yi// de rje ye shes khyod legs so// 
97b4(rgyud): rdorje sems ched khyod legs sa// tshad med ched du khyod lags so// shes rab dam pa'i ched du yang // mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// sangs rgyas sngams ma gsungs pa'o// de nas
97b5(rgyud): ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba bzhi yis mngon par dgyes par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kun khyod la phyag 'tsham// cho
97b6(rgyud): sku yi mchog gi mchog/ gdod ma'i sngags kyi don nyid la// rdo rje ye shes stobs chen la// shin tu sgrib med zhi ba la// rdo rje chos rnams lags gnas pa// theg pa chen po'i go
97b7(rgyud): 'phang theb// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi lha// gdod nas dag pa dpa' 'tsho// dbang phyug dam pa mchog gi mchog/ dam chos mchog tu 'gyur ba med// bde gshegs de rna
97b8(rgyud): phyag 'tshal zhes pa'o// nam stu te/ oM bad+yA d+hAnam s+'u te swA hA/ 'di ni brjod pa tsam nig gos/ sangs rgyas thams cad ngab mtshad pa'o// zhes pa'o// danas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
98a1(rgyud): mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nges nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dngos grub thams
98a2(rgyud): cadakyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus pa mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug
98a3(rgyud): sa cad 'khor lo bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor kyi dbang phyug chen pos gas
98a4(rgyud): ba btab pa'i gsung gis de ma thag kho nar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la pos te bka' stsal ba/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po nyon cig ces
98a5(rgyud): de nas 'di las yang dag bshad// byang chub dkyil 'khor bla na med// rdo rje ye shes gsang ba mchog/ sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi'o// dben pa'i bgazhi nyams dga' ba// me tog
98a6(rgyud): dbas rnam brgyan pa// kun tu sna tshogs cha ba'ang ba// kun tu sna tshogs sdom par ni// kun nas sna tshogs bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ri yi mchog gam grong khyed ni/ 
98a7(rgyud): der gnas sngags pas dngos grub mchog/ gal te 'dud na yang dag bri// gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas// ri stangs rnams su kun nas ni/ 
98a8(rgyud): yangs rgyas kun kyi bya ba rnams// dam pa 'dzi du bsgrub par bya// mamo'i gnas dang ni pa'i gnas// du khrod mya la gnas suni// rdo rnga 'i dzin rgya bya ba rnams// don dam pa sa
98b1(rgyud): pa bya// n+d+he myed pos tshal kun dang // chu bo 'dus pa rnams su la // phyag na pad+ma dpal bya ba// dam pa don du 'asgrub par bya// rgyal bya'i pho brang nyams dga' dang // rgyal po'i skyed tsham/ 
98b2(rgyud): // dadza dzin chen de yin// rin chen bya ba rnams bslab bya// rtags gcig sa dang bgrang gonas// rgyu krung 'dus pa rnams su yang // sna tshogs bya ba thams cad rnams// dpa'i don du bsgyu/ 
98b3(rgyud): par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // lha rnams gnas mchog kun tu'o// nam mkha' 'am phyogs gzhan du// gang du mnyam par gzhag pa der// rtag pa bsod nams mchog gyur pa/ 
98b4(rgyud): pa thathams cad bskyeb par bya// phyogs kun mnyam nyid gnas dkyil 'khor// shes rab can gyis mig gda' bya// shar g+ho rub dang byang rnams kyi// phyogs su dkyi lnga 'khor theg brgyad pa/ 
98b5(rgyud): de mi phyi ru 'khor lo mo// kha dog lnga ba cher 'bar ba'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis mdzes pas// sna chags gli dang me tog phreng // rnga yab sogs kyis rnam brgyan pa// dkyil
98b6(rgyud): 'khyung kun la gnas pa yi// swA~M dang sgo khyung mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis smras// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// dkyil tsho 'di 'i dbus chu ni// gal te dngas rgyuH/ 
98b7(rgyud): mchog 'dad na// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ma gnas pa// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bri bar bya// shar du bcom ldan la byor mocan// rdo rje mams dpa' stsang da ga rdzun// 'khor lo bsgyur ba thams cad ni// 
98b8(rgyud): theg par bcas padun bribya// ma rug cu gtor da dpa 'i// rin chen 'bar ba yang dag ldad// gtsug tor dkar ba'i sa na// de jig ci 'arjid la sogs bri// byad du 'artson 'grus chen po me/ 
99a1(rgyud): brjid phung po slobs po che// sna tshogs rdo rje segs bcas pa// rim pa kun nas bri bar bya// de rjernal 'byor can gyis ni// dbang phyug mgon po'i nub phyogs su/ 
99a2(rgyud): gtsug tor rgyal ba brtson 'grus che// rdo rje chos sogs dang bcas pa// thams cad sngags pas bri bar bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na'o// dpeng ldan phyogs su 'phags pa gnas/ 
99a3(rgyud): mematshams su ni char 'phags so// bden bral du ni rnam rgyal nyid// rlung du de bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sems dpa' kun gyi mdun du ni// zla ba'i nga
99a4(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas pa// gsal ning 'bar 'khrigs 'od zer can// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor rnams su ni// mchod pa rnams ni gzhag byas te// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// de bzhin
99a5(rgyud): gzugs sgra la sogs dang // bdug pa la sogs gsang chen no// skra skyong ba ni bzhi yin te// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// kun thubazang po sngags rnams bre// de ltar dkyil 'a
99a6(rgyud): ste// mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin// de bzhin 'jug pa sogs byas la// sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs// dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las// snga ma
99a7(rgyud): ji bzhin du// phyi nas de bzhin bre bar bya// bsod nams ji bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams// thams cad mtshon gyis rab brtags pa// rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngo bos// dkyil 'khor bams
99a8(rgyud): byar 'gyur// rang lha'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor kyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu grub// cho ga dman dang lhag pas kyang // 'grub par 'gyur te skyon ma min// kun tu sna tshogs bskal bzang ba// 
99b1(rgyud): kun nas sna tshogs 'khor lo can// 'khor los sgyur ba bdag nyid che// rin chen bdun gyi mchod pa che// yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla bskur// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi 'byung shes bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje
99b2(rgyud): sogs kyi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad byas pa'o// phyug na pad ma bdag nyid che'o// pad ma'i rnam par rtag shes bya// rin po che ze rin chen rnams// dkyil 'khor sngo tshogs rnam pa'o// dkyilal
99b3(rgyud): dman zhing dam tshig rnams// dor bar byas pa de nyid ni// gsang ba shes pa ma yin na// sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'grub mi 'gyur// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor thams cad lta ba ni// gal
99b4(rgyud): dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gdon mi za bar rtag tu bya// bla ma la ni yon phul nas// rjes su rim dang bsgrub par bya// brtan pa 'am ni g.yo ba yi// rdzas rnams ji snyed thams cad de// rtsa ba me tog
99b5(rgyud): bu sogs// bu mo legs par brgyan byas dang // 'dod pa'i chung ma phul byas nas// slar yang rin gyis bslu bar bya// grong dang de bzhin gtsug la ga khang // kun dga' sogs rgyal srid mchog
99b6(rgyud): basbyin bya cung zad yod// 'tsho bde ni sbyin par bya// bdag gi ngom po yongs gtong ba// sangs rgyas thams cad ma mchod pa'o// bla ma la ni lon phul nas// gsang ba dam pa chad byung ba/ 
99b7(rgyud): par dbang bskur de nas bya// 'dab ma brgyad pa yid rlong pa// slob ma gzhag nas yan lag kun// phyag rgya kun nasra bcings byas nas// khams kun rang bzhin rtsa ba dang // sa phan 'bras bu chung pa 'i
99b8(rgyud): bus pa rnams kyis dbang bskur de// sangs rgyas phreng ba'i dbang ma skum las// skye bo dang ning dbral ba dang // ga gad nga nga yizhin rgyab tu yang // sangs rgyas rin chen chen po kus// cod pa na mchog tu mi du
100a1(rgyud): dpal ldan sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu// gdugs dkar snyeng na gnas pa'o// rgyal sred kun gyi 'ang 'gyur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// dpal kun gyis ni mngon mthob/ 
100a2(rgyud): zhes phyi'i dbang bsdung ba sha pa'o// khams can rang zhin grang yod// ni mchog tu 'ab ba'am// snying ge'i gdan gnas dbang btur ba// dpam gyi sngags ni rjod da cing // dpal
100a3(rgyud): / dam pa'i don gyi dbang bsgyur ba// bkra shis sam ni dpal be'u// gang yang bris nas dbang bskur bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rnam rgyal dbang bskur
100a4(rgyud): shes bshad do// tsan dan chu dang bum pa che// gzhan gyis mi thub sman blugs pa// kun nas dbang bskur ched du ni// rtag tu shes rab can gyis brtag/ gzhan gyis mi thub dbang bskur mo che
100a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor grang gang bris byas nas// phyag rgya gang dang gang bkod pa// deng ni de dang de brtag bye// de rnams phyag sbed ma par bshad// dbang bskur ched du sangs rgyas rnams// lha de ma na
100a6(rgyud): du'ong // sman gyi dam pa mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bshad// tsan dan dang ni rgya spos dang / ga bur de bzhin gur gum dang // a ka ru dang lha yi shing / tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni/ 
100a7(rgyud): g+h+ri de bzhi na mchog/ kun nas sa hade ba dang // gi ri ka ra Na tshangs mchod sbyin// sman gyi dam pa rnams su bshad// lhag gnas kun gyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchod pa rab 'jug cing
100b1(rgyud): po ni// sangs rgyas byin brlabs rnal 'byor las// dbang bslar don du rab brtag bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnab 'byor che// dbang bsgyur dam pa 'od 'byur ba'o// sangs rgyas kun nas sangs
100b2(rgyud): 'gyur zhes pa'o// dpal rdo snying po rgyan gyi rgyud du ji ltar rnyed pa yongs su rdzogs so// rigs gzugs skal bzang mang zas blo 'byor sogs// pun tshogs ldan pa dpal ldan ches je yis/ 
100b3(rgyud): rgyud 'di bskur las cung zad ma rdzogs pa// dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas rdzogs par bsgyur// ye d+har+m+mahe tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba dad teShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM pA dI ma hA shwa ma NaH/ 
100b4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba ts+tshabing shi ta ka prad+d+he tI mai tA mu kha nA ma ma hA yAn suH/ bad skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i ma
100b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos 'dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi zom la lha thams cad kyi mtshan mo'i gnas
100b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu gzugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lha dang / lha'i bu dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lnga dang / nam mkha' lding dang / klu dang / 
100b7(rgyud): sbyin dang / mi'am ci dang / srin po dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / lag 'dren dang / sha ba dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma ma'i tshogs shin tu mnganade rgya che ba dpag tshad lnga
100b8(rgyud): 'khor du 'dus pa shastag dang / dge slong srud nyis brgya lnga bcus bskor cing mdun du 'dar nas chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lagan du rdo rje'i rigs sems cadas
101a1(rgyud): yongs su bskor/ rigs pa'i tshogs dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad dang / reg sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ 
101a2(rgyud): snang las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
101a3(rgyud): gisang ba'i bdag po chen po legan rdo rtul bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyi shA rtsa lnga po 'di dag ning 'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yin no// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
101a4(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// oM byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// 
101a5(rgyud): bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// mi 'gog pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// e skye bar 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM rnam par shes pa thams cad shes
101a6(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma'o// oM 'bar ba chen po'i chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM brtson 'grus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// saM thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyis
101a7(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// maud ji thams cad brtan pa'i sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// yid bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM rang bzhin rnam par dag
101a8(rgyud): pa'i chos nyid ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM las rnam par spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// mongs par gnod mdzes rdo rje can phaT shes rab kyi sa
101b1(rgyud): ro phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM 'dod pal 'dod chags rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ske'o// oM ma gyogs pa'i rdorje can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM hUM thams cad 'gro ba shes rab
101b2(rgyud): sbyin sa d+hI rtog/ mas nas na ts+tsho ba sa sbyin yi 'o// mi shes 'i pa sa sbyi pa gas kyi ma phyin pal
101b3(rgyud): shAm pa hUM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// 
101b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyigasu das par dag pa shes rab pa rol phyin pa'i spyo'o// maud pazhini gshegs pa 'ams cad kyi thugs rje shes rab kyi pa ma gyi phyin pa'i sgra'o// 
101b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / 
101b6(rgyud): de bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi ngas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra te shucas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen tu
101b7(rgyud): mdo rdzogs s+ho// skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la bab pa/ #// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya gu hA ma Ni ti la ka nA ma sU tra/ bod spyad du/ 'phags pa gsang ba nor bu thig le zhes bya ba'i mdo
101b8(rgyud): ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi rdul rtog pa med pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
102a1(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan khams
102a2(rgyud): gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par khong du chud pas las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams
102a3(rgyud): sam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa/ thug pa rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad rtag pa dus gsum gyi dam tshig la rnam par gnas pa'i sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
102a4(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsnyen cing bstod pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i rtse mo khang pa brtsegs pa// bdog rnam par bkra'i 'dril bu dang ldan pa/ rlung
102a5(rgyud): 'aspyod pa 'dar gyi ba dan dang / me tog gi chun po dang / dra ba dang / dra'i phyed pa dang / zlab pa nye bar mdzes pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i khang babang sen bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa'
102a6(rgyud): grag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na jo dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / do khu tshur dang / byang chub kyi
102b1(rgyud): 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu ltar 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su gang
102b2(rgyud): 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing mthong bar gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na yang chos kyi tshul 'di nyid ston par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdza namam
102b3(rgyud): khams thams cad la sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rtag tu bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag par bskyod pa'i rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems
102b4(rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po nam mkha' thams cad la 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
102b5(rgyud): par yongs su mkhyen pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag gi rang bzhin dag pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad legs
102b6(rgyud): gzigs pa'i ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i spyod pa'i mchog tu gyu ra pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i ye shes mdzad pa dang ldan pas de basbyin
102b7(rgyud): bathams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i thugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gugs pa 'dam tshig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa'i ye shes bye dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gagan
102b8(rgyud): cad kyi legs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che chen pos dbang bskur pa'i rin po che dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
103a1(rgyud): cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rin po che'i tog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad gad chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba chen po'i chos dang / de 'dzin
103a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'akhor lo chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gsu chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
103a3(rgyud): tshogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsrung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su skyong ba'i rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
103a4(rgyud): ba phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes dang ldan pa ste/ kun tu babang dang don yod pa// 'chi med rab tu dga' ba'i gtso// nam mkha'i snying po gzi brjid che// rin chen tog ste cher 'dzum pa// spyan ras gzigs dang
103a5(rgyud): phrug che// 'jam dpal kun gyi snying po dang // brjod bral sna tshogs pa yi las// dpa' 'og tu mapo dam por 'dzin// rdo rje lcags kyu mda' tshim pa// rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum// 
103a6(rgyud): mdzes pa'i 'khor lo gsung // las dang chos dang 'jigs byed 'dzin// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// ma rungs khro dang bzod pa che// gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan// gzi chen dpa' bo khyab pa
103a7(rgyud): snga mra'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon// 'jug sreg rgyal 'dod thub pa che// 'jig rten skyod dadama' 'dangs// 'jig rten gsum dang kham so gsum pa// 'byung chen sems can don rab mdza
103a8(rgyud): dasems can pa chen po// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das dang brtag/ yang dag mtsho dang mchod chen po// sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che// srid 'a gsum po'ang de yin no// de dag la sogs pa
103b1(rgyud): tan bye ba brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te dkyil 'khor chen po de la bzhugs nas chos ston par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dang
103b2(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te 'khod nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i ba
103b3(rgyud): ldan 'das mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i thig le zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bka' stsal du gsol/ gang gis sems can rnams la gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig de bdag
103b4(rgyud): bshad par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo
103b5(rgyud): gsang ba'i dam pa gang gis sems can thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de bshad par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang
103b6(rgyud): ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po gang gis bdag gsang ba'i bdag por 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
103b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag 'os de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad mi phyed
103b8(rgyud): ma dzang de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad dang ma phyed par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'ade nyid la ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e ma'o 'dag ni thabs chen po// 5
104a1(rgyud): gsang bzhig le yi// ting 'dzin gang phyir klu' ba yang // gsang ba nyid ni nu bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu babang po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs gnas 'thon
104a2(rgyud): nas phyag rgya lakhod par gyur ba su yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso te/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu gse pa'i thigs zhes pakyi bci lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
104a3(rgyud): rje rab tu gsang ba'i thig le 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'o// 
104a4(rgyud): / de bag na ba myed pa'o// de bzhi gas 'i ga sa ma sa na mo//  zhin gshegs kyi
