164a5(rgyud): yang byang chub sems sa brgyad pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul ni/ chos rnams thams cad mi dmigs shing // srid dang skye ba rnams spangs pa'o// 'jig rten sku
164a6(rgyud): paltar shes nas// 'dug rten 'jig rten dbang du 'dud// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang nyan thos dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i sa la gnos pa rnams skye ba dang 'jig par rtogs
164a7(rgyud): nas mtha' gnyis pashig pas chu ma dmigs pa'i phyir/ shin tu dngos po med pa'i ye shes me spyod de 'di ni nyan thos rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo// gsang ba par
164a8(rgyud): dag po rang sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par bshig nas brjod du med pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas pa rnams ni chos thams cad brjod du med do snyam pa'i ye shes 'du
164b1(rgyud): ngag shin tu 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par dag par byed pa 'di ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo// gas ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang 'jig rten pa
164b2(rgyud): mas rgyu las 'bras bu dang las las 'byung ba'am// ldog par rtog cing gzhan gyi dbang gis stong pa nyid kyi ti dzin kun du skye bar 'gyur te 'di ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
164b3(rgyud): la lo// gsang ba pa'i bdag bo// 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul// yin te de la gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas dang ni rang sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba rnams dang // nyan thos nges
164b4(rgyud): sdug bcom par// grags pa gang dag yin pa dang // ming ga rten pa yi lha gang yin// gsang sngags spyad pa'i cho ga'i tshul// sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// dpa' bo de tshe 'chad pa
164b5(rgyud): nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po// gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid nyon cig/ bcom ldan
164b6(rgyud): daltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ce sngagasang pa ba'i bdag med la/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsang sngags ni// tshig dang ming dang bdes
164b7(rgyud): tr-in// tshig de dbang du gyur pas na// gsang sngags de rnams thams cad sgrub// kha cig bskul pa'i tshig dang ldan// kha cig rang ming thog mar spos// hUM dang phaT dang ldan pa ni// gtsug tor rnam
164b8(rgyud): kyiyin par bsgrags// chung ba tshom shig ces pa dang // brdzun cang drang cig ces 'de// ga bstan rnams dang bral yi// gsang rdzags med pa dren pam gsungs// nam su sbrul lags ldan/ 
165a1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin ni rtogs pas mtshan// zhi ba'i yi ge rnam par dag/ re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// gsang sngags sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa
165a2(rgyud): ba'i yin// nyan thos rnams kyi gsang sngags ni// gcig po gni ni gcig la gnas// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dud bzhin te// khyad par dag ni bshad byan// ting nge 'dzin gyi
165a3(rgyud): khyad par las// las che rnam par spyod zhes bya// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang gsang sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma byas/ byed du ma btsug
165a4(rgyud): rjes su yi rang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir na na/ 'di ni/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / mabyung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid de na
165a5(rgyud): nas gnas pa ste// de yang 'di ltar gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi chos nyid do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen
165a6(rgyud): thams cad gizags pa 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe/ chos nyid de tshul sna tshogs dang dgongs pa sna tshogs kyis/ sems can bsam pa sna tshogs pa rnams la tshig sna tshogs pa rnams yi
165a7(rgyud): 'bru sna tshogs dang / yul gyi nges pa'i tshig tu brjod pa sna tshogs dang / dbyangs sna tshogs su ko rnams su byin gyis rba rlabs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshul 'chad do// ci ltar na de bzhin gsheg
165a8(rgyud): pa rnams gsang sngags kyi tshul lig 'bru dag tu byin gyis dro'o can/ gsang ba'i'i bdag po// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal 'bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar yang
165b1(rgyud): dag par bsgrubs pa'i bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa na dang de banan gshegs pa'i stobs btu dang pa
165b2(rgyud): phyin pa drug dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che 'dun dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang ngag yin pa dang / gsang ba pi'i bdag po// mdor na
165b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs dang / sngon gyi smon
165b4(rgyud): byed pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi byin rlabs kyi stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ sems can rnams la skal pa ci lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags kyi cho ga yang dag
165b5(rgyud): par rab tu ston to// gsang sngags kyi cho ga de yang gang zhe na/ gzod nas ma skyes pa'i phyir a ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// dgongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir kwa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 
165b6(rgyud): mkha' dang 'dra bar dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ kha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 'gro ba thams cad dmigs su med 'i phyirag ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// gcig tu 'phangs pa dmigs su

165b8(rgyud): dmigs su med pa'i phyir nga ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// dri ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir d+ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// nga rgyal dmigs su med pa'i phyir Ta ni chos thams cad kyin / 
166a1(rgyud): pa dgrags su med bai ldan chos thams cad kyi na'o// 'khrug pa pa rigs su med pa'i byarahrIr+g+haMs thams cad kyi sgo'o// bsrub yongs su zas

166a3(rgyud): su med pa'i phyir da ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir d+ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// don dam pa'i bden pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir pa ni chos thams
166a4(rgyud): ro// lbu bA dang 'dra bar snying po med pa'i phyir pha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// dag gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// srid pa thams cad dmigs su me
166a5(rgyud): pa'i phyir blo ni chos thams nad kyi sgo'o// 'chi ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ma ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// theg pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyi min+do thams cad kyi sgo'o// 
166a6(rgyud): rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ra ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir lan chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rang bzhin gyis zhi'i phyir sha ni chos thams
166a7(rgyud): dkyi sgo'o// rang bzhin gyis blu ni pa nyid kyi phyir Sha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// bden pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir sa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rgyud migs
166a8(rgyud): phyir ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// gsang sa pa'i bdag po// nga dang nya dang Na dang na dang man ting nge 'don thams cad la dbang lhung ba ste mthu thams cad dang lda pa/ rab tu
166b1(rgyud): sbyar bar dgos pa'i don rab tu sgrub par byed pa yin no// gsang ba'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi tshul ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di ni rab thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya
166b2(rgyud): debazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyi mi khyab pa// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa// gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi don nges

166b4(rgyud): nas// bsam las 'bras bu sbyin par byed/ 'di ni de nyid dam pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bstan// gsang sngags cho ga 'di shes nasI/ sngags pas dngos grub
166b5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ sgra zhes bya ba de nyid mchog/ gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags mtshan// sngags pas yid la sems na ni// 'chi 'pho med pa'i gnas 'thob po// de nas
166b6(rgyud): ldan 'das la gas ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi
166b7(rgyud): nges bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags te// bcom ldan 'das gang dag gsang sngag
166b8(rgyud): tshal 'di la dad pa'i sems can de dag kyang // thun mong ma lags pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi yo byed kyi cho ga bshad
167a1(rgyud): gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas sngags pa de las su// me tog ser po
167a2(rgyud): bo dmar/ yid du 'ong bas nan tan du// lha rnams la ni mchod pa bya// pad ma'am la ngan ud pa la// nA ga ges dbun ga/ tsas pa ya sho ta l-i ka/ btal dang sa la'ang rung // de la sogs pa'i metog
167a3(rgyud): rnams// yid du 'ong zhing ltan sdug/ bkra shis pa la sngags pa yis// mkhas pas nan tan mchod par bya// tsan dan ta gar sI kra dang // gur kum dang ni ru s+ya'ang rung // spos mchog rab tu bzang pon
167a4(rgyud): tshogs yid du 'ong ba dbul// a ga ru'am smon shing ngam// ga bur dang ni tsan dan dang // sal 'thang chu bkra shis pa'am// shi rabs ka yang rung // gzhan yang bdug spos sna tshogs pa// bkra she
167a5(rgyud): 'jig rten rnam grags pa// yid 'o sngags pas cho ga bzhin// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nas gzhan yang sems dpa' che// la ba shos lus kyi cho ga nyon// 'i thug 'bras chan ko slar nas/ 
167a6(rgyud): la lug dang na mkhur skya dang // gong bod kar yid 'ong dang // kha 'di'i bca'ab bzang po dang // pu ri ka dang kA ri ka/ de bzhin mthu shir dang // phen ma shog par ti dag par ba ta yang dbul par bya'o// de la sag
167a7(rgyud): ba'i baba' ba dang // shing tog nams ni sna tshogs dang // hwags dang 'i khar rnams dang // bu ram spang rtsi mar dag dang // btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // zhe dang 'o ma rgyas par dbul// mar me rnam pasna

167b1(rgyud): po rnams kyang ni// dril bu dang bcas rab tu dbul// yang na yid kyi mchod pa ni// thams cad nan tan bskyed de bya// de nas bum pa brgyad dam ni// bcu drug rgyas par blangs nas su// sman dang rin chen tha

167b8(rgyud): ba 'char ka lta 'u la// bdag dkar po gzhag par bya// skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar de// de ni sa me tog 'dod du gtsug/ me tog gang la bab pa de// sngags pas de la sbyin par bya// dkyil

168a3(rgyud): kyil 'khor gnyis pa'i rgya ba rol gyi// dkyil lo bar gyi ni dbus kyi char// ma yengs pa yi sems kyis bya// me thab khru ga tsam gyi ni// tshad du rab tu bsgrags bya phyi

169b8(rgyud): kur po la// yid kyis nang du bcug nas ni// de la dam tshig bstan par bya// do ngarang pan cid bu khyod kyis// dam 'a'i chis dang byang chub mi mis// srog gi phyir yang de byin cid// yongs
170a1(rgyud): btang bar ma bya'o// khyod kyis ser sna dang ni gang // sems can gnod pa mi bya'o// dam tshig 'di dag sangs rgyas kyis// brtul zhugs bzang po khyed la 'ashad
170a2(rgyud): ci ltar rang gi srog bsrung ba// de ltar khyod kyis 'di dag ba sungs// slob mas bla mi'i rkang pa la// dad cing gus par phyag byas nas/ shin tu nges pa'i yid kyis ni// de dag tham
170a3(rgyud): khAs blang ngo // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gdu snang rje chen po 'thung
170a4(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'di'ang mi tshig la zhugs par gyur pa de bsod nams ca tsam zhig mngon par 'dus 'gyis par rig par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom
170a5(rgyud): 'das kyis gsang ba po'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'dra skad ces bka' stsal pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung ste de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par
170a6(rgyud): 'dus byas pa ci tsam pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mngon par 'dus byas pa yang de tsam du rig par bya'o// gsung ba pa'i bdag 'o// rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod
170a7(rgyud): kyis 'di ltar blta ste/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mi da'i srid shin gshegs pa'in la dang thugs las skyes pa'i sras yin pa rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de drag phyog slag
170a8(rgyud): gnas pa dang de bzhin gshegs pas chen po degongs ma dgas par 'gyur ro// gsang sa pa'i bdag po// de zla bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'dod 'i'i rigs kyi bu dang
170b1(rgyud): bu mo rnams kyis de dag la mchod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar 'dod pa rnams kyi sa dag la blta bar bya'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang kun du bzang po la
170b2(rgyud): pabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis mgri gcig tu rtsig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das deng sran cad rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mod rnams la rim gror bgyi zhing mchod par brtse
170b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su blta bar bgyi ba la gas so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par

170b6(rgyud): ra ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa/ thogs pa med pa'i rtog pa la gnas pa dus gsum du chags pa med pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dag yod do//

170b8(rgyud): de bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rnam par sprul pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgya
171a1(rgyud): kye zhing kun du g.yogs nas/ chos rtsa mtshan gyi can rgya chen pa yong bu dag pa'i rtsem lam cub ni bya ba te 'dun pa snyoms zhugs maldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu nas
171a2(rgyud): 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ chos kyi dbyings khyab pa sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stobs chen mo bsrung ba chen

171a5(rgyud): gyur pa'i mig gdangs nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sman sngar ni// yid busa'i tshig smras pa// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bsrung ba rab tu stobs chen 'di// sems can tham/

172a1(rgyud): ra 'gyur ba lags// gsang sngags gru bapa'i rten yang // srog 'dren rnams ni ma mchis 'gyur/ nags sngags rnams kyang ci ltar bskung // de 'i 'bras bu ci dras 'gyur// dgra dag

172a6(rgyud): legs par byas nas su// kham por gyis ni dgab par bya// kham phor ri rab chen po ru// yang dang yang du bsam par bya// de yi snying du a zhes pa// klung gor bcas pa rgyas par bsam// rlung ba

172b2(rgyud): sngags pa mi g.yeng bas// de dag phun bus gda' bya ste/ mkhas pa rdo rjer gyur nas su// thams cad rdo rje phur bus btab// yang na 'gegs rnams thams cad ni// zhi bar bya ba lang bshad de// sngags

173b3(rgyud): sem sna pa 'akun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi yum zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stobs sems pa med pa'i gas sngags sbas pa/ ni maHsa man ta bud d+hA rnam

175a8(rgyud): mam dpa' thams cad kyi'o// na bya pa su su nAn/ du num snga das yul sa ldan pa ga ta AhrI sa ru na sa/ rgosu mi gas ka' ba zhes bya ba'i'o// da mi man ta bad+hA na/ ma
175b1(rgyud): a b+hi ru kha kr-is+t+ra rA da ya ki ni tsi rA la si sa ma la' nu m+ba na hA zhungs mngon du phyogs pa'i'o// na man+tas man ta bud+d+hA nAnA/ sarbA tra a nu ga te/ ban d+ha sI nA~M ma hA sa ma ya ni ra dzA ti s+pha ra Ne a bri ti ha te d+ha kad+ha ka tsar

175b6(rgyud): sa 'i/ bog na /  ldanan na gags ga pan kyim ldan nam khyen po //  maSh+TAn te/ 
176a1(rgyud): na du po'i'o// ma ldamams ba dz+nyAnan hUM/ rnam par yo tsho'o// namathas man ta dz+nyAn+dan d+ha// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i'o// namatha ma man tu nan ma'i'o// namathas man ta bu
176a2(rgyud): ma can pa'i'o// nam sa man ta bu d+hA nan de'i/ nye sa can mi'al// na maHsa man ta brtu dz+nyAnan mi'i/ sna tshogs kyi'i la// namaHsa man ta bu d+hA nan ti'i/ nor ldan ma'i'o// namaHsa can ta bud+hA nAn/ has nIn/ 
176a3(rgyud): mtshar can gyi'o// sa cas man ti bud+ha nan ra sa nAn/ sems can thams cad 'am 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i'o// na mnam man ta budz+nyA na na n+dan/ ngan song thams cad spyong ba'i'o// na mchis man ta 'a
176a4(rgyud): ha sa nAn/ yongs su skyong sems blo gros kyi'o// na maHsa man ta byAd+d+hA nan ya~M/ byams pa chen po mngon par 'byung ba'i'o// na maHsa min tarud+d+hA nA na yaM/ snying rje gdungs pa'i'o// na mthas man ta bud+d+hAn
176a5(rgyud): gdung ba thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i'o// namaHsa man ta bud+d+hA na na ma~M/ bsam kyis mi khyab phyi'i blo gros can gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn tAM/ chen chen 'byung gnas kyi'o// na mthas man ta bud+d+hA nA na~M Sha/ 
176a6(rgyud): nanan chen gyi'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn TaM/ sa 'dzin gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn a/ gzung sa thob pa'i'o// na maHsa man ta br-id+hi nAn n+yaM/ phyag na rin chen phyag rgya'i'o// na mthas man ti br-id+d+hAnAn
176a7(rgyud): bsam gtan pa'i / na maHsa man ti b+hud+d+hA nAn hU~M/ nam mkha' dri med kyi'o// na maHsa mar+tha ta bud+d+hA nAnA nA~M/ nam mkha' blo gros kyi'o// nu mad+has man ta pradz+nyA nA na ga te/ blo gros rnam par dag pa'i tshe/ 
176a8(rgyud): lan ud+ha rAng+ga d+hi/ spyong pa'i khri kr-i gyi// nam thas san ta bud+hA rAn Ta/ brtan pa'i bla gros kyi'o// namams nganata bad+hUnA nI DA pra haH/ phyag sarteni rnams kyi'o// nam thamasan
176b1(rgyud): tar mo kr-i/ byang chub sems dpa' ca skad gsungs pa rnams kyi'o// ram \u0f7fsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn ma no ma ye d+hamra sa ma b+ha be bi b+hA be ka thA ne saM sa ne/ gnas gan ram pa rnams kyi'o// na maHsa mAn ta bud+d+hA nA
176b2(rgyud): kr-i ke rI/ srin po rnams kyi'o// na mangs man ta dud+d+hA nAn hwA ha/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn/ lak+Sha bed+yA d+ha ri/ gnod sbran rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn/ min ma
176b3(rgyud): rnams kye'o// na maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn/ gung gung oM a~M/ 'byung po rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn/  Ti ri Te br-i Ta~M br-i TaM/ lA ma yin rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn/ gau ril be ra laM/ 
176b4(rgyud): na po rnams kyi'o// na mthas man ti pud+d+hA nAn/ ha sa nan/ bI a sa nAn/ me'am ci rnams kyi'o// na maHsa min ta bud+d+hA nAn/ e tsa lAr nA ma no mai/ ni rnams kyi'o// gsang ba bi'i bdag po// ngas de la sogs pa tham
176b5(rgyud): kyegasang sngags bshad do// de la gsang sngags thams cad kyi// snying po nges pas mnyan par gyis// a zhes bya ba sngags kun gyi// snying po yin par yang dag bshad// dal gsang sngags kun gan
176b6(rgyud): de ltar sngags rnams rnam par reg/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon ra rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par skur pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ spyi'iri gsang sngags kyi mdzod rim par skye brgyas pa'o// 
176b7(rgyud): nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyagan rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// gsang papa' bdag po// gseng sngags ci ltar sgrub pa dang / besgrubs pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa 'di nyon cig/ 
176b8(rgyud): na yi ger sbyar// de bzhin gnasas gzhir gyur pa// shin tu bsdams pas yi lan// bzlas brjod 'bum thag gcag bya'o// yi ga byang chub sem ma yin te// gnyis pa sgra zhes bya ba yin// gzhin
177a1(rgyud): gzu gags sa// rangag dus kyi gnas la byan na gnyis pa ni rdzogs dus h+yas/ rgyu gnyis mchog tu shes par bya// zab byed kyil 'khor nam dgapa// sngags pas la gan
177a2(rgyud): bsam// yi ge rnams ni na ma bzhin// de yi dbus su legs par dgod// srang sdud pa'i tshig gis rlon// srog dang rtsol ba rnam par spangs// srog ces bya ba drung du 'an// rtsil badran pa zhes bya
177a3(rgyud): de gnyis bsdams pa byas nas su// sngon du bsnyen pa legs par bya// de nas sdigs pas zla gcig tu// shin tu bsdams te pazlas brjod bya// gsang sngags sngon du sprad pa ni// gzhig
177a4(rgyud): nasun gcig tu 'jug/ grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sngar sprad pa zhes bshad pa yin// de phyin cad ni gang cung zad// me tog spos la sogs dbul zhing // sangs rgyas nyid du
177a5(rgyud): phyir// de cha byang chub tu yang bsngo/ sngags pas 'jigs med de lta bu// zla gnyis pa la bzlas brjod bya// de nas zla ba nya ba'i tshe// ming sbub la 'jug par bya// ri rtse dang ni pa lang lngas// de bzhin
177a6(rgyud): mdo dag dang // dzam gyi bzhi mdo mchen gcig dang // ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su// dkyil 'khor nan tan bri bya ga/ thams dardo rje'i khang par byas// de ni der gnas bsrung byas nas// sku
177a7(rgyud): / na tan bya// der ni mtshan mo nam byed dam// yang na nyam 'char ba'i tshe// 'di sti lha sna rnams 'byung 'gyur te// slodang ldan pas de shes bya// hU~M zhes pa dang nga sma dang // de bzhin sa ni g.yo ba dang // yid du'ong
177a8(rgyud): kya // nga ni rnam mkha' las grags// mtshan ma ni de rnams kyis// yi bzhin rjes cu shes pa ste// sangs rgyas rkang ga nyi mchog rnams kyis// de'i 'bras bung yang dgas nga/ des
177b1(rgyud): sngags kyi tshul gnas pa// de ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// sngags nyid rtag tu dran par bya// sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthu chen gyis// de'i dran par bya ba'ang bshad// rnam par
177b2(rgyud): sang chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ba rnam par sprul ba byin gyis rlob pa las// 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa rim par phye ba'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par sna
177b3(rgyud): mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la gzigs nas/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ dus gsum mtha' yas pa'i sgo nges pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs kyi
177b4(rgyud): byed pa'i chos kyi chag rnams gsungs so// mkha' ltar dri med ngo bo nyid med pa/ rnam mang ye shes sna tshogs sbyin par byed// ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong pa nyid// rkyen la rag las zab cing ldalta ba
177b5(rgyud): dka'// khyad par 'gro ba rnams lnga rtag pa ru// rnam par bsams pa'i 'bras bu mchog sbyin byed// ci ltar nom mkha' chags med spyod yul cad// 'gro ba kun gyi gnas su gyur pa ltar// de bzhi
177b6(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid 'di/ srid gsum ma lus 'byor pa 'byung bar byed/ mchog byos mkhas pa ganga'i bu 'dir spyod na// dus bya kun dang spong du la gcig par 'gyur/ rgyum bas ci ska
177b7(rgyud): gsungs pa'i chos nyid ni// shin tu rnam dag thams cad sdang byed pa// de las go 'phang rnyed dka' gzhan med do// spangs pa'i chos ni zab yi 'grib med cing / dam nyam med 'jig rten
177b8(rgyud): dad sa ni// rnam rtog rnam par spangs te spyad par gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod chen pos tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'kho
178a1(rgyud): tshogs pa la gzigs nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'don rnams la bka' snyam pa/ rigs kyi bu dag gang gis ni sems can rnabs mthong ba'i chos kho na lnga dag rab dang / 
178a2(rgyud): bgu ba thob nas bde ba la reg par 'gyur ba rang rang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi mthu rlabs su gyur pa/ dngos grub bsgrub pa'i tshi ga rnams ston cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin rnams
178a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos kyi sa bka' ci skad stsal pa bzhin 'chal bzhis gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nyid la gsol ba btab pa/ bdag cag la thugs pa
178a4(rgyud): 'i slad du dngos grub bsgrub pa'i tshig rnams bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bstan du gsol// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang bdag cag rang gis rtogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sku
178a5(rgyud): kAr bshad pa de ni rab tu dka' lags so// de ltar lags pas ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi dor dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis legs par rab tu bshad du gsol/ de
178a6(rgyud): skad ces gsob pa dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje 'dzin de dag thams cad la 'di/ ces bka' snyam to// rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs pas
178a7(rgyud): ston pa'i chos 'du 'di la ldan yon che ba'i chos gcig yod pa na 'di lta ste ngo tsha shes pa'o// ngo cha shes pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de mthong ba'i chos nyid la chos gnyis rang
178a8(rgyud): myur bar 'byung ste gnyis gang zhe na/ mi bya ba'i la' mi byed pa dang dbapa rnams kyis bsngags pa'o// yang gnyis te khong du ma chud pa khong du rung ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub se
178b1(rgyud): dpa' rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs pa thob par 'gyur ba'o// yang gnas te tshul sems la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba dang lha dang mi rnams su skye ba thob par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na legs par rab tu
178b2(rgyud): 'khung shig dang 'di lta ste sgrub par myor ba'i tshig gang rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgonas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa stong pa rnams// gsang sngags rnams las myur du gsang sngags
178b3(rgyud): ci dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba/ gsang sngags sgrub pa 'grub par sbyor ba'i tshig rnams bshad do// de la dang po re shig dkyil le khor mthong ba/ bla mas gsang sngags bsgrub par gnang / byang rngub
178b4(rgyud): tu sems bskyed pa/ dang pa can ser dwa med pa/ snying rje can dul ba rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par dbye ba la mkha' pa/ sdom pa bzang ba/ rang gi bslab lan sa pa/ tha' ba la mkhas shing rang
178b5(rgyud): tam// dus dang dru ma yin pa'ang shes// 'degs pa med cing mkha' la gtong // bsod dang ldan zhing byams pa'i yid// gsang sngags spyod la rab tu brtson// gas sngags de nyid don la ma bas// bsam gtan/ 
178b6(rgyud): dpa dga' ba yin// sgrub pa po ni smra ba la shes// gsadab pa'i bdag po// de la 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags yod de/ des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad rgyas
178b7(rgyud): sa brgyal bar byed cing / me tog meng po sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs nyams dga' ba rnams kyang ston la// yongs su spyad pa dang nye bar spyad pa rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs rnams kyang mngon par sprus
178b8(rgyud): nas/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang sbyin la/ bdag nyid kyang yongs su spyod do// 'di lta ste lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la yid mgyogs zhes bya ba'i rig sngags yod de/ des stong gsu
179a1(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can gyi dgos pa byed cing / nye bar spyad pa dang yongs su spyad pa thams cad kyang mngon par sprul nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
179a2(rgyud): rnas la yang sbyin pa bdag cid kyang kun du spyod // 'di sa mig 'phru tan nig 'ang sdugs nasas kyis kun dga' bdag mamad 'bra chu ma la mags 'am tha da pa
179a3(rgyud): ston to// 'di lta ste dper na/ lha ma yin rnams ni gsang sngags kyi sgyu ma rnams ston to// 'di lta ste dper na/ gsang sngags dag gis ni dug dang rih+la la sogs pa med par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste ma mi zhes
179a4(rgyud): pa'i la na rdzas ni gnas sngags kyis sems can rnams land 'ag ba gtong // 'di lta sted per na/ gas sngags kyis ni mer cha rid par byas nas grang bar byed par 'gyur ro// rigs
179a5(rgyud): dag pa'i tshig 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi mthul mngon par dad bar bya'o// gsang sngags kyi mthu de yang gang zhe na/ gsang sngags rnams las byung ba yang mi yin/ rjes las 'jug pa yang
179a6(rgyud): spyo la la da migs pa 'a sa yin do gi gas kyi / na ga pang gas kyi na sa nyid 'byung ba las yi mi n+d+ha te/ dun gsum sa sa
179a7(rgyud): phyir dang rton cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par
179a8(rgyud): chud pas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'jug par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dus gsum du chags pa med pa'i stobs kyi gzhi byin gyis rlob pa/ de sa
179b1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas chos
179b2(rgyud): dbyings ma lus pa ci snyed yod pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i sgra rnams las chos kyi dbyings kyi stonami mnyam mnyam pa'i // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mos pa las byung ba// sam gyu
179b3(rgyud): thams cad khyab par byas te nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur nas byung ba// na maHsar+b+ba tan+ta ga ti b+h+yo bi shA mu khA b+h+yaHsarbAn+da/ a A a~M A/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po de dag
179b4(rgyud): ma thag tu/ de nas yang chos kyi dbyings thams cad nges par sgrogs pa'i sgo ga nas/ yang drag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i tshig gis/ mtshan rnam par rig pa'i dbyangs kyi theg
179b5(rgyud): nas gcig tu mngon par grag go// byang chub sems dpas de thos nas// ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mig phye ste// kun mkhyen bskur dang bral ba la// tshig snyan 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o gsang snga k+Sha
179b6(rgyud): spyad pa las// sangs rgyas rkang gi sa ma chog rnams kyis// gang gis 'di kun khyab pa yi// ye shes yangs pa chen po byung // de bas rnam pa thams cad du// sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i sti
179b7(rgyud): lo// nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pa ka rtag tu mngon par brtson par bya// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po rnams sgrub pa byung ste/ skyed mos tshal lam/ gtsug lag
179b8(rgyud): thug gam/ yad gang du dben pa der byang chub kyi sems bsgom zhing / nam mtshan ma ma byung gi bar du 'dug par bya'o// de nas snying po de dag las gang rang ba cig gzung te/ the tsom med par
180a1(rgyud): gyi bar du gzhi bsgrub par bya'o// de nas snying po snying gar gzhag rnam yid pasgrub par bya ste/ shin tu rnam par dag pa/ dri ma med pa brtan pa rab tu mi g.yo ba rnam par rtag
180a2(rgyud): long swA Ta/ rab tu phra ba la mngon pa balnga zhing rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor bas rang gi lus rAn d+ha'i sum mdzog bar du bya'o// gzhi gnyis pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs chas
180a3(rgyud): ge dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi nang na pad ma'i rgyal po chen po la bzhugs pa phrug na bzhugs pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ thor tshugs dang dbu rgyan dang 'od zer mtha' yas pas bskor
180a4(rgyud): rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba/ nam mkha' bzhin gzod ma nas zhi ba ste// de la sgra gnas par bsam zhing // mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas brjod bya// de nas sngon du ston/ 
180a5(rgyud): pa ni// 'bum phrag gcig tu bya bar bshad/ de nas zla ba gnyis bral// me tog dri la sogs pa dbul// sems can rnams la rnam mang po'i// phan pa nye bar smrab byed cing // rnyed dang mi rnyed rnam
180a6(rgyud): stongs te// zla ba gzhan la bzlas brjod bya// de la de ru sbyor ba 'di// mnyam par gzhag pas bsam par bya// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// sems can thams cad byed gyur cig/ 
180a7(rgyud): thams can nad kyang med par shog/ yadun de bzhin gshegs bsngags pa'i// 'dod pa phun sumatshogs gyur cig/ yang na sems can rnams cad kyang // re ba thams cad yodang sa rdzogs pa la
180a8(rgyud): bameng pa'i tshul gyis su// ma thogs par ni grub par shog/ dud 'gro gcig la gcig pa ba'i// sdug 'asngal na mi yang 'byung ma gyur/ gami dgas rnams la las sgom sogs// sogs 'amed pa la tu
180b1(rgyud): shog/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gapa// mi ba bad rnam pa sna tshogs pa// bdag ge bsad ma la gru 'am// dang myur du zhi bar gyur// thamam tshan sdug bsnga ma ma cad smra// snying rje chen pa bsru sa
180b2(rgyud): bsgrub pa de dang gzhan dag kyang // des ni yang dang yang du bsam// ce lha'i bsams pa 'grub bya'i phyir// sprin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gsum gyis// de dag mchis cad byin parlab cing // yidi la sngags kyang ba
180b3(rgyud): dzod bya// bdag gi bsod nams stobs dang ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin stobs dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs kyis su// sems can rnams laman 'dogs pas// don nardzas gang dog pa sems bkun
180b4(rgyud): sems can khams ni ma lus 'dir// de dag thams cad ci rigs par// thogs pa med par 'byung 'gyur me/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sra sag+sa kyi rgyar mo sto ca nam mkha' dang 'dra ba nam mkha'i mngod
180b5(rgyud): 'byung ba gsungs so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo mi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tad/ khi uta ga te swa ra Na ma~M ga ga na kha~M swA hA/ 'di la ni gsum pazlas na ci ltar bsams pa'i don thams cad thogs pa med par 'gyung bar 'gyur
180b6(rgyud): de napa zla ba nya ba'i tshe// mi de sgrub lnga 'jug par bya// ri tso dang ni ba lang mas// chu mdo'am yang na dung khron dam// lam gyi bzhi mdor ma shing gcig drung // ma me re gnas sama'i gnas su// 'gegs
180b7(rgyud): rnams thams cad myos 'gyur bI ri// dkyil 'khor nges pas mnyan par gyis// kun du gru ba'i lham pa ste// sko cis pa la mu ran can// thams cad kha dog phyir po lnga so// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
180b8(rgyud): chog zi ba// rdorje slob pa'i tshul gyi su// do rje ban tshun 'brel ba bya mo srungs gnyis drag/ 'dum na'am ni ngon phyogs gnyis/ mig dmar kro dang
181a1(rgyud): bcas pa la// khros shing bsdigs par byed par bri// mdung rtse gsum pa gra rnams su// nan tan du ni phri bar bya// dbus su do rje'i gradani yid 'o // kha ni kun du blta ba bre// 
181a2(rgyud): ldan na// 'dasas brgyan pa zhes ste/ rdza kun khyan byas nas/ sku / shA dz+nyAn no// dede'i byag ba ma sa// de ni bad+ma
181a3(rgyud): 'dug ste// sbyangs pa'i rdzas na blangs nas su// nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pas// mtshan gcig thal byung ba zlas brjod bya// der ni nam gyi phyed dus sam// yang na nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe// rdza se de yongs su
181a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni// 'bar phreng can gyi gzi brjid bzhin// sngags pa rang gis de blangs na// nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// bskal par gnas shing gzi brjid che// rgyal sras de ni 'dod na 'chi// 'jig
181a5(rgyud): khams ni gzhan du'ang 'gro// gtso bo sna tshogs gzugs 'chang ba/ na rdzas las byung ba'i sngags bslabs pas// dpam ldan mchod pa rab tu byed// 'di ni nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i// rdzas kyi
181a6(rgyud): klub yin par bshad// gsang ba pa'i bdag go// de la brtag pa 'di rgyu mtshan du mdzad nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i grangs
181a7(rgyud): rgyas thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par thugs su chud pa rnams kyi brtag pa de nyid rang bzhin gyis stong par mkhyen kyang thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs kyis 'dus ma byas pa gdags par btags
181a8(rgyud): yongs su bsgyur ba'i tshul du mthong ba'i chos lab bar gnas par cha ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mthu kham po che sems can rnams la nges par ston te/ des de rnams ying rab tu dag ni tshe ring po
181b1(rgyud): ra tu thos nas/ 'dod pa yon tan lnga dag gis rtse dgar rongs du spyod pa/ sangs rgyas com ldan ldanapa rnamams mtshan mi jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i lam 'di grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshes
181b2(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang don gyi dbang ridid 'a'ogs nas/ gsang sngags spyoda'i tshul gyi cho gzugasar byes bzhin du 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir she na/ gang bskal pa du mar stsom zhing 'brad dbyar
181b3(rgyud): 'arnams brtsabs kyang 'thob par 'gyur ba de byang chub sems dpar gsang sngagan gyi sgronan byang chub sems dpa'i spang ba spyod pa rnams kyi tshe 'di cig kho na la 'thob par 'gyur ro// gas ba pa'i bdag po
181b4(rgyud): gsan yang byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan nam ral kri'am/ gdugs sam mchil lham 'am/ 
181b5(rgyud): na gyis nor bu 'am/ yig bu mig gama?/ 'gi'u wang blangs te/ bizlas brjed sum 'obum pas la de ltar bsgrubs na de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang rigam kyi
181b6(rgyud): 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs dang ldan pas yid la 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams bsgrub sran// de dag rang gi sems kyi dbang tsam khon sa yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// gas dab pa'i bdag go// gang dag rgyu las 'ab
181b7(rgyud): mngon par 'dod pa'i mi blun po de dag ni / gsanga' pa'i bdag po sa 'gas nam kyi sa zunas mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu ni byed par ma gsungs te/ 'bras bu 'dra la yod
181b8(rgyud): yin d+hu ri chu yis stong pani/ de ni ci ltar chur yang 'gyur/ debs gapang sngags 'bras bu na rgud pa lam 'bra ba sa par bya// gang tshe mtshan ma med pa yos cing 'dzin mi bya bzhin me nga tsha sngags par
182a1(rgyud): dngos grub ni// yid las yang dag byung ba 'thob/ de nas yang bcom ldan radas la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzhi rnams
182a2(rgyud): krub tu bsgru 'i 'tshig gang gigi rigs kyi bu rigs kyi bu monapas mdzang sa com nyid la rab tu dag zhing bde ba la rig par gnas la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang 'ga' bar mi 'gyur ba de yang bshad du
182a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na chos kyi dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings lags te/ de yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan to// 
182a4(rgyud): ldan 'das de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas ni/ chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa rtogs par khong du chud par bgyi ba tshal lo// de skad ces gso
182a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsadab pa'i bdag po legs so legs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su dri bar sems pa de ni yang leg pa so// 
182a6(rgyud): de phyir nyon la legs par ba tu med la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsos nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phya gan rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'i
182a7(rgyud): / skad ces bka' phrul to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de la ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa 'byung ste/ gtsug lag khang dam bu zhag ma/ gnas gang yang rung ste yan lag thams cad ya zhes bya ba gzhag la bzlas brjod pun 'bum bya'o// 
182a8(rgyud): denas zla ba nya ba'i ci 'byor bas mchod pa byam la ci srid du byang chu'i sems dpar kun du babang po ga'angam dpal par/ rdo rje 'arjen chen po gang par ru bzhig 'ongs te/ mgol nyug gam legs sa zhes zer gyi
182b1(rgyud): zlas brjod bya'i// de nas phyag byas te mchod yon phul na byang chub kyi se mas mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sems yang ba dang lus yang bgoms par bya zhing bzlas brjod byas na de'i lus rnam
182b2(rgyud): par dag pa dang sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// a sres bya ba rnam par gzhag ste ba blam parjod byas na rna ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'on te srog gzung bar 'dod na la shes bya ba srog dang lhan cig tu byas la du
182b3(rgyud): dubasam pa byas na yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi steng du klad kor gzhag na gnas pa dang 'gro ba'i dug thams cad 'byin to// de nas gab can dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ a zhes byas pa bdag tu byas// ba la sa
182b4(rgyud): TI dbang po// gcig la pad ma gzhag par bya/ gzhan la yang ni dung gzhag ste// gcig la ga cig ni gdod pa ltas na// de yi med la dbang du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang lda
182b5(rgyud): ri'akhor 'dus pa la gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i dag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal ga/ lag ra rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs las byung ba shes bya ga las bya bas rnam par rol pa spyod pa'i rol mo rim par phye ba rgyas
182b6(rgyud): derang dag rab sgrub bzlas pa/ sems kyi rgyal po la gnas pa/ nam mkha'i lhar kun du khrab pa/ mthong ba dag ma mthong yi'i 'bras bu mang gi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon sum pa/ 
182b7(rgyud): gas sngagras kyi sgonas byang chub sems pa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi ra ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed las sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la pan 'dogs pa yod kyis/ de nyon la legs par
182b8(rgyud): des zung shig dang / ngas khyod pa pa shad do// lag na rdo rje paspyod pa'i ros molas dang bya ba mngon par 'grub pa'i 'bras bu pal che ba/ lus can kun gyi mngon sum pa dang zhe na/ chog shes pas thog mar ni/ bdag ni
183a1(rgyud): de nyid rim bzhin bya// sngags snga bzhin drug la// dri bzhin gshegs pa dun byas te// bdag nyid pa zhes bya pa na// glang ka rabacas dang rgyas byam pa/ thams cad shin tu ma no
183a2(rgyud): rgabang / rngu bzhi rdo rjes mtshan byas te/ sngags pas de re gnas rdzogs pa yis/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo bsam// 'di ni 'angs rgyas thams cad kyis// bdag gi de nyid yin 'ar gsungs/ rnam nin
183a3(rgyud): sngags pas bdag gi ni// de nyid dgas pa med gyur pa de tshe rajig rten thams cad la// phan pa byed pa nyid du 'gyur// ngo ma cher sna tshogs dag dang ldan// mig gru can gyi gnas la 'dug sngags pa nam zhig mnyam
183a4(rgyud): gzhag na/ srid pa rab tu dag pa na// thog med du nas mi shes pas// bsags pa'i las de kun zad 'gyur// blan med pa'i byang chub sems/ sems den ma zhig sgom byed pa// de tsherang sngags brnal 'byor pa/ rgu
183a5(rgyud): dam lta bur ni// dge dang mi dge 'bras 'byung ba ri// lus kyi rtog pas mi gos na// 'di bdag nyid ni rgyal mchog tu// bsgyur na smos kyang ci zhig dgos// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod bdud 'di
183a6(rgyud): las rgyal po rdo rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig bdud bzhi la sa rgyal bar byed pa/ rgyu drug las rnam par grol bar byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
183a7(rgyud): shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di rnams gsungs so// namams man ta pud+ha nAn/ a bi ra hUM/ gaM de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag nardo rje dang / rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang / byang chub sems pa' kun du nga
183a8(rgyud): rol loms pa dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad nge mtshar du gyur nas mig mi 'dzul par thams cad ma khyen pa la skye bos phyag 'tshal ta tsheg 'di skad ces brjod do// kyang chub
183b1(rgyud): nga skyo rnams dang / sangs rgyas kun gyinar gyi dbyig/ 'dis ni gang dag sang nga rgyas dang // byang chubasems dpa' skye rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos ga/ su byang bas dang na 'jig rten da/ sas rgyas ra sha
183b2(rgyud): bla med pa/ dpe sbe ye shes tha nas su/ rdzu 'phru sna tshogs nar 'phrul pas/ sa sted rnam par spyod// de bso ng+ge dag so so yi/ cho ga rgyas pa dag dang las/ sna tshogs dag thams cad kyang// bstan pa 'di la ba dang
183b3(rgyud): du gsol// de ga ni gabang sngags spyod pa yis/ theg chen bla na med pa la// sems can rnams na dga' bzhin du// mdzod 'i'i chos la gnas par 'gyur// de skad gsol nis bcom ldan gyis// 'jam pa'i gsung gis bka' stsa
183b4(rgyud): pa khyed rnams mthun par rtse gcig pumanyam par zhog pa 'di nyon cig de'i chos pa'i rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlangs te/ nyid kyi sku las byang chub kyi snying po nye bar bstan par bzhed nas gsungs pa/  ni mchog tu shes
183b5(rgyud): byA ba/ dbang chen dkyil 'khor ldan pa ste/ phyi rol dang ni nang du yang // rdo rje dkyil 'khor shes par bya// der 'dug nas ni thams cad bsan// rnal 'byor gnas shes bshad pa yin// a ni srog gi dam pa ste/ 'azhugs par byed
183b6(rgyud): pa'i mchog tu bshad/ nam zhig klang kor gyi mnan na/ lus can kun gyis sel bar 'gyur// sngags pa nam zhig zla gcig tu/ rdo rje can gyis rgya bcing sa nas// dus gsum bzlas brjod bya sa na ni// mi shes grong khyer 'jog/ 
183b7(rgyud): 2 ma/  // sen rnams kyis kya / mi byed shin tu snyan par 'gyur/ dag nyid rnyed la kyi'i phyi/ rgyas kyi'i bu zhig nga// de na nag tu sngags pa yis/  kyi mapo kyini bskrun b+h+yo/ 
183b8(rgyud): ba dang bcas/ thor chugs dbu gyur 'chang ba yi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting 'dzin zhugs/ dbang cher kyi nig ni zhes bya// rdo rnga pad mar ba gri dang / de bzhin dang par bshad pa dang / gis do ga dang nes
184a1(rgyud): dan dang/ ya na ying bzhin nor bu la jug/ de la sog papa'i thamanapa da rjen du ni brloms te bsdug man bdag kyang bshad par bya// 'dri ni khyod kyis mnyam gzhag tan// sngun
184a2(rgyud): dod sa ldan pags da sa da dzin/ mi ge sa pa ste ma ni nyin mams ra
184a3(rgyud): I gyur/ sman sa yang ni lan brgya ra// bzlas brjod byas te mis 'azung ba rjod kyi las pas kyang ba'i// de yi nad nardzas pa bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang nges pa'i sa/ ba zhes bya ba dam pa nyon/ ga nga yong du
184a4(rgyud): bzhi ba lte ba'i dbus nas byung ba ste/ pad+ma dkar po dam pa ste/ de yi dbus na rab tu gnas nga gon po rnam pa rab tu'i// ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang 'dra// de yi dkyil 'khor ngo mtshar can/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis pashe
184a5(rgyud): kun du dkar po bsam par bya// khrung kor rim par nus kyang bskor// gdung ba lams cad zhi byed pa// srung / zil 'dus pa'i dang na gnas// sbo ma mu tig phreng dkar dang // she la dang zla ba'i dod 'dra ba'i// chu chun rnam
184a6(rgyud): yug tu/ kun nas rab tu'abab bzhin ldugs pas le sa pa mas ni// sus pa las spor bar ragyur/ mnyam par gra' galas dngos drirnams kyim por di'i sna bar // ma mer ma
184a7(rgyud): phred// de bzhin khru mchog shel kyang rung // zho'i nga yang nachu yang rung / de lnga sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni// dngos grub sna tshogs grub phyir bsgrug/ tshe ni reng bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs ni ngo mtshar cher 'gyur dab na
184a8(rgyud): rnams kun las tha ba dang / rnal pa bzang po chog 'gyur ro/ yid no 'dzini par rus pa dang // shes rab shin du dri pa bye ming ni ri rnams kyis// de dag thams cad kya du 'grub/ dkyi 'khor
184b1(rgyud): ldan pa dang / zhi bar byad par bshad pa na/ klad kyal 'a dang bcas byas na/ bal par byed pa ma chag tu 'gyu ra/ zhes bya ba yang dag mchon/ 'od can rnams kyi 'o mas bya// ngas na las rnams gang drung zad/ 
184b2(rgyud): lnga las byung ba yang // rnal 'byor shin tu mnyam gzhag nas// bsams na de kun zad par 'gyur// yid 'ong thams cad rab tu dmar// gru gsum pa yi tshul du gnas// zhi ba rabar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs// su mdor
184b3(rgyud): / rig mtshan snying gar gzhag/ rnal 'byor pa ni der 'dug nas// ra ni klad kor bcas par bsam// mi 'jigs pas ni ci rigs par// dngos po de dag des sgrub po// nyi ma dang ni gza' kun dang // de bzhin bsgribs te med ni
184b4(rgyud): dbang bya ba'i rdzas rnams dang / yang na 'khor bar 'gyur ba dang / bskam pa dang ni gsang pa dang // de bzhin dag yang gnod pa dag/ me dang lhan cig 'di sbyar na// de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur//  shes bya ba dam la mcho
184b5(rgyud): thams cad yang dag 'byung // rgyud da nga las dang 'bras bu dang / gang gis sa bon rnams skye ga/ ridi ni klang kor bcas sbyar na/ de dag thams cad 'jig par byed// de yi gzugs kyang bshad pa ni/ kha dog nag la rjod po chen ma
184b6(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs// kun du ba ni rnam par 'grog/ mkhas pas sprini mi mchams bu ni/ dkyi lo kho sa ni gnas par bsam// de ni ma thing ga zag sa dru// tog dang ban byung ba ga yo// yi ga tu mi 'gyur ba/ 
184b7(rgyud): sngags pas der gnas bsam par bya// dkyi 'khor de ye dus su ni// gang gis mthong 'khon to// sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i// dngos po rnams ni de tshe bsgrub// mkhor ba 'phro ba nyid dang ni/ yang na rdzu 'phrul
184b8(rgyud): gang pa dang / lha yom gdang na ba dang / sngags pas de bzhin 'thob pa dang / mi snang ba la sogs ku dang // dbye ba dag kyang gang gsungs pa/ sngags pa mnyam par gdag pa yis/ dkyil 'khyer
185a1(rgyud): // gan na thun byed// 'din myed po byang rgya sbyim/ byang chub sems dpa grag sarjen // klu na dmigasus med nas/ bdud pas mab la ba gyu
185a2(rgyud): med pas rang bras bu 'ang med// las kyang lod pa ma yin to// dngos po dag sung med pas na// stong pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas methu chen gyis// de'i gzugs yang
185a3(rgyud): dag bshad pa ni// klad gor bcas par ldan pa ste// khams ni stong pa'i mchog ces bya// ral gri phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// sgrub par bya ba nges par bsgrub// ral gri zhags pa 'khor lo dang // lcags
185a4(rgyud): mda' de bzhin tho ba ste// rdzas de rnams dang ldanan ni// go 'phang dam pa sgrub pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi na gsang ba lnga'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ 
185a5(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po// rnam byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyed pa spyod pas bdag nyid a zhes bya ba'i rang gi ngo bor bsgyur nas/ phyi dang nang du bas
185a6(rgyud): pA'i dngos po thams cad la myi blta drar gyur cing / blong ba dang rdo dang gser du mtshungs la/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyes pa rnams dang sdig pa'i las rnam par spangs pa/  tsher/ 
185a7(rgyud): nidedag/ 'gyur ba// nub pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin// des ni las rnams thams cad nus// nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs// de nas gzhan sngagase rnal 'byor la// gzhol zhing cho ga
185a8(rgyud): shes pa yis// sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// baM zhes bya ba'i las bya'o// snying rje las byung sems kyis ni// 'jig rten sdug bsngal la dmigs nas// mgon po de yis bdag
185b1(rgyud): kyi rnga lus ni thams cad nyid du yang // gangs dang ba yi 'o ma ltar// dkar ba'i rgyan gyis yongs su dgang // de tshe nges pa bskyed nas su// yan yug rnams ni thams cad kyi// ba spu bu ga kun nas kyang / 
185b2(rgyud): shin tu ri med cu rgyun dbyung // nu yi sras ni ma lus pa// 'di dag yongs su dgang bar bya// gang gis chu 'di 'jungs pa'am// lag pas kyang ni rig kyang rung // de kun nges par byang chung tu// 
185b3(rgyud): pa da sla ba mang // yan lag kun du ra zhes pa// 'bar ba'i phreng ba zhi bas 'khrigs// kun du rnam par 'phro ba ni// shin du mnyam par gzhag pas bsam// de tshe rnal 'byor pa yis phyir// 2
185b4(rgyud): kun du snang byed pa// btang nar yis rnam sbal pas// sngags pa 'dod pa bzhin du byed// re zhes bya ba ro stong du// ba zhis bya ba lte ba khungs// 'bar ba dang ni rma 'bab pa// de tshe cig char ston par
185b5(rgyud): la ba grang po'i sdug bsngal rnams// ras ni shin ngazhi bar byed// sngags pa sngags kyi tshul gnas pas// bas kyang tshal sogs pa zhi// ha zhes bya ba ba dan bcas// ra zhes bya ba'i 'og tu gzhaka/ 
185b6(rgyud): ga dang ldan pa'i mi rnams kyang / de yi las rnams myur du bsdug/ sngags pa dbang chen la 'dug nas// rgyu yi las ni brtsam par bya// sel ba la sogs thams cad kyang // byed 'gyur 'dil
185b7(rgyud): dang rlung ni kun du 'gro bar gsangs// thams cad 'jig par byed pa'ang de// rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i// las rnams dbye ba las byung ba// gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// chog 'ang
185b8(rgyud): gis rab tu bya// yid yongs su sbyang zhing bzlas brjod byas na yid rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// lung yang bar goms par byed cingade 'i chag bzhin du bzlas pa rjod byas na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa/ 
186a1(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur ro// cog pur 'dug la a zhes bya ba rnam par gzhag ste/ zla ba gcig bzlas brjod byas na lha'i rna ba 'pheb par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// dngos grub
186a2(rgyud): go 'byung de lta bu la sogs pa dag ni yid las byung ba yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// rnam par bsams pa tsam kho nas dngos po gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyi 'du byed rnam pa za dadapa
186a3(rgyud): lnga tshogs rnams las thams cad kyi sa bon ci bya ba tshig tu brjod pa tsam las 'byung ba la ltos/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rjes su mthun
186a4(rgyud): pa sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mthun pa sems can yang dag par mgu bar mdzad pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' las thams cad dang gsang sngags spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi
186a5(rgyud): mdun na gzugs brnyan lta bur bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rnam par mi rtog cing yid kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ dus dang yul dang bya ba dngo la ma dang chos dang chos
186a6(rgyud): yin pa rnams srungs kyang / gsang sngags skyed pa las byung ba'i// thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang stsol// de bas kun mkhyen dngos grub dang // go 'phang mchog kyang pad+ma mar bya// de nas/ 
186a7(rgyud): dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// ngo mtshar gyur nas mig dgad de// de tshe rdo rje 'od zer ni// le sdug 'phro ba 'drar gsor gang // sangs rgyas zhing ni 'ang thams cad// kun tu sna dbyar byas nas su/ 
186a8(rgyud): ru dbang phyug thub pa la// tshig stan 'ang skad ces gsol to// sngags kyi 'jug pa bshad lags na// 'jug pa de yang ma rtogs na// gsang sngags gang nas 'ong ba dang // gang du dro/ 
186b1(rgyud): ba gtso khyod kyis// de kun bdag la bshad du gsol// go 'phang dam pa gyod las med// khyod ni ni lhar chu rnams kyi// rgya mtsho bzhin chos kun gyi gnas// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
186b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyagan rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po dkyil 'khor gyi// gnas ni yid ces bshad pa yin// snyed ni gsang sngags gnas yin pa
186b3(rgyud): shes na 'bras buthob par 'gyur// dkar po sder pa dmar po gang // yid kyis sems par byed pa ste// de la yongs su gcod pa gang // de ni sems kyi byed pa yin// sems nomagunas nges gyur pa/ 
186b4(rgyud): de ni snying zhes bshad pa yin// der gnas pa yi gsang sngags rnams// 'bras bu rgya cher ster bar 'gyur// de ru pad+ma bsam pa ni// 'dab ma brgyad pa ze bar bcas// a zhes bya ba 'bar phreng
186b5(rgyud): zug/ bzang po de ru gnas pa ni// zhi ba kun du rnam pa re g.yo// gtso bo sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba// blag steng dag ni 'khrug pa bzhin// snang ba kun du ston pa na// me long phug na gnas pa
186b6(rgyud): bzhin// chu yi zla ba'i rnam pa bzhin// thams cad na yang mdun na gnas// sdigs pa gsang sngags gnas 'dug pas// yid ni de ltar shes nas su// de nas sngags pas stong du yang // klad
186b7(rgyud): sa kyi dbus su ni// klang kor bcas pa'i mtshan ma ca ne// a zhes bya ba der bsams te// shel dang zla bo gang 'dra ba// dri med dag pa mthong ba ni// zhi ba chos kyi rang bzhin sku// rnams
186b8(rgyud): cad kyi ni ga'i zhes bya// da las gsang sngags dngos grub ni// sna tshogs gzugs can thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas mthong na/ mtho ris dang ni byang gral thob/ 
187a1(rgyud): razhes bya ba mar ma bzhin// 'bar ba mig tu gzhaganas su// mgrin pa cung bang dgu por bas// lce yang can la sbyar nam ne// snying ga ri dbus su nas brgya zhing / 
187a2(rgyud): sa 3/ na dum dug/  rang bzhin du ga nas// de da kyi yang gu par/ rgyal bya rnams kyis pa skyes// yid kyi
187a3(rgyud): / rnam par nus pa snang bar 'gyur// de na du sngags pas rdzogs sangs rgyas// nad gnyis gtso bo mthong bar 'gyur// de mthong sngags pas dngos grub ni// rab tu
187a4(rgyud): zab par 'gyur// de nas gong du bsgyur nas su// yi ge yongs su bsam pa ni// la zhes bya ba klad kor bcas// mig gi gnas su bsam par bya// rang kun stong por mthong na ma/ 
187a5(rgyud): go phang ba nyams zab par 'gyur/  shes rlabs pa 'thun// yang na mngon shes lnga po dang // dge sngags 'chang 'gyur dngos grub dang // che nga gnyen nur 'gyur ba gang /

187a7(rgyud): ba ba dang // spangs rgyas kun gyi nor gyi dbyig/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i dang // nyan thos des padag dang ni// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog gyur pa// ye she sna pa med b+hA
187a8(rgyud): nas su// de yis sa steng thams cad na// gnas shing de la gtam yang zer// rnam par snang ma dang chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa

193a3(rgyud): gdam pa 'di'o// b+ha/ de nas pha rol gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du byon gyis brlabs la/ byang chub kyi sems su gyur ba'i yid kyis cha gsum bor te/ 
193a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad lan gsum rjes su dran par byas nas tshon de nyid blangs te/ shar phyogs kyi cha gsum par rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can lag pa
193a5(rgyud): yon pa na ud pa la mthing ka steng na rdo rje can thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar ram ras kyi smad g.yogs gyon pa/ dar la'i smad g.yogs can/ kha dog gur gum
193a6(rgyud): bor zur phung lnga pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o// de'i sngags ni 'di'o// na maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn/ mA~M/ de'i g.yas phyogs su dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nu'i gzugs can rnam pa
193a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ lag na rin po che'i dra ba 'am lpags kyu thogs pa phyag rgya me yi ge'i 'brur bri'o// de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o// tsha/ de nas lho phyogs su shA
193a8(rgyud): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba/ gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba 'phor chags dang cod paran can lag na yid pa 'in gyi nor bu thogs pa de'i phyag rgya 'am yi ge
193b1(rgyud): dral khri ste'i 'bru 'di'o// U/ de nas byang phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po zhes bya ba su mdog ljang ku/ lag na pad+ma thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad gyun padang phyag rgya ma pa// 
193b2(rgyud): ger bri'o// de la yi gen 'dre'o// e/ nub phyogs su byung chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba rnam pa sems cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ gos dkar ba gyon pa 'bar ba dang bcas pa/ 
193b3(rgyud): lag nar pa gri thogs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o// de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o// I/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol bu yi// sngags pa de das 'dug nas su// chos kyi dbyings kyi
193b4(rgyud): gle byang chub sems sa gyur pa'i yid// shAr phyogs la lhas gnas nas ni// rdo rje can gyi chub bcings nas// ngan la rjer gyur// dan tan du ni mchod pa bya// kun tu sgrub pa'i yid
193b5(rgyud): kyis su// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig ces bya'i rgya bstan nas// gsang sngags lan gsum bzlas par bya// slong na gtsang mchog bzhin// bos te dkyil 'khor mdun
193b6(rgyud): ning de dag gsum las skyabs su btang // de nas byang chub sems kyang bskyed// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi// phyag rgya de dag kun la ba cing // de nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i bcing / 
193b7(rgyud): yid kyis de'i gzugs bskur te// ras kyi gdod pa bkab nas su// snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis su// byang chub tshogs ni rdzogs bya'i phyir// lhag pa stong par mi bya'o// dam tshig ga ni ngas pa
193b8(rgyud): 'di// de dag kun gyi rnam par bsgrags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshig ni// de nas de la bdag gis bcing // byang chub sems gyur yid kyis su// de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug
194a1(rgyud): me tog gang du bab gyur pa// de ni sngags pas de la sbyin// mul can kun la dam tshig phyir// cho ga de ltar rab tu ba// de nas dpa' ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gtso pa de la yang zhus pa//

194a3(rgyud): chos rnams kun la dbang ba'i phyir// cho ga'i mchog ni ngas bshad kyis// ying gcig bsdus te cho ga nyon// gsangab pa'i bdag po// de la slob dpon gyis bdag nyid de bzhin gshe
194a4(rgyud): pa'i gzugs su de'i sngags sam phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab bo// de nas slob ma rnams 'os la chos kyi dbyings kyingo bo nyid kyi pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po la gzhag skye/ 
194a5(rgyud): yan lag kun 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bzhis byin gyis brlabs pa/ rin po che sna bzhi'i bum pa'i chus spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// a ni k+Sha
194a6(rgyud): ra bcas pa ru// mkhas pas spyi bor bzhag nas ni// a zhes bya ba snying gar gzhag/ rA zhes bya ba brang du gzhug/ yang na a ni kun du gzhag/ gser gyi kha dog 'byar dang ba
194a7(rgyud): nor tshugs pa ni bu rgyan can// pad+mo dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs// rgyal ba'i mchog ni ting 'dzin gnas// yi ge'i 'khor lo rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das

194b1(rgyud): sang ba pa'i bdag po// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rkyen du gyur pa chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa'i paka tu rim par phye ba rgyas pa gang gi
194b2(rgyud): sa byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor ba ni 'khor ba'i sa 'gro ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'amatshan mas btab pas skang
194b3(rgyud): dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lham yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi ngam ci dang lho 'phye chen po dang ma derang mi ma yin pa rnams 'byor par 'gyur zhing / de rnams kyang de dag gi ngag nyan par

194b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par ston par byed pa/ chos gsum gyi lam gyi mtshams las yi 'da' bar byed pa/ sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par kye
195a1(rgyud): bar da yin te/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin no// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du gyur la/ mthe bo gnyis bsgreng ngo // tu 'di phyag rgya chen po ste// sangs rgyas smod pa kun
195a2(rgyud): sa rdza des g+sa/ ka 'di la ya tuganas// lag na nyis kasapa/ khyo nga ldan pa 'i tshur /  sa sa ni N+Ti/

198a8(rgyud): nr-i A k+Shi sha sa ma N+Da rus ta po tsid+hi par d+ha ra pUhA/ nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so byan nyid las sring lag gnyis dang mther chung gnyis nang du bcug lam
198b1(rgyud): gnyis gung mo gnyis dang lhan cig tu sbyar ro// gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+hA nA~M/ At+ma sa twA hi ta a b+hu pa ta tra~M trai raM raM swA hA/ sgring bathams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang snga
198b2(rgyud): sodade bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu skyer la sor mo phyed dril bu 'dra bar kha byaM/ mthe bo ma'is dang ma 'u chung gnyis gcig tu sbyar/ lhag ma rnams ni pad+ma lta bur bya'o// gsang sngags

198b6(rgyud): sgrol mo go phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bcas te sreng ngo // lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no// gsang sngag sa la/ nam sa ma ta thA swa mA~M m+b+he san dz+nyA sa naM trA~M s+pho rA ya swAt+ma/ log ce
198b7(rgyud): tsan lnga'i'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis pam mo/ nga stor ma/ gli lami gnyis dang lam gnyis drug zug go// gsang sngags / d+hA sasan+ta rba d+ha ne/ tADA ga ta ye le sa s+thA
198b8(rgyud): mA ya rI swA hA/ gos dkar can gyi'o// phyag rgyad nyid las man po gnyis gyen du skyeng la mdzub mo gnyis kyi mi grong 'drung ngu bar nas yang ma kyi ma mchod par bzhig gzhigs sngags la nas
199a1(rgyud): sa man+ta bad+ha naM/ khA da b+hANA n+doT ya swA hA/ Na mgrin gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// phyag tu de nyid las srid lag gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis kyang byin du bslang la
199a2(rgyud): nas 'di de bzhin du ba ca khri bzhag ste/ de gsang sregs la// namaHsu ma / !ts+tsha lan mus hA/ sa snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// de bzhin du lag
199a3(rgyud): gnyis thal mo yang steng du myur la gung mo gnyis kyi sring lag gnyis de kris te mdzub ro gnyis kyang mthe bong gnyis kyi snying du bcug ste gzhog/ ga sarnams de sngam pazhin no// gseng sngam
199a4(rgyud): lan maHsa man+ta bud+ha rAM/ he he ku mA ra ka bi ru ka ti paze stiSh+Tha te/ sma ra swa ra pra tidz+nyA na swA hA/ 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so//

199b1(rgyud): na du sbeng te mdung rtsi lta bur bya/ nye sma can gyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na mangs man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ ban d+ha la a dz+nyA he ku mA ri ke swA hA/ nye skra can gyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya dang

204b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang bshad/ 'chang 'chang bar 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// ngas ni sangs rgyas kyi ning rab 'bum gang dgan/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa thams cad
204b7(rgyud): du'ajug pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'chang ba pa mthong ngo // gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de k+ta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas/ 
204b8(rgyud): grags kyi chog shes par 'dod na thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs la mngon par brtson par bya'o// gang tsadang rnga dang ta dang pa rnams thogs dang tha ma dang / dbus dang ldanan ting
205a1(rgyud): tshogs la 'jug pas byang chub dang skyong ba dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa dang bcas par thob par byed do// de bas na gsang sngags kyi chog la dang byal/ 
205a2(rgyud): sa pa'i bsdad dang ldan par gyur pa/ de dag nyid pog ma dang tha ma dang dbus dang lhan cig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/ gsang sngags kyi tshig re re la ci ltar 'dod par nges par sbyar bar bya'o// 
205a3(rgyud): yis rnab par rtogs na ni// de dag bla med gnas mchog ste// de ltar 'di ni 'khor lo gcig sde 'khor lo bzhin du yongs su 'khor ba ni yi ge'i 'khor lo'o// sngags pas yi ge'i 'khor lo
205a4(rgyud): shesan rtag tu ci ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo bskor ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'jug pa 'i rno chos kyi yi ge'i tshul rim par phye ba'o// 
205a5(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis sems ca gyi khams thams cad la gzigs nas/ chos kyi
205a6(rgyud): mngon par bsgrub pa 'di nyid kyis/ sems can rnams ma lus pa gdon par thags dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod kyi mthu rlabs/ de bzhin
205a7(rgyud): shegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid bkod pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de nyid kyi tshe sems can
205a8(rgyud): lus sa sa par 'byung bar byed pa na baspu'i thug thams cadanas/ thasam 'dzis ba bzhin las che nga rnam par smin pa'i 'bras pa bang ngag pa
205b1(rgyud): kha rog dang dbyibs dang ro dang / 'gro ba dang spyod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig brjod pa sems can thams cad so so// so sor yang dag par mgu bar byed pa/ chos kyi dbyangs kyis rnam par bskyed pa'i ska rdabs
205b2(rgyud): ba bathar to// byung nas kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rnams su/ sgra dbyangs gcig gis chos kyi dbyings khyab par rnam par rig par byed pa/ de bzhin gshi gas pa
205b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di sgrogs par gyur to// chos kyi mtshan nyid gang las ni// chos rnams dag ni thams cad dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos dang // rang rgyal skyeb pa dmas dang ni
205b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang // de bzhin rgyal mchog rnams dang // sems can sdod kyi 'jig rten dgan btags pa rim pa bzhin 'brang zhing / chos rabs skye dang gnas pa dang / gang bas
205b5(rgyud): 'brung gyur pa// shes rab bapas dang ldan 'gyur zhing // yid gnyis som nyi dang bral ba// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab bshad pa'i// lam 'di byed kyis bsgom par gyis// de nas de bzhin gshegs
205b6(rgyud): thu chos kyi dbye pa las byung ba de dag gis/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang gi zhunam par dag par byed pa skul ba'i sprin gyis yongs su bgrang nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang badza bu thugs kyis
205b7(rgyud): ma gyis 'asu thug bams cad nasas bcas 'byung ba gci nas gcig bachud pabyen gyi 'dus 'aya ga chos kyi byes kyigan zhugs pa gyur to// de nas yang yo ldam
205b8(rgyud): byang rgyas sams papa' ba mdzes 'ga' ma pa/ gas bapa 'dag pa// sa pa 'i kyil 'ayo nas par yongs ldanas pa khyen ma mngasapa shang ra#
206a1(rgyud): bsamatshan pa yod gyis/ de nyon la legs pa rab tu yid bzung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// de nad ces bka' stsal ba dang / gsang ba bya'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan
206a2(rgyud): 'das mnyan te// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka tshul gdang po sngags pas dkyil 'khor de// rang gi lus la dgod byas te// rkang pa nas ni nu so la// thug gi bar dus ying bas pa/ de
206a3(rgyud): nas grong du sgreng ba'i bar// sngob brtson can gyis chu yid bsam// chu yi yan cad me yi ste// me yi yan cad rlung yin no// bsam nas de nas mkhas pa yis// sa la gzugs brnyan gzhag par
206a4(rgyud): nas phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi sa la bzhugs nas chos mnyam pa nyid la bltas te/ ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la brtags nas rig sngags
206a5(rgyud): rgyal po chom thams cad gcod pa da pa 'di smras so// nathAHsa brgyas/ nAn/ a sa ma banamA cwa k+Shud+hag hrI na/ sar+thAT+Ta e kha~M ais/ sa~Ms ha~MH/ rlung ba swAH/ tra~Ms hA hA/ 
206a6(rgyud): rar swAhA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal 'dzin po 'di smras pa rag tu/ rinas phyog bcu'i 'jig ted gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
206a7(rgyud): phyag g.yas pa cang ste phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor gzhag nas leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par sngang mdzad kyi sku dang gsung
206a8(rgyud): thugs kyis la bzhugs nas/ thams cad du gsang sngags kyi tshul la mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sdang bar bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di
206b1(rgyud): gas pa legs so//  byor non/ bcom ldan 'das dam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi snying pol bzhugs te/ 
206b2(rgyud): 'o'adi dag gis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dpyad cing bdud bzhi phab par byas nas chos kyi dbyings nas byung ba 'di dag gnas gsum nas byung ste/ bdud sdig can rnams btul bar gyur to// de nas
206b3(rgyud): 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes nas nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir sku tshang meng pa brnyes par zur/ de bzhin du gsung drang thugs tshar med pa yang brnyes par gyur to// de ltar me
206b4(rgyud): dmadapa dang ldan zhing / chos thams cad la dbang thob pas 'di ltar gsag sngags kyi rgyal po tshig bcu gnyis po 'di dag nyid las brgyams te chos 'char ro// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang bcom ldan 'das rnab par
206b5(rgyud): gyi srung dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pas na rdzogs pa'i sangs chas bzhin du snang ngo // thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// bcom ldan dam par snang mdzad la// sngags
206b6(rgyud): chog chung shig dang // chog rgyas pa bka' stsal to// ded kyang sngon gyi 'di rnabs kyis// tha med byang chub rtogs nas su// mya ngan 'das lam 'gro ba yi// ma'ab pa med pa'i chos bshad pa/ 'jig
206b7(rgyud): bsun bzhugs pa ye// rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dbang du 'gyur// de nas dpal man rdo rje 'dzin// bsam pa bachog rabu mgu gyur pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin brlabs pas// 'a
206b8(rgyud): pa ni tshig smras pa// chos 'di rnams ni mtshan nyid med// jo ma nyi meng gnas med pa// las dang tshalas rnam par grol/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'dod/ bugs rjes mnga' des
207a1(rgyud): bkon pa rnams kyi thabs byas na// dbabang khru rnams du nga bya ba'i ba dag pa chog na ngas cad du bad pa'
207a2(rgyud): su la dpade sla nas/ ga los pa'i 'gro ba rnams la bas sau/ snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen mon chos tshod yi byir ba ba ldan 'das rnam par mang ma
207a3(rgyud): // kun mkhyen sran dang bral ba'o// tsha ba thams cad gcod mdzad pa// 'dren pa khyed la thu 'di// dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngon rom tu// ci zhig bye ba 'dren pas gsungs/ 
207a4(rgyud): dpo slob dpon dang // slob pa'ang na pa bdu ru bshad// sa gzhi ci 'drar 'tshal bar lagyi// de yang ci ltar sbyang bar 'gyi// ci ltar sa ni dag par 'thur// ci ltar de ni brtan pa lags// slob pa'i dgos pa
207a5(rgyud): gang gis brtse// sbyang ba'ang 'dren pas bka' skyem cig/ dag pa'i mtshan man+de 'dra dang // gang gisang dag bsrung bar 'gyi// sa ni gang gis byin gyis brlag// dang ni nga po gang gis bcug/ sa ya~M N+Da lAs phigs
207a6(rgyud): pa'i// srang bu rnam par du 'tshal ba ma// mchod pa rnam par dung 'tshal bgyi// me tog bdug spos ci 'drar dang // me tog dang ni bdug spos dag/ ci ltar dbul ba 'dren pas gsungs// lu ba shos sbyin sreg
207a7(rgyud): sa rnams kyang // gang dag la sa ci ster bam// lha rnams kyi ni gdan dag kyang // gang la gang gis bgyi 'gasang+yas//  dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams kyang // sgo ri ma bzhin du gon pos gsungs/ 
207a8(rgyud): lha rnams dang ni phyag rgya dang // gdan gyi tshad kyang bshad du gsol// phyag rgya rnams ni gang nas thung // ci phyir phyag rgya zhes kyang 'gyi// dbang bskur nam pa du 'tshal bgyi// dam
207b1(rgyud): sngags byung ba la na pa so// sngags pa byang chub sems dpa' / na ra ltar 'gyur// tso skor bden pas thong bar 'gyur// da su rnas pa du 'tshal pa// ba par du
207b2(rgyud): dka' stsol cag/ chu nas nam mkhang 'gro ba dang // ce ltar mi snang 'gyur ba dang // gtso bo lus 'dim par byar// ci lcang lha'i lus thob 'gyur// sprul parnasas ni hrI gas pa// da la gang nas 'byung bar gyur/ 
207b3(rgyud): me dang phyogs rnams dang // rgya skar gapa' dang skar ma dang // yud tsam dang ni thang cig dang // rga dang 'dre dang rgud pa dang // lhas ngan dag ni thams cad kyang // de la ci myur yung ri 'thung // rkang gnyis
207b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang // sngags pa tsa ltar 'bral mi 'gyur// smin sreg las dang medag dang // tshi mA par bgyi ba du 'tshal 'phye// lha rnams kyang ni so so la// ngo bo nyid ni 'dren pa sa ga sungs// 'jig rten
207b5(rgyud): ljags rnams dang // de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa yi// tshad dang 'bras bu rnam grangs dang // ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang // las kyi rnam pa gang du srin// ci ltar rnam par smin mi 'gyur// sngags
207b6(rgyud): mas ni nam shige na// las dang tshe las rnam grol 'gyur// de nas kun mkhyen rdzogs sangs rgyas// bcom ldan spun dang bral ba yis// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs// snying rje chen po'i rtsa las 'bru
207b7(rgyud): spang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams dgod pa// lha rnams kyis ni rnam ngas pa// theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis dang gsungs// dpa' bo cher 'bung khyod kyis gang // 
207b8(rgyud): eb de sags so// sagan rje mapas tsham la// mdor ni bsdus das bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor gyini sro ros du// khyab rnams ni nges pal gnas kyi mas rnams 'dod pa las
208a1(rgyud): shes pas ni ci rigs 'ang/ rang gi ting nge 'dzid la gnas te// rims sngags rgyal lo slob sa brgya// yan mag bcu gnyis chog 'bra'as// go rim pazhin du bzlas 'arjod bya// 
208a2(rgyud): sngags pa / rtogs nus pa'i// nga po nam pa gnyis shes na/ ba nga mi bya thugalas// de mamacan me gas par / che shes par bya/ lum na rnams yong
208a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams ni sras mchog ste// mthong ba'i chos ni rnam par spangs// gnyis pa mthong ba'i chos rnams kyis// mos par gyur pa dmigs pa can// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rapa
208a4(rgyud): 'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor kun// de yis bri bar bya ba'i phyir// rjes su gnang zhing dbang yang bskur// dus dang dus min bye brag las// slol pa rnam bzhing zhes bya ste// gcig na de yi mdo las/ 
208a5(rgyud): bsgrub// gnyis su bsgrub dang gnyis gar min// mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa yi// slob ma de ni rgyal po'i mchog/ sa ni dang por shes bya ba// sems kyi sar ni bshad par bya// skud pa snga
208a6(rgyud): bsnyen pa ste// da mas de ni yongs su spyad// nam zhig nyis dang bral ba // sems kyis ni mi 'jig sa// de tsha de ni dag pa ste// nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs// mngon par bya
208a7(rgyud): bas na// de ltar de ni btan zhes bya// de las gzhan dus sbyong ba// de ni dag par mi 'gyur ro// sngags pa rtog la gnas nas su// gang zhigs slong byed pa ni// byang chub sems ni dam spangs pa
208a8(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po de med pa// de bas rtog pa nam spangs nas// sa kun rnam par spyad par bya// nga yis dkyil 'khor rnams kyi ni// cho ga rgyas pa gang bstan pa// de dag thog par bstan pa ni// longs
208b1(rgyud): nas to// bdun rgyal zung ga// ci srid pa sangs par nga ni// 'jig rten 'ang nasangs rgyas len pa ma khyer zhes kyang myi bya'o// slob ma rnams pa nan tan du// byang
208b2(rgyud): ba de dag par gyur// sa byin gyis brlab dang po na// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bya bar bshad// gnyis pa sems kyi dbang gis te// 'di ni gzhan du mi bya'o// srad bu rnam par bzhir ba shad da// dgar po srid // 
208b3(rgyud): da //  gas nan pa la pa/ sa panamam sa ba shang//  snru sa ni/ rdzas su// de da kyi 'khor ga/ na par ma// bad bdag ni gnyis pa yis// s+yam dkyi 'khor dgod par
208b4(rgyud): byang nga sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang // de sras bro can rnams kyi gad no// pad+ma yid las byang ba'i mchogs bkra shis 'jig rten rnams kyi sngags// rang rgyal dang ni dgra bcom pa// phyogs gcig shes
208b5(rgyud): dgang grags pa// de dag snyan du shes bya ba// pad+ma las byung 'dab ma'o// 'jin rten yin lha rnams ka ra/ tshangs la sogs pa 'jag rten grags// de dag spyan ni mad+ma ma // rgya po rnams kyis sngags
208b6(rgyud): 'o// phal pa rnams patsa gas par// sa yai bye brag dag las sam// mchod pa rnam bzhi zhes bya ste// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar ba dang // de bzhin byams dang snying rje sa ma chog bdug spos 'jig rten
208b7(rgyud): pa'o// sor po las zung me tog rnams// slob pa kun las dbul bar bya// yan lag sun 'byung phyag rgya ni// bcings nal byang chub sems bsgoms te// lo sor mgom po tham sa nang du rma 'ang sras
209a1(rgyud): rnams lanan tan bya'o// 'di ni skyon med me tog ste rab tu bsrung zhing dam pang mdzes// chos kyi dbyings kyi sngon gang rnams// rgyal bamacho
209a2(rgyud): phyi byung ba// ting 'dzin dbang gis spang ba yi// sngags kyi de dag byin gyis brlabs// chos kyi dbyang sa las byung ba yi// sprin mang rgya med ba pa rnams / sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni/ 
209a3(rgyud): rtag tu char bzhin 'bab// lha rnams pal pa gzhan la ni// me tog 'di rnams bsgrags pa ste// rang gi sngags rgyung rgyas shes pas// TIsbyar rigs pa dbul bar bya// de bzhin me tog drug
209a4(rgyud): rnams// ci sngar rigs par rnam par bsam// mche'o srin lag sbar ba ni// bkra shis pa zhes bshad pa ste// de yis me tog dablangs nas// rang gi snying ga'i phyogs nas dngul// 'jig rten pa yi lha
209a5(rgyud): pa lte ba'i thad ka nas shes bya// bdug sdes rdo rje khu tshur dam// yang na pad+ma'i phreng ba yis// bar sdang la ni garungs nas su// 'jig rten mgon skyob rnams la dbul// de las gshan pa 'jig rten pa'i
209a6(rgyud): lha rnams la ni go ba bzhin// phyid rang gi bye brag gis// sbyin sreg rnam pa gces shes bya// las dang re pas rnas par grol// slar yangs bon 'byung ba ste// las 'dod pa yis sprin sreg na// nad gi kyi
209a7(rgyud): sreg zhes su bshad// phyi rol kyi ni gsum ldan zhing // ka nas gsum pa ni gsu ba la gnas// las gsum gyi ni las grub pa// 'jig rten pa yi spang sreg mchog na srin sreg las ni mi shes pa
209a8(rgyud): gang dag gzhan du byed di/  sngags kyi shes pa spangs pa ste// glen des 'bras bu mi ma lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa gsungs sngags dang // de bzhin rdzogs yangs kyis kyis gsungs// dag nga
209b1(rgyud): bair bu shes par bya// shAgan rdo thams cad pa// 'dzag rten dbang dbyug gsang sngags mgalas kyi gyi zug dag las dag pa/ ngan du thul ni nyam pa dang / ga ma bzhin du num po dang // drug sum da
209b2(rgyud): sa'ang// dbyibs ni legs par bshad pa yin// gzugs ni gnas su shes bya ste// bud med dang ni sres pa nyid// yang na kun du thams cad kyi// kha dog dbyibs dang shi tshigs rnams te/ 'asu pa
209b3(rgyud): shes las byang ba// debs de rnams bsam las to// ye shes mkhyen gyi ye shes ni// sems can don pri ya nga Sh+Ta // yid kyi rgya ni mi ma pa// stan dang phyag rgya dag dang ni// g+ha mi kyang go
209b4(rgyud): // mdu na/ margyas pa gyu las/  dan rnam /  sa/  kyi
209b5(rgyud): na /  sugs gas so// de na ta sa sa gyul/  'a//  ga
209b6(rgyud): sa ba skye// rnyan pa sra sha // gsum pa yid kyi shes bya// dz+wa la dang du rnaMs la 'o//  pa gas pa ba byas sa// na pa kyang bag
210a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang ni phyag rgya mthong // las dang byang la yang sbyar// rnams phung ni mabyed pa// de yang dam tshig shes par bshad// phrag mya kyil 'khor bri ba rnams// de tshe chog bzhin du
210a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung ba yi// dbang bskur med pa'i sngags pa yin// gas ba 'id kyi 'khor dbus sud // sngags pa tshogs dbang bsrung ba// ngas chog shes pa sdu shes bya// dmatshig can zhes
210a3(rgyud): // dul zhugs bzang po byang chub phyir// gang zhig sems ni bsgom pa na// sngags pa gnas gsum mi dmigs pa// de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin// thabs kyi snying stobs bskyed nas su// sem
210a4(rgyud): nal sbyang bar bya// dmigs su med pa'i skyob thob pa// rgyal ba'i mchog tu shes payar bya// theg ma nas ne zhi ba'i chos// gang gis sems ni ri ngab bzhin// gnas pa de ni bden pa mthong // 'di bden 'di ni yang dag
210a5(rgyud): zhen du ni mi bsrug// ci ltar sangs rgyas bden gzigs pa// de bzhin sngon ni nges mthong ba'i// byang chub sems thob gang yin de// dngos grub de las gzhan ci dgos// de las gzhan du'ang dngos grub de// 
210a6(rgyud): ma bdag ni ltar 'dod de// sbyor ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang // de bzhinas ni gnon pa dang // 'jig rten mngon shes lnga 'dod dang // sangs rgyas nyid drug gzhan no// chud las rgyud du gyur ba yi// las ni ci sa
210a7(rgyud): sa shing // nam smin rnam par ma smin par// ngos sub dag ni dus su 'dod// mdor da gang tshe dus gcig tu// sus dang skye ba 'phangs rdur pa//  tse'ang sngags pas dngos grub de// yid las yang dag
210a8(rgyud): shong // grub nas mkha' la 'gro ba ni// ci ster sgrum 'jigs med bzhin// sngags kyi dra'as rmongs byed pa// ri ltar mig 'dul chen po bzhin// gang la lus dang ngag med pa// dri za'i thong zer cib
210b1(rgyud): de bzhin gyi snang 'gyur shes bya// de ni de na gnas pa yin// ji ltar nyal ba'i rmi lam na// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su phyin// lus kyang spangs pa ma yin la// de da kyis kyang dem song // de bzhin rnal 'byor
210b2(rgyud): kyang // sngags pa sngags la gnas pa dag/ bsod nams bya ba'i las rnams kyis/ 'dza' dang 'dra ba'i lus kyang 'pho'o// lus dang ngag yid las thang ba'i// gsang sngags yid bzhin nor bu dra/ 
210b3(rgyud): delas rnam par bsams pa'i don// ma brtags par yang 'byung bar 'gyur// ci ltar nam mkha' phyogs rnams su// 'dus byas spyod yul thams cad kyis// mi gos de bzhid sngags pa yang // rtog pa'i
210b4(rgyud): / da yul kun gyis so// 'di kun 'du shes tsam du ni// nam zhig de ltar bsgoms gyur cing // rnam par bsgoms na sngags pa de// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lhan cig dga'// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtsobo
210b5(rgyud): yis// sbyin sreg gnyis su bshad pa ni// phyi rol gyi dang nang gi ste// de yang tshim par bya dang bcas// lha rnams kyi ni so so yi// rang bzhin yongs su mkhyen nas sa// 'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams kyi// tshad
210b6(rgyud): / dag legs par ga 'dus pa ni// dbang phyug la sogs mthu chen rnams// bkur ba'i lha rams gang yin pa// de dag gis ni gang byas pa'i// sngags dang phyag rgya stobs chen rnams// 'bras bu bal chen 'phra lda du
210b7(rgyud): ste// tshad bshad pa de yin no// 'on kyang skyed dang 'jig pa yi// chos can de dag brtan pa med// 'jig rten 'das pa'i gas sngags rnams pa// 'og ma'i byed pa med pa'o// sa dang skyeb kur bcang ga zha
210b8(rgyud): gas pa bral rgyal ba dang // ba rgyal bas dus bu dang // de bzhin rgyal ba'i nyan pos dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang // gsang sngags cad ni sbed pa ga ba// dus gzung las de 'i
211a1(rgyud): 'das nas das bzung ba// mthong dang ma mthongar 'bras bu can// dag yid yum las byung ba'o// 'jig rten pa yi 'bras bu'i tshad// bskal pa gcig tu bshad pa ya// yang nga/

211a5(rgyud): lnga rtogs pa brang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgonas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa snod la chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa/ spyod yum du byung ba/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bskal bar
211a6(rgyud): ying dab bcas pa rnams kyi do dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dri nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad //
