245b7(rgyud): pa yod pa ma yin te// rnam shes brgyad po gnyis mtshan// de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de rnams/ so so'i ye shes mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ bsam pa tha da pa
245b8(rgyud): blo gros tha dad pas tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs pa'i don ci ltar rjes su mthun par khong du chud nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs
246a1(rgyud): lags so// zhus bya ba phrul / gas sngags sul la lags gnas dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa la// yang dag nyid 'di sgom 'gyur ba/ da dgas sa
246a2(rgyud): rgyas nyid du 'gyus// de nas de'i ni byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon ngas gtsigs dbang phyugan bcom ldan 'das rnam par sna mdza kyi byin gyis brnams kyis/ 
246a3(rgyud): ma ldan dpa la 'di ska ma // sa pa ma togasas 'das pa'i// ma dres sams de nga rdzasas nyi nga grub ni mam pa' skyem
246a4(rgyud): lha spos rje 'tshal// glang gis te dang 'dra ba'i sems/ mnyam par bzhag pas 'dul nas su// byams dang snying rje btan byas na// dngos grub brtan po med la 'ji 'i// 
246a5(rgyud): rtag tu ma skyes pa// de yis bon a yi mchog/ rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyis gsungs// a ni stong pa nyid ces bgyi na 'i ge'i phyi mo phyi mo kun// de bzhin 'dren ldan gang gi phyir/ 
246a6(rgyud): ra mi 'gyur dang ldan pa// de phyir bsam pa bgyi ba lags// a dang u mas pa dang ni kha'i dang la dang a mchog sngags a mchog sdang ba'i dam pa ste// 'di las tha pa
246a7(rgyud): ma 'o// des ni gas man pa sa ba na sogs rnas dkyil ma chog
246a8(rgyud): rdzogs// 'de dag rgya tsham don gyi mchog/ rnam 'a mang sa mdon rnam par gyi// lags brtse ba bya chub btsog de sazhi lani gugs pa te// lu mas pa kyibs mtshad pa
246b1(rgyud): sa smra ma na man span du ma na mag nga maza cha dag lag 'dran 'tham
246b2(rgyud): dang // ra dang tshig drag ldan pa ni// chos kyi dbyings dang rtag ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzlas byas dngos grub 'thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems pa
246b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ sa bcu rtogs par khong du chud// sems dpa' chen po legs so lags// bder gshegs yang dgami la pa'i// de nyid thams cad
246b4(rgyud): bshad// lag nA dngas smras pa yi/ rab tugs pa khyod kyis rtogs// shes legs sa shes b+ha ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gas papa pa'i bdag paphyag na rdo rjes 'di skang byas pal/ 
246b5(rgyud): dpa' bo chos dbyings rang bzhin gyi// 'khor lo bskor brgyal ba'i mchog/ byang chub sems kyis legs bsdams te// 'jig rten dpa' bo'i phyag rgya dang // mi skye ba yi yi ge yis// de
246b6(rgyud): nyid bsdams nas su// stong pa gnyis su med sbyor bas// las rnams thams cad bskur bar bya ma chos dbyings rnam pa bdag pa'i bdag nas bon yi ge dang ldan par// bsams nas mas
246b7(rgyud): dang pa yis// bzlas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// khrus dang gshegs la sogs pa dang // rab tu dben par lhun len dang // phyag rgya ga phreng sems pa'i// blos las dngos grub btam pas
246b8(rgyud): a byis dang ldan gyung pa// sngags padigams kyis sazlab lan mig 'grod pakyi gros lams 'ayul // grub par mi 'gyu datho med// gsangs pa'i 'das po kyilasan
247a1(rgyud): dod byed pas rang gi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga de la la ror lo bskor bar bzhag par bya'o// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par
247a2(rgyud): ba byin gyis rlob pa las bsgom pa'i yi ge dgod pa dang / dpeng bskur ba rnam par bye ba'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das
247a3(rgyud): kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ sems kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thabs sna tshogs kyis ba
247a4(rgyud): dang mos pa ci lta ba bzhin du bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol// de la re shig thog mar mag 'dis sdig pa so sor bshags par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chu
247a5(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cud bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di shes partsi bas dus 'di nas gzung sten ma snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du/ skye ba thog ma dang thamam mchis pa
247a6(rgyud): 'khor ba ma 'khor ba'i tshe/ bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las gang bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpang
247a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi spyan sngar so sor bshags so// de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan sngar gsum la skyabs
247a8(rgyud): su 'gro ba gzung bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bangag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes pakyi 'dul 'di nas bzung ste/ nam byang chub kyi
247b1(rgyud): ba la mchis kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku zhig bla na med pa mos rang gis rig pa la skyabs su ma rgya
247b2(rgyud): phyogs bzhi'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la skabs su mchi'o// de ltar la ni gnyi sar ltar lan gsum du bya'o// de nas bdag dbul ba ni/ sangs
247b3(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas gzung ste nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas dang byang
247b4(rgyud): tub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dus thams cad du yod ye dbul gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag pazhes su gsol
247b5(rgyud): wAr lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du bya'o// de nas dam tshig gi phyag brgya bcings la gsang sngags brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ a sa mo tre sa ma sa ma ye swA hA/ de nas chos
247b6(rgyud): kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab po// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ d+harmA d+hA tA swa b+hA ba A ta ma ko haM/ de nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab baM// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ badz+ra At+ma ko&haM/ de nas
247b7(rgyud): byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bad ga ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas gzung ste/ nam byang chub
247b8(rgyud): nga po la mchis kyi bar du/ dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/ chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir rang
248a1(rgyud): rgam mam gdod ma nas ma skyes pa/ stong pa nyid kyi ba nyid du saltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub tu sems
248a2(rgyud): bskyeng ba dbazhin du 'dug gi kyang bskyed do// daltar lan gnyis lan u bya'o// de nas gang pa'i phyag tu bar bcing sa yang bzhi gshegs pa'i ma' thams cad dang rjo
248a3(rgyud): tigs sogs pa'i dri rnams te/ dag+sa sngags kyi tshul mo 'di lan gsum du brjod par byag/ sa ky-i sa / A baM snrums sa/ gzhan le d+harmA d+g+ha d+hA k+Sha shas ma hAm
248a4(rgyud): ga pa shAH9/ ma kya na snyen/  / d+haHb+h+ya hrI zhug y-i/  drug tun gyi ba bangs drib lcagag
248a5(rgyud): ni gang ba'i phrag rgya'i mtshan nyid do// bzlas brjod kyi tshig rim par dbye ba 'o// de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis 'i rgya
248a6(rgyud): ma par rol pa bstan nas/ yang skyel bsas gyis mi grub pa bstan stong ba zhed pas/ dab kyi gtsug ta chos mdza sa bya ma ma gyi khams margyal bas pa
248a7(rgyud): bas po sdang bar byed pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba byung ngo // de nas rjod ze chen po dra ba bkod pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa rgya chen po rnam par rol pas chos kyi kyi
248a8(rgyud): pho brang nam mkha'i khams ltar rgya che ba na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bskor ba byas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du snang ba
248b1(rgyud): byas te sems can gyi khams ma lu ma yongs su bskyab pa la sbyar nas sems can dmal pa dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas kyi 'gro bar skyes pa rnams kyang tshim par byas te/ lha dang mi'i 'jig rten/ 
248b2(rgyud): dmas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stug po bkod pa'i khongs su gtogs par byin gyis brlabs nas chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi stongs
248b3(rgyud): na gyis brlabs rgyu mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas byin du brlabs te chos kyi dbyings kyi dgos pa ma rdzogs snying rje chen po'i snying po 'thung ba'i mdzod ces bya ba/ sems can gyi khams ma nges pa
248b4(rgyud): yongs su skyob pa'i snying po dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas kyang phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra/ 
248b5(rgyud): dang mnyas bskyed la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag sems can gyi 'bras mnges pa yongs su skyob pa'i snying po'i tshul ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba dkyil lakhor gangal
248b6(rgyud): nan byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshogs nA dadus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ning chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba yang yod do// de skad ces
248b7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang / phyag na do la sogs pa ji ji 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra ba dang mnyas pa dag gis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab cing ba bar gshegs pa/ 
248b8(rgyud): / dal bab ste bcom ldan 'das legs lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thug brtse ba'i slad du/ dkyil la/  chen po bkod pa byin gyis rlob pa gang lags pa de dag bshad du
249a1(rgyud): gsol/ chos rje chos kyi dbang phyug ste// chos kyi dbang phyug mthar byed bra ga/ khe ges cha mnga' ston pa ste// sa yi dbang phyug gcig pu lags// don grub tshogs kyang grub pa ste// 
249a2(rgyud): zhung mas nas shing srid mthar byin// sman pa'i mtshan de nyid garten// 'gag pa mi mnga' chang mi mnga'// mtha gnyis rnam par spangs pa lags// de bzhin nyid dang yang dag mtha'
249a3(rgyud): sa med rtogs par thugs su chud// skyabs dang gnas dang gling dang ni// mya ngan 'das dang zhi ba'ang lags// bar ba rigs nad mi mnga' dag/ rdul sgron dang ni bral ba lags/ 
249a4(rgyud): na brjod pal ba // dngos po thams cad rnam par 'jig/ de ltar rdo rje 'dzin de kun// rtag tu ying+ga rab dgar ba stis// mtshan ni yang dag bsgrags byas nas// rnam par 'dren lags
249a5(rgyud): 'debs// kun mkhyen dpa' chen spyan bral gyis// de dag gis gsol thugs chung nas// snying rje chen po'i snying po ni// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad ces gsungs// de nas gas
249a6(rgyud): bapa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming
249a7(rgyud): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po byag mardo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming ni sangs rgyas med pa'i 'a
249a8(rgyud): rten gyi khams rnams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba kun du ston pa'o// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
249b1(rgyud): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mamangagapa' bang bu'o zhes gsungs pa ma lags pa ma/ nam mkha' la ni sa la yang ma mchis 'gag
249b2(rgyud): yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang skyeb ya ma bachis 'gags yang ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du 'di skad du 'di ni mangs
249b3(rgyud): rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sangs rgyas 'thung ba zhes gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi tshe sprul pa'i sangs rgyas yongs
249b4(rgyud): ngan pas 'das par gyur pa da'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de dag byang chub sems dpa' gas sngag sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spang bstod pa nas sad kyi tshin tshar chen po bkod pa byin
249b5(rgyud): ngob pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// de skad ces bkra' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rjes com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso to// bcom ldan 'a
249b6(rgyud): mtshar lags te/ gdan sems can 'dod chags dang na sdang dang gti mug dang g.yo dang sna dang po chom gyi bams pa mdad pa tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa coM lta ba bzhin yong su rdzogs pa
249b7(rgyud): la kying chub sems pa thamams dpa' can po dag tsun shin du dgas pa rjid pa dzin pa gyi'o// bcom ldan das byas papa stsa / yag nga/ rigs dag ni ngas rgya
249b8(rgyud): bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyis rigs kyi bu de dag gis na sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsab bskrun par rig par bya'o// chos snang ba'i sgo gsum gyis kyang nges par byung ba yin te gsum
250a1(rgyud): zhen 'das / snying chen tha tshul gyi sgo snang bar tshul dang chos zab ma rgyal gyi sa sna ba'i tshul dang de bzhi gshegs pa la mchod pa dang 'akur gyi byed pa'i tshul
250a2(rgyud): cibu de dag ni chos snang ba'i tshul gyi sgo 'di gsum dang ldan par rig par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa dang thugs rje chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi po dra
250a3(rgyud): chen po na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na dza nga la bka' stsal pa/ lagan rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid nyon cig/ dal re shin
250a4(rgyud): dpon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa snying rje can dad pa che ba chos rab mo la gnas pa shes rab
250a5(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la mkhas pa sgyu rtsal rnams la mkhas shing bzo ba gtsang zhing bag yod pa/ gsang sngags spyad ba dag dang ni// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor las la bslabs// dkyil 'khor
250a6(rgyud): las bya bar// bla ma la sa ni lung thob pA// sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog sa// gang zhig yang gnyis med gyur cing / sems can khams ni la lus pa/  yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyi
250a7(rgyud): brtson pa// mkhas pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi// dkyil 'khor dag ni bri bar 'os// mtshan nams thams cad yongs rdzogs btan// yid gzhungs pa la dpa' snying can// bdag gang srong
250a8(rgyud): ma rnams kyi'ang rung // bgegs ni zhi bar byed par nus// yang dag bden pa'i don togs la// gang gi mos pargya che zhing // bzod dang ldan la nga rgyal med/ na rlab la'i tshi li las byed cig/ 
250b1(rgyud): drabs pom pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi smon lam dag/ thos nas phyi phyir dga' ba dang // rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba dang // gsang sngags spyong la ba
250b2(rgyud): bzlas brjod brjod ga gang 'bang dang // gnam sgra thams cad mi sems la// 'jig rten chos la mi ltan// sngags la gzhol ba'i sngags pa ni/  yon tan de la sogs ldan na// slob dpon/ 
250b3(rgyud): napas bkur ba yin// yang na chos rnams thams cad mi rnam par dben la gang gnas pa// de yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ na sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston par 'om// yang na rdzogs pa'i sangs
250b4(rgyud): rgyas kyis// bsngags pa'i dam tshig gsum shes sa ma// rgas pa thams cad rnams spangs pa// de la gnas pa'i sngags pa nini/ yon tan kun dang ma ldan ya // de yang dkyil gakhor 'bri bar/ 
250b5(rgyud): roso// de lta'i yon tan kun ldan na// las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis// jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // 'jig rten 'das rkun bya bar 'os// de slob dpon la gzhan gyis bskul na slob mngon du gnyer
250b6(rgyud): zhidi de la drad par shes na/ de ltar shes nas slob dpon des// sa la'i legs par brtag par bya// mchod pa kum dga'i skyed mos tshag/ rdzing bu rnams kyis kun brgyan cing // 'bras bu me tog
250b7(rgyud): ldan pa yi// ljon shing de bzhin ldum bu dang // ges par ma pa nyams dga' ba// 'bras bu me tog ldan pa dang bdang 'khru thung ma bya dang // bzhad dang me tso sha ri rnams// gang gi yul na yod pa
250b8(rgyud): chub na tan bskyed nga bstan// mi rtag 'bras bu ldan pa dang krugs shes mede 'dzi bu dang // 'ab ladu chu nam me // su srung na nas gathor bcar// dang rdzogs pa tholdan gyis/ 
251a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor longs spyod 'phel bar bri// yul ni shin du snum pa dang // gtsug lag khang dang khang pa dang // lha yi gnas dang phyugs lhas dang // shing gcig lam gyi bzhim
251a2(rgyud): yang // zhi ba'i las las zhi ba yi// dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis nr-i// khang pa stong pa'am dur khrod dam// snam mang drag po'i las can dang // ngan cing rtsu ba la 'jigs pa can// de bzhin
251a3(rgyud): ching mi bzad 'jigs// de la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su// drag po'i las kyi dkyil 'khor bri// drag por drag po'i las rnams bya// zhi bar zhi ba'i las bya'o// rgyas par rgyas pa nyid
251a4(rgyud): yin te// de ni rgyas pa'i cho ga'o// yang ni yid ni gang dag tu// nges par dga' ba skye 'gyur ba// yul der dkyil 'khor bri ba yi// las ni legs par sbyar bar bya// gang gi sems ni rnam
251a5(rgyud): dag cing // the tsom la sogs rnams spangs pa// de las las rnams thams cad ni// 'grub par 'gyur ba dogs pa med// rnam par rtog pa spangs pa yi// rnam par mi rtog byang chub yin/ 
251a6(rgyud): dayang mamato/ ga/ sang pa yis// thob par 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis min// de bas rnam pa thams cadang // bro ldan ying gnyis spangs nas su// 'jig te mthun la phan 'dod pas// 
251a7(rgyud): rab can gyis dkyil gakhor bri// yul med dus kyang yongs yin// zla ba med cing byed pa'ang med// chos rnams dag ni thams cad la// chos nyid 'ba' shog yod pa yin// byis pa
251a8(rgyud): shes pas bsgribs pa// rlu dang byin gyis brgyal bas na// stong pa tshal ni martogs pas// rtag tu bdud kyi dbang dugyur// dkas ston pa ye shes mangs// spros med rtog par
251b1(rgyud): cig/ ma ga thams cad blangs pa yi// chos myiganal du med pa gag// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rkyen pag pa'i rgyal pags
251b2(rgyud): 'dzin la sdom par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms pa bzhugs pa dang skyen mtshams nas sangs rgyas kyi zhed thams cad kyi rgyan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer thung ngo // byung nas kyad kun du snang
251b3(rgyud): to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di kun du srung bar byas nas kyang gang gi rnam pa dang yon tan gyi mtha' bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'argya stong du yang rtogs par mi nus pa lha'i sgo khyod kyis rab tu brgyan bde
251b4(rgyud): shegs pa'i rnam par smin pa las gyur pa/ me tog gi gdi'i snying po bkod pa'i rgyan can 'di dag thams cad lag mthal bzhin du mnyam par gyur to// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa pa
251b5(rgyud): ngami khyab pa byin gyis brlabs nas 'od zer de dag gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag mardo rje'i spyi bor mi snang bar gyur to// 'od zer de dag mi snang bar gyur ma thag tu phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das
251b6(rgyud): gebal la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po bkong ba'i byin kyis rlob pa bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
251b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjel bka' stsal pa/ lagran de rje dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa byin gyis rlob pa nyon cig bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal la na
251b8(rgyud): nams nas phyagan da rje bcom ldan 'das sa nyan pa dang / btsam ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na dub ci skad du bsgrags pa'i gnas rnams su dkyil la
252a1(rgyud): // tshad khragang ga ldan cad dpag tshang mnaca kyi med du bya'o// dpa' chang gcig las skrag par ni mi bya'o// de las gan mnyam la'ang ma// thug sas dag gis lags par bsdus
252a2(rgyud): yang na 'jim pa gtsang ma yis// sngags pa nan tan bsdu bar bya// de nas pur bu sor brgyad pal las thams cad pa'i gsang sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te grwa bzhir mnyam par btab nid
252a3(rgyud): 'khor kun du cis kyang mi tshugs par byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAn/ haM koT ya sa me ma hA tsaN+Da li dz+nyA phaT/ de nas phyi de nyin dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad rnams bsas
252a4(rgyud): te sta gon byas la las thams cad kyi gsang sngags sam 'phags pa mi g.yo bas bsrung po byas te dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs su 'jig tu gzhug go// yang na byin gyis brlabs la bdag nyid
252a5(rgyud): gzhag go// de nas phyi de nyin slob ma rnams gzung bar bya ste dad pa che ba gtsang sbra che ba chos la 'bad pa tshe rigs btsun pa/ mes pa rgya che ba gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am ci snyed 'dod
252a6(rgyud): rnams gzung ngo // las thams cad pa'am 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'am mi bzod pa'i gsang sngags kyi bu mos bka' ba'i skung pa'am/ skud pa gzhan nam yang na tra ku sha lang rung mang
252a7(rgyud): pa gsum bor la/ de nas sngags kyis brgya'am ni// yang na lhag par mngon bsngags te// slob ma'i las rnams 'grub pa'i phyir// dpung pa g.yon par bcing bar bya// u dum pa
252a8(rgyud): shang ni// me to// dral sogs pas bskul// shin du babang po bsrung ba byas// sa brgyad tshangs rtse gcig pa// babang pa yid du'ab ba pag// de nas mkhas pas sbyin par bya/ 
252b1(rgyud): ram byang du khaltas te// so shing dag ni bca' bar bya// de nas blo ldan mi bza' zhing // dpyad pa med par dor bar bya// gang du lhung bar gyur pa ni// de bzhin de las grub par 'gyur// shes
252b2(rgyud): pha ral phyin la sogs// mdo lnga'i chos ni nyan du gzhug/ slob ma skyo bar bya ba'i phyir// chos gtam shin du bzang po bya// gal te mi lam babang po'am// ngan pa dag ni mthong gyur na// bad
252b3(rgyud): skal pa brtag pa'i phyir// bla ma la ni de dag bsnyad// mchod rten kun dga' gtsug lag khang // glegs bam dang ni lha rnams dang // yid bzhin nor bu rin chen gos// yang na me tog 'bras
252b4(rgyud): rnyed// ral gri 'khor lo pi bang dang // grub pa'i rdzas ni sna tshogs rnams// gang gis rmi lam thob gyur rmis// de yi dngos grub yid bzhin 'gyupa/ nyi zla me dang mtshon dag gam// de bzhin gyi
252b5(rgyud): rgal ba dang // glang po che dgazhon mthong ba// de ni dngos grub thob mi dka'// ded la sogs pa'i rmi lam ni// bzang pos 'grub pa dam pa brtag/ rmi lam bzlog pa mi babang ba// 'jigs pa
252b6(rgyud): nami 'grub bo// bong bung mong khyi dang ni// chu ma lag stag dang byil la// mi ni 'bru mar lus bsku ba dang // gcer 'dru ba la mo sdug pa// de la sogs pa'i ming na rnams// blo rdzam me yis blang
252b7(rgyud): yadun dngosams malam dang /  tha~Mng kyar bzhin shes napa// nga tsun pa pa kyil ma rnamapa// ming po myong bar shad bar bya// danas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na drongos 'dag
252b8(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgonas byang chub sems dpa' spyang ba spyod pa rnams/ 'di lta du tshes rnams la dang pa nyid nas the btan par 'gyur ba
253a1(rgyud): // rgyu ni gang rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag ni snying rje chen po dang ldam ning mas thams cad shin du yongs su ma ngan la
253a2(rgyud): 'das par lta ma~M/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang phyin ci log cing mtshan nyid dang bral ba gcig tu shes te des na dang / thams cad la blo brtan zhing nges po yin no// de nas
253a3(rgyud): bcom ldad 'das kyis rgyas kyi dbyings bsam kyis mi khyab pa'i rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pa phyen na dong la bka bul pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pong
253a4(rgyud): 'khor chen po bkod pa byin gyis rlob pa nyon cig/ de la dang po slob dben kyi gtsang sbra byas te bden bral gyi phyogs su gnas la/ dkyil 'khor gyis la rnam
253a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yang dran par byas te mtha' yas pa rgya che ba rab 'byam bkod pa byin gyis rlab pa la blta'o// 5
253a6(rgyud): nas kyang bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la tshon sA lnga'i srang bu'am/ yang namakhas pas blos kyang rung // lha yi gnas rnams nges pa ni// shes rab can gyis rnam pa
253a7(rgyud): // kun du thu bzhi ldam pa la//  bzhin thabs dang yang bcas//  klung rab 'argyas rgya can ldan// rnam par dag pa sems kyis thas// rin cem rdzul phyi ma 'am// yang ma m+b+ha
253a8(rgyud): po ma'ang rung // yang na spos sa ma thal bas kyang // dkyil 'khor sngags pas bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// nub kyi sgo ni dbye bar bya// de nas rigs sdigs rgyal mo ni/ sa
253b1(rgyud): srung ba chen mo'am// yang nam g.yo dran par bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran byas nas// bden thal byin phyogasasu 'gro// de nas srang ba zas nas su// bzhor pa byas te slar log nas// de nas
253b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa ni// du ba dang byang gi phyogs su 'gro// der yang shar du la ltas nas// shar gyi phyogs su srad bu ze// da ltar srang bu tshul shes pas// rtag par thog ma nyid du bya// de nas dbus su 'dus
253b3(rgyud): nas naM// mgon po ngan sang kun spang dang // mi mchog 'od dpag med pa dang // de bzhin sgrib pa kun sa la dang // thub pa me tog kun rgyas dang // rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang // thub chen
253b4(rgyud): las rgyal ba dang // de bzhin mi 'khrugs zhes bya dang // sangs rgyas nga yi sgra dbyangs can// de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran nas// de yang dka' thub can gyis ni// nan tam bskyed de chags
253b5(rgyud): btag/ de ltar las la mkhas pa yis// sa ni legs par brtags nas su// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang // sangs rgyas rnams yu ma yang bklag na yang na bab mo'i mdo sde gzhan// sa rnam
253b6(rgyud): tam pa 'bebs pa bklag/ bklags nas blo dang ldan pa yis// kun du bdug spos bskor nas su// rgyal ba mchog gi sras rnams dang // sangs rgyas rnams la phyag byas nas// sangs
253b7(rgyud): kun gyi sku gzugs sam// phyag rgya mkhas pas bri bar bya// yang na gzhan ni gang yang rtsa// de dag thams cad bri bar bya// de nas ya rabacom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gas
253b8(rgyud): ba'i bdage pa phyag na rdo rje la bkar stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sgor bgang ngan dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems ba'i sgyid pa spyod pa rnams
254a1(rgyud): // tshegs chung ngus sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa ya bsrid pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings bsamar gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul bsgrub pa'i thur ba ma da/ 
254a2(rgyud): ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgrub pa yigaso gang dang ldan cu byang chub sems dpa' gisang sngags kyi sgo nas
254a3(rgyud): / chub sems dpa'a'i spang ba stod pa rnams cho ga thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid cing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mnyes par 'gyod pa'i sgrub pa'i gzhing de dag bshad du gsol// 
254a4(rgyud): daskad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mad kyi ma chos kyi dpyid kyi tshul rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs sgrub pa'i gzhi rgya chen pos byin du brlabs nas sbyor ba bza
254a5(rgyud): bshad do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de las 'khor los skur bas ni dkyil 'khor gyi chad dpag tshad gcig tsam bri bar bya ste gnas tsan dan bzang po sbrel gyi snying po dam pa las byas
254a6(rgyud): pa'i khang pa dril bu g.yer ka chen po dang rin po che'i bla re bres pa/ a ka ru bzang po'i bdug spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa 'dzam bu'i gser gyi srad bus bskor ba
254a7(rgyud): che sna tshogs kyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas steng brgyan parnga sgra snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sgra grag pa/ phyogs bani na rta babs sna tshogs mu tig gi phreng bas btags pa tshon sna tshogs
254a8(rgyud): cos pa'i gos kyis klubs pa bkod ba dang rgyan sna chags kyis sbas pa chen po che'i sgron ma sna chags kyis kyang rnam par gsal bar bya'o// de napa de bzhin gshegs pa
254b1(rgyud): pa'i nang na 'dug bzhin du bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'am de'i rnam pa la dmigs par byin gyis brlabs la chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'am dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings
254b2(rgyud): stong pa'i ngo ma nyid kyi rjes su song 'arnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du gzhul go// de nas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi mig rnam par dag par
254b3(rgyud): pa'i phyir dam tshig bstan par bya'o// de la nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no// shar phyogs su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gru gsum pa pad ma'i steng na 'dug pa
254b4(rgyud): bri'o// ri gas sAk+Sha ni 'di'o// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAn/ a sar+b+ba tra/ ka~M swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas rol du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gi phyag stsal
254b5(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bri'o// de'i gsang sngags ni/ naHsa man+ta bub+hA ba d+hi satwA nAn/ sa man+ta ta a mi te dA ya swA hA/  'og tu su rgya bang po'i phyag rgya ral gri dang gnas kyi dkyil la
254b6(rgyud): chung ngu bri'o// gsang sngags ni/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAn/ badz+ra rA dza mA la swA hA/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i g.yan rol du chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bri'o// de'i 'og tu bcom
254b7(rgyud): 'das shAkya thub pa'i phyag rgya lhung bzang dang chos gos bri'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su nam mkha'i spyan gyi phyag rgya can gtsug tor 'dra ba pad ma'i steng du 'dug par bri'o// bcom
254b8(rgyud): 'das sa mo g.yog du dzangs pa sbyin kyi phyag kyi su t+pala'i steng bu rjeg zhag pa briyin 'phags pa sbyin du bzed po'i byed phyogs su byams pa'i phyag ze rgya ma pa rtsi thugs brim
255a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi nub phyogs su sman ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya pad ma bri'o// bcom ldan 'das khyang phyogs su mtha' yas pa 'phro ba rgya chen po
255a2(rgyud): gzo brgyal po'i phyag rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lho phyogs su rje 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya dri'o// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor cha gsum du byas pa lA la'o/ 
255a3(rgyud): sa ri snam bu bor to// shar phyogs zhu bo nyi'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bre'o// de dag gi shar lho'i mtshams su po nya mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya bI ste/ ponya mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni lcags
255a4(rgyud): kyu'o// tshogs rnams kyi phyag rgya ni zhags pa'o// lho dang byang gi ngos su bran po bran mo rnams kyi phyag rgya bri ste de la bran po rnams kyi phyag rgya ni ral gri'o// bran mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni
255a5(rgyud): kha ga ri dang rdo rje'i khab bri'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa bklag go// bklags nas lang ba la dkyil 'khor bskor ba byas te sangs rgyas bcom lda
255a6(rgyud): 'das rnams la phyag kyang byas la slob ma byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang pa can gtsang sgra che ba yi dmal brtan pa sdom pa gzung ba 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bslab pa'i bsam pa
255a7(rgyud): can snying rje rje bgo da ngar mo kyis g.yogs pa log pa mi stong pa de la sems rtseg cig tu dmigs pa rnams dkyil 'khor bskor ba byas te dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khar 'grengs
255a8(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'am chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'am dam tshig ga phyag rgya bcings te dmatshig brjod la dkyil 'khor du gzung ngo // de nas me tog 'angar du gzhug go// me tog gar ba' pa
255b1(rgyud): lha yin no// de gar dam chag brtan pa can gyis slob dpon pa stod du shes bskyed do// blo nga bod kyis kya babu'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de nas sems kyi rgyang rab dang 'bring da
255b2(rgyud): 5ma ma sgru sa mjug pa'i rnal 'tsha gyi mag ldan na//  ma kyi mi mcho chen pa rtson depa mau tshig gyu // 'jig rten dang
255b3(rgyud): las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs kyang rung ma zhugs kyang rung dam tshig tu zhugs par 'gyur ro// de ltar dkyil 'khor chen por byin gyis brlabs shing sdig pa thams cad dang bral
255b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa yongs su bsgrub pa yid la byed pa des gsang sngags sdud pa'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga rjes su dran pa
255b5(rgyud): bcom ldan dadas rnam par spang mang bkyis rnas kyi dbyings kyi gnas sa yong pa'i byung na pa mas dpa' sems dpa sten pa rnams sa byams pa chum po dang thug
255b6(rgyud): spyan gnyis gis gzugs sa/ zhal cing ba 'du ba ning da bzhin gshags pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i rgyas kyis tha med pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu ma par nga
255b7(rgyud): bstan par bzhed de/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las bskal par yi dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i bzhad pa chen po mngang nas gtsug tor chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas thams cad du de bzhi
255b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer zung ngo // 'od zer de byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam nam mkha ri dbyings kyis klas pa na de
256a1(rgyud): / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi sno las sa pa dag sa ma ma sa na
256a2(rgyud): mthum pa nyid bsnun pa rnam par ros pa'i sgonas ni rnam par ral nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsab rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa dang
256a3(rgyud): dkyil ma kyi byin gyis 'arlabs 'asham pa byas te glenas par gyur to// 'od bar chen po de dag gnas par gyur ma thug tu gsang ba pe'i bdag po phyag mardo kyi sems la sa
256a4(rgyud): 'du/  byung ba / mdza basbyin gzhan pa yi ni sa sas byu ba da ma stan pa da/ ma se duSh+Ta
256a5(rgyud): tshogs kyis rnam mkha ngas ni khabs par byas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sa pa chen po rnams ni bstan nas de banan gshegs pa 'in pa sa sa rnams sa
256b1(rgyud): thams cad rnam par rol pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bshad do// de'i phyir bdag bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam mo// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la bya
256b2(rgyud): 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa nas/ 
256b3(rgyud): ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du bdag rtag tu zhes ring la mchis mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci ltar da ltar ba nad pa chen po sngar mA da dra nas dbu'i gtsug tor
256b4(rgyud): del 'khor nas 'od zer stong phrag sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul sked byung nas 'od ber de rnams kyis kyang 'a jig rten khams na nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa
256b5(rgyud): snang ba bgyid pa'i ngo mtshar 'di lta bu ni bdag gis sngon chad ma mthong lags so// de la bdag 'di snyam du deng bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la so so yang dag par rig pa chen po la 'jug
256b6(rgyud): pa'i tshul sgrub pa rnam par dag pa'i gzhi chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa bshad pa bzhed pa ni bdag cag gis
256b7(rgyud): rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam 'gyid do// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na legs lags kyis/ bdag cags bu the rtse ba'i slad du so so yang dag pa'i rig pa na la'adag pa'i rgyal sgrub pa
256b8(rgyud): par dag pa'i gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/ des
257a1(rgyud): rang snang bar bgyid par 'gyur ba lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag rdo rjel 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// ga
257a2(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po legs so legs so// gang khyod don 'di 'dri ba ni yang legs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de sring lag pa nyon la rab tu 'ad la zung shig dang ngas khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa
257a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa bsgrub pa'i tshul rnam par dag par mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'i gni chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa pa
257a4(rgyud): dmangon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das
257a5(rgyud): nA pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bsang ba pa'i bdag po stong pa nyid kyi gdi ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam
257a6(rgyud): pa'i gzhi ni mngon par rdzogs par byung chub // mtshan nyid me pa'i gzhini mngon par rdzogs par bya chub bzhin na'o//  bzhin gshegs pa gan ni mngon par rdzogs
257a7(rgyud): par byung na pa pa'i ga go// de ltar mngon par rdzogs par byung rgyal pa'i gzhi 'di dag byang ba sems dngas bsgom par bya'o// gas dab pa'i bdag po 'di de de bzhin gshegs pa
257b1(rgyud): sa kyi dbyings rgya chen po rab 'byam mtha' yas pa byin gyis brlabs nas/ nam mkha' de ma med pan rgyal po rnam par smin pa nam gakha' slar rgya cha zhing mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba
257b2(rgyud): de'adzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs mthag tu dbu'i gtsug nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul snang ba yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab
257b3(rgyud): ston pa'is bya bI'o bar byung ngo // byung nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par sdang mdzad la bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma bya
257b4(rgyud): te'ajig rten gyi khams rnam pa bcur snang ba chen pos gsal bar byas te steng gi nam mkha' la gnas nas/ gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor
257b5(rgyud): kasum gyi snang bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthus klas pa sdang bar byas nas sems can gyi kham pa rnams la dam tshig gsum gyi mig skye bar byin gyis ba
257b6(rgyud): 'od zer dag nam mkha' las lhags nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor babs so// 'od zer dag phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor babs ma thag tu denas de'i modo la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes dpa
257b7(rgyud): gshegs pa le yul 'thung ba zhes bya ba'i tidang 'dzin chen po thob par gyur te/ de thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnyis su med par gnas pa thob par gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa
257b8(rgyud): dag po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi dka' bas yid tshim par gyur nas/ mig gnyis mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das rnam par spang mdzad la yud tsam zhig b.las
258a1(rgyud): bzhin cung zadang dum dang bcom ldan 'das la yid kyim zhus pa/ stir de bzhin gshegs pa lags// ltar rgyal bdam pa lags// ce sar byang chub sems dpa' la
258a2(rgyud): ci ltar sangs rgyas nas kyang bgyi// mgon po bdag gi thetsom 'di// thub pa chen pos bsal du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// the tsom yid gnyis spangs nas / 
258a3(rgyud): spyad pa'i rgyal po theg chen la// rgyal ba'i sras ni spyod par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsa
258a4(rgyud): to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ khyod don 'di lta bu 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos kyi tshul bslab pa'i gzhi 'di lta bu thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur/ 
258a5(rgyud): shin tu skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de ni dkon no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po rigs kyi bu de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma len gyi/ sangs rgyas stong phrag
258a6(rgyud): dpal dag pa'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yin pa rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas thog
258a7(rgyud): nyid du theg pa chen po cogs par khong du chud par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chags chung ngu la
258a8(rgyud): kasang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub semapar pa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa chen po
258b1(rgyud): ngas su spyod pa yin no// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pa de'i phyir nyon la lags par
258b2(rgyud): tu yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan to// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad
258b3(rgyud): sabaka' stsal to// chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// gnyis su med cing mtshan nyid gcig/ bzhi bcus rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa// de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya// 'dus shes tsam yang srang / 
258b4(rgyud): pa'i phyir// rang gi ngo bo bstan med ci pa// la ce/ sa kyis ni rang
258b5(rgyud): togs 'dod pa das// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sa bcu po dag bsgrubs nas ni// dbang rnams rtogs pa sayong du chud// chos rnams stong pa skum bzhin// gang gis 'dir ni ku rtogs
258b6(rgyud): 'jig rten kun gyi rgyud shes pa// sa sa rgyas zhes na bya ba yin// gsang ba pa'i bdag pa da ltar de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnas skabs rnam par gzhag pa yin no// gsang
258b7(rgyud): pa'i bdag po rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi sems rnam par gzhag pa bsgrub pa ni med par rig par bya'o// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na
258b8(rgyud): das bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
259a1(rgyud): nam mngon par tshugs pa mchos kyin 'gra sa megasupa bas dang dza la nas so// bang par gzugs pa shin tu mtshar lags
259a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag ni 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i cher na 'gro ngan song gi 'jigs pa pa bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs pa 'am mi khom par skye ba'i 'jigs pa mchis
259a3(rgyud): ra bdag mi smra'o// ci'i sladu zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa la gnas pa ni 'jig rten dang lhan cig tu gnas kyang 'jig rten las 'das ba'i
259a4(rgyud): lam mi gtong zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs kyis 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyang ston to// theg pa chen pa mngon par rtogs pa las yongs su nyams par
259a5(rgyud): yang mi 'thur ro// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag mardo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor bshad du
259a6(rgyud): gsol/ de ni spyi bo mang pos phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so// de nad ce sa gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag dang rdul 'di skad rjes byaka'
259a7(rgyud): te// gsang ba po'i bdag po de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la thung shig dang ngas khyod la gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor ba sham pa ba shad par bya'o// de la shig slob dpa
259a8(rgyud): ma ga gas ma rnams dbye lam khas shing bdag kyang ngem cig gsum la gnas pa yin no// gsang pa pa'i bar dgo/ de sa dam cig gis ma pa dgang zhen chos kyi snad pa
259b1(rgyud): gsum ste chos kyi khyad par gang la dus gsum du gtogs pa'i dus na sgrub pa med par tshul gyi 'jug pa de ni dam tshig gsum zhes bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag pa chos kyi khyad par daya
259b2(rgyud): shen/ bas ga pa'i bdag pas mas ni seMs kyi gyung bar te/ gsing ba pa'i bdag pa de la sems rnam par dog thathams cad med pa yongs sugs pa'i gang yin pa de ni rdzogs pa
259b3(rgyud): mthong ba'o// 'di'i chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i rang rig pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no// gang lus rang ngag dang yid 'jug pa de ni sbrus pa'i mtshan nyid kyi
259b4(rgyud): sang ba pa'i bdag po de ni dam tshig gsum yin to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma rtogs na mu stegs can gzhan dag gis lta ci/ smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
259b5(rgyud): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// byis pa mi shes pas bsgribs pa// tshul 'di shes pa mgyur rnams// sangs rgyas gzhan du tshal bar byed// 'di na gnas par yod ma rtogs/ 
259b6(rgyud): na'ams ldan na gang snya pa // sangs rgyas rnyed pa yod ma thur/  nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas // ngas rgyas gas na du mi bstan to// des bsan rnam sa// rtag tu da
259b7(rgyud): srungs nas ni// sems kyi khyab par rnams gsum bas// de na sa dam tshigaganam shes 'gyur// danas yang bcom ldanas kyis gas smra bcad pa de dag sasu mnas/ gsang
259b8(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pa de la slo'ang pon dam
260a1(rgyud): bags gan rnam par snang bar bya'o// dkar ngams gzharnam par sbyangs nas nam mkha' dbyangs su bu la yang dag par gzhos pas bdag na tshas kya byangs sgrub pa med pa
260a2(rgyud): sa kyi yul yin tshunam du bdag nyid rnam par sdang yang du sbyin gyis btsu po// deltar bdag nyid byid gyis brlabs pa/ chos kyir byeng sa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ gnyis su med
260a3(rgyud): 'khor bdag gi lus yin par byin gyis brlabs te/ rang gi sems kyis byas pa'i tshon sna lnga'i phye ma 'am gzhan yang
260a4(rgyud): rnam pa kyis kyi'o// sa /  rgyu sa ldan po ngas su brgya/ ma pa ye pa du
260a5(rgyud): pa'i tshig bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnam
260a6(rgyud): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang tshe 'di nyid gcig pus thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa chen po dang thugs
260a7(rgyud): chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis sems can gyi khams la gzigs nas/ gsang po pa'i bdag po phyug nardo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po byin gyi ba rlabs sgrub pa'i gzhi gang gis
260a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par dka' ba yang bsod nams ma byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi pha rol gyi rgyud la yang rab tu 'jog par gyu
260b1(rgyud): sa brlabs kyi ba nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das byas des sa bka' stsal pa dang / phyag nar rjes pa sa ma sbyaracom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
260b2(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das spangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i khyu mchog seng ge'i bla sgrogs pa rnams kyi ye shes la mnga' ba ning
260b3(rgyud): tshar to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dri 'dra ba'i don du nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas
260b4(rgyud): kraswa pa'i bskal par yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yang bzod par mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das da lta bas na rigs kyi du mkhas pa 'di la slob par 'tshal bas de
260b5(rgyud): shin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na legs la las kyis bdag cag la thugs pa rtse ba'i slad du chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi gzhi
260b6(rgyud): dag bshad du gsol/ da skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag nardo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsangab ba'i badrag po nam mkha'i ma
260b7(rgyud): dadang mtshungs pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// chom byir byings dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi sa mtshan nyid do// 
260b8(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po gang dag ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spong ba nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bsgoms shing lan mang du byas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs
261a1(rgyud): ma 'dug pa yang 'di dag sems sems palas rnam par rtog pa thams car 'dus pa nas shes ba kyi 'od tu phyin pa'i brithab par gyur to// skang byad mtha' las par sngags
261a2(rgyud): nas kyi bcigs su byin dang / bdud 'ani rnam pa snad pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dag sngags kyi rgyam moganas med po// rnam ma'i'i slong pa yatsha nyid med du 'gro ba pa mang pa bya
261a3(rgyud): pab dang / tshor ba po med pa 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba thams cad las 'das pa yang thob par gyur to// gsang ba pA'i bdag po de la rigs sngags kyi rgyas ma chen mo mtha' yas shing rab
261a4(rgyud): 'byam rgya che ba bstan par bya ba de dag gang zhe na/ nA ma s+t+rai ya d+h+ri ga te pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yo a pra ti ha ta shA sa ni b+h+yaHma hA kr-i pe b+h+ya ga zhan a ma la rUb
261a5(rgyud): drim bi ma les cu ga ti bi sho d+ha ni/ de la 'di ni rdo rje tshig mnyam pa med pa yin no// am hA bi sA ya~Md+b+ha)/ phyag na rdo rje 'di ni nam mkha' lhur drim yang ce zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal
261a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin kyis brlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum yin no// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
261a7(rgyud): mas gang na rag sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di mi 'chad cing mi brjod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ngas ma mthong ngo // gsang ba pa'i bdag pa rnam grangs ngas kyang 'di ltar gsang ba'i snying po'i
261b1(rgyud): 'khor dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig 'dil 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' skad pa spyad pas/ gsang sngags kyi sgo nang byang chub sa/ 
261b2(rgyud): dpa' spyod pa'i rgyal po 'di la mngon par brtson par bya'o zhes bya bar rig par bya'o// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
261b3(rgyud): 'das byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpe'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin ci ltar ston chos thams cad la dbang thob pa'i bar du
261b4(rgyud): ltar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di la byang chub sems dpa
261b5(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i skyed pa spyod pas slob dpon las dbang nod par bya'o// 'di snyam du slob dpon 'di na bdag gi ston pa ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo/ 
261b6(rgyud): ba'i byang chub la bskul ba'o snyam du yang sems bskyed par bya'o// de de nas thal mo sbyar te nye bar song la gsol ba gdab po// slob dpon gyis kyang dadon du gtsur bar shes nas snying rje che
261b7(rgyud): pa mngon bram du byas te tshig 'dis de ces smra bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu longs de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bla na med pa de khyod la bstan par bya'o// de nas sa ngazhi yid du 'ong ba brtags pa/ 
261b8(rgyud): gasdams so gzhi spangs te dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ma skra gcig pa lha rnam par dbye ba'i gnas legs par brtags pa/ mchod pa'i gnas rnam pa sna tshogs bkod pa bsgrubs pa
262a1(rgyud): chu dri zhim pos bkang ba'i bum pa dbus su bzhag pa bris la slob ma pad ma'i steng na 'dug pa nga gi klu gzugs bdag yin par dmigs pa la gnas pa
262a2(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems su gyur pa 'gro ba mtha' dag yongs su bskyab pa'i bsam pa can de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag bum pa des spyi bo nas dbang skur re
262a3(rgyud): 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan phye'o zhes kyang smra bar bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdeg po de la byang chub
262a4(rgyud): sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis lha'i gzugs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci snyed pa 'am sems dpa'i mtha
262a5(rgyud): yas pa thams cad kyi cha lugs kyi bye brag kyang rung ste gsang sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa las 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gsang ba ba'i bdag pon
262a6(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa yang ci lta bu yin zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la dbang bskur ba'i tshe slob dpon gyis bad ma'i phyag rgyas gdan sra zhing brtan
262a7(rgyud): sem gyis mo khyab pa rdo rje mi shegs pa yongs su brtag pa ni gser dam zangs sa su 'jim pa las byis pa'am mar byis pa bzhags bya'o// de'i gang na 'dug pa
262a8(rgyud): thams cad sa dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir/ thos ma drinam pos bkang ba'i thas pas skye bangs dbang bskur ra bya'o// slob dpon bdag nyid kya ci bar rjes su mtha
262b1(rgyud): tu phyag rgyas rdzas su mthun pa'i bya ba bya'o// chos kyi dung 'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis kyang nga bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi ga ma'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis
262b2(rgyud): par smra'o// ral pri'i phyag rgya dang gseng sngags kyi ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba mtha' dag gzhom par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang gapa
262b3(rgyud): pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis brlab par bya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis ni mi shes pa'i grong khyer gzhig par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// 
262b4(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis ni spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba byin gyis brlab par bya'o// mdzod spu'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis ni mdzod spu dang ldan par byin gyis brlab pa
262b5(rgyud): yan lag thams cad byung ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis ni yan lag thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la pad ma'i phyag rgya 'byung ste/ lag pa sa
262b6(rgyud): / cig tu sbya la 'khrig ma nas bgyid dam mo thams cad man mnyam par brkyang ngo // phyag rgya 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'i rdo rje gdan yin te dam pa mithu chen po'o// 
262b7(rgyud): gas ma che ba rnams na/ ram skye ba na// gaganam d+hA m+b+ha d+hU ba shA kA myu na ra par/ 
262b8(rgyud): padag 'ahUM/ lag pa gnyis bsnol te rgyab sbyar la sor mo rnams par tshun blas pa'i tshul du bsnol te g.yon pa'i mthe bo rgyab du brlag la g.yas pa'i mtha bos sen mo la sbyar ro// 
263a1(rgyud): / 'di phyag rgya chen pa// / chos kyi mtshar ma nas su spags// 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis// 'khor la dam pa 'di bsku // nams saman+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ ta thA ga ta a / 
263a2(rgyud): ta bi dza la bAr Na na sarbA nga ya ga te d+haHkA ri ma hA kra ba hai tra ti ma hA dab+hU te hU~M/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bo gnyis lag mthil du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis kyis rtsa ba dkris te/ 
263a3(rgyud): pa rnams so na gzhag la bsgreng ngo // 'jig rten mgon po skyo ba rnams kyis// phyag rgya sems can thams cad kyi// don rnams rtag tu myur byed 'di// chos kyi dung zhes rnam par grags// 
263a4(rgyud): daHsa man+ta bur+d+ha nAn/ d+yAd d+ha thA ga ba tI pra tiSh+Tha nan/ A nan ta ru sa ra bi nir g+ho Sha tA thA ga ta bA ka pra sa ra bisma ya ka d+ha ra ma tA d+ha ra ma hA d+ha ra na/ \u0f88\u0f90ar+b+ba satwa san to sha nA rA ma hA ma hA tAM/ 
263a5(rgyud): gang ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug te mthe bo'i ser mo'i steng du ral gri'i tshul du gzung ngo // phyag rgya rab tu mthu chen 'di// ral gri'i phyag rgyar rnam par gragis// sems can
263a6(rgyud): kun gyi 'jig tshogs la// lhan cig skyes pa'ang gcod pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ a ma hA ga Da ga prad+ha ti dzi ta sa kA la tIN+Di ts+tshin+dan kA ra te thA ga tA d+hi mug ti ni ri dzA tra bi d+hA saM kA lA
263a7(rgyud): mahA ma hA trUM / phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phyi rol tu brkyang ste gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum par nis gang tsam gyis ma reg par bzung la/ rdo rje lta bur byas te mthe ba dang sri
263a8(rgyud): lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du gzhug go/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po yi// phyag rgya rab tu sngags pa 'di// mi shes grong khyer 'dzag pa yi// rdo rje'i phyag rgyar rnam par grags/ 
263b1(rgyud): shigasang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ ma hA besh+ma ya te dzod b+ha ma hA tsaN+Da dur dan twA tra b+hany+dza hA/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi ngos su gtsug tor lta bur
263b2(rgyud): zung ngo // 'di ni gtsug tor phyag rgya ste// 'jig rten mgon po'i skyob pa yin// gang gis phyag rgya 'di bcings pa// de la 'di ni gtsug tor 'gyur// de'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man bu
263b3(rgyud): da/ sar+b+ba tra a pra ti ta ta b+ha pa ti d+ham+ba hA pa li nAn/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta no du d+had+ya ba sha ya/ ma hA bud+d+ha sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na ad+hiHha~M sU ra ma hA ma toSh+NI Shi swA hA/ lag pa g.yas gzhu chu rabacangs pa smin
263b4(rgyud): choms su gzung ngo // rgya 'di rgyal ba mchog rnams kyi// mdzad srur rtag tu rnam par bsgrags// de'i sngams no// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ a sha khan du ba ma pra b+ha sar+b+ba satwa kle sha phan ta papra
263b5(rgyud): ma nA ga ra ma hA ta~M d+ha rasar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a laM kA ra ma hA bu ru 'drub d+ha rin ga to gau ta swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems de ba'i gsang sngags kyi sgo napa byang chub sems dpa'i rnyed pa
263b6(rgyud): pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la nya bar gdis pa de gang zin pa de dag hU~M gsang sngags dang phyag rgya 'di ga yin no// gsang ba ba'i bdag pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gsong ldan
263b7(rgyud): na rgyams pa gang gas snaSh+Ta 'dzi ga gi sbyin ma na kyi na ma la gas pa nga du su sa
264a1(rgyud): rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang bapa' bdag pa gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor la sdom pa gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sam
264a2(rgyud): dpa'i spyad pa spyad pa rnams lus dang ngag dang yid bsnams shing spyod par 'gyur ba'i sdom pa dang byang chub kyi sems yod do// gsang 'a pa'i bdag po de la sdom pa gang zhe na/ bsdam
264a3(rgyud): pa ni sdom pa ste lus dang ngag dang yid rnams bsdus shing yongs su bsdus pa phyi dang nang gi sdug bsngal sel bar 'gyur ba de ni sdom pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyag ma
264a4(rgyud): rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas sdom pa ci ltar gzung
264a5(rgyud): dbyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag 'o phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di la slob dpon gyis lha spyan drang ba
264a6(rgyud): byas la bcom ldan 'das ma sheng rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklags te dkyil 'khor la phyogs te der 'dug la slob ma rnams la bos te 'di skad du bu dus gsum du sgrib pa med par gnas pa
264a7(rgyud): dam ci gadzin pa la rga rdzos pa nos TIg sa pan pa bya// sa kyang rgyal ma skyed thas mo tsugs tu 'di skad du thob dpon dgongs su gsoso// bad ga ming 'di zhes
264a8(rgyud): dus 'di nas gzung // nape byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du slob pa na gyis bdag la dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa'i sdom pa stsal du gsal/ ston pa'i bka' spyi bos nod pa
264b1(rgyud): 'tshal lo nas smra bar bya'o// de nas slob papon gyis kyang 'di skang du dgas kyi bu dgos shig/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub 'dod pa spyod ces byang chub kying ba'i 'dun
264b2(rgyud): bar du nag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag dbul par bya'o// gsung ba pa'i bdeg pa 'don dam chig chen la 'jug nas b+ha ba smom pa sa
264b3(rgyud): sngam mi 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgonas byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa spyod pa rnams ni tshul khrims shin du bsdams shing nga bzhin gsheg
264b4(rgyud): pa'i tshul khrims bla na med pa lnga rab tu gnas pa yin no// gas ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pe'i sgo 'di la slob par 'dod
264b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpas dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa 'di la mngon par brtson par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i 'dus pa byang chub sems dpa' se mo pA gang dang ldan na de bzhin
264b6(rgyud): 'i rigs su skyes shing 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems de yang tsam

264b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag pa de la byang chub gang zhen byang chub ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid do// na
265a1(rgyud): mkha' yang gzugs med bstan du med gzung du med pa'o// byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa sems kyi mtshan nyid kyang de yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag pa de lta bas nas
265a2(rgyud): dang nam mkha' dang byang chub 'di dag ni gnyis su med do// 'di la chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
265a3(rgyud): pa'i byang chub yin no// de la mi skye ba'i tshul dang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems skye ba gang yin pa de ni/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po
265a4(rgyud): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gnas kyi gzhi lngas byang chub mngon par rtogs par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhen gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dngos po thub
265a5(rgyud): cad dang bral bar mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro// kha cig ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam pa spangs pa stong ba sgyu mas bu mngon par rtog par 'gyur ro// 
265a6(rgyud): kha cig ni chos yang migs pas so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad po spyod pas/ 'di ltar dngos po thams cad
265a7(rgyud): dang bral ba phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi sems thog ma nas ma skyes pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo
265a8(rgyud): du rtogs par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la dngos po thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'di la bdag gam sems can nam skye ba 'am shed las skyes pa
265b1(rgyud): yod pa ma yin kyi phung po dang khams dang / skye mched tsam du zad do zhes 'ji tsas kyi lam yongs su spang bar bstan pa yin no// phung po khams dang skye mched dang gzung ba dang
265b2(rgyud): pa rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi lom mngon par rtogs pa yongs su shes pa'i sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa rnam par gnas
265b3(rgyud): yin no// chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams rang gi sems thog ma nas ma skyes par ma
265b4(rgyud): nining stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rdzas med pa mtshan nyid med par mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas gnas med pa sgrib pa med pa sprosapa
265b5(rgyud): thams cad dang bral ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsang sngags// 
265b6(rgyud): smod pa'i tshul sgrub pa rnam par thar pa'i sgom gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phan 'dogs pa med par rin par bya'o// zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
265b7(rgyud): la pa du ma 'bad cing btsal te/ btang dka' ba rnams kyang byas pas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems
265b8(rgyud): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis tshe 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de yang ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po che zhes
266a1(rgyud): bde ni de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba la 'du shes su bya bar 'ad do// byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi 'du shes de yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid khong du rkun gyi ting nge 'dzin thob po'i
266a2(rgyud): 'khor dang phyag rgya'i dmatshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems depa 'acom lnga rgyang ring du spang bar bya'o// rdzag zhen/ ser sna dang sems can la gnod pa dang the tsom dang mi long
266a3(rgyud): kasang sngags la sogs pa la mgus pa ste/ gsang pa pa'i bdag po chos 'di sa ni byang chub sems dpa che 'di nying sa 'jig rten lapa 'dis pa'i lam du 'jug par da dang rnams kyis rgya
266a4(rgyud): rid du spang bar bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos 'di rnams la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la/ byang chub kyi spyad pa cung zan kyang yongs su rdzogs par miga'o// gas ba pa'i bdag
266a5(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ chos 'di rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi bar du gcod pa chen po'o// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
266a6(rgyud): gas la to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gsang ba'i snying po 'di dam tshig la gnas par gyur pa de'i bsod nams ci tsam zhig 'brel bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gso
266a7(rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'aphyag na rdo rje la 'dri skan me bga' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po nas mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar rtogs par nus sa me/ gsol pa/ bcom
266b1(rgyud): ldan 'das nam mang dbyings kyi tsha ma mchis pas de'i tshad gzung bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' ni rtogs par nus kyar srid kyi gsang de'i phreng
266b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du dam tshig mthong ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rishes kyi bre tsa 'i bsod nam mngon par 'dus byas pa gang yin pa'i bsod nams de'i tshad ni rtogs par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang
266b3(rgyud): pa'i bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba mthong ngo // gsang ba'i bdag po dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni/ snying po gtso bo snying po thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa ste de'i gong na de bzhin
266b4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor med do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa gnas su gyur pa skyabs su gyur pa'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
266b5(rgyud): bu mo dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod pas/ dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig la 'jug pa thob par 'gyur bgang na 'dir 'jig rten gyi khams me ma
266b6(rgyud): pur gyis yongs su gang ba la yang rkang pa gnyis kyis 'bogs te 'gro bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de rnams la yang rigs
266b7(rgyud): tha'am rigs kyi bu mo dadag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'dunas dang pha ma 'du shes dang mkhan pa'i 'du shes 'byed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag

267b2(rgyud): na po de dag gis mi sbyin pa de smras pas ngan 'gro gnyis su lhung ste/ gsang sngags kyi skyed pa spyod pa deni 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa des sems can rnams

267b6(rgyud): ra bsrung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab par gyis gnod pa las kyang bzlog par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i

268a1(rgyud): / bstan pa 'jig par mi gyur bde ltar gyis shig/ de nas gang ba pa'i dad phyag nardo rdzas rdo rje 'dzin de dag thams cad la smras pa/ groms po dag de bzhin gshegs pa da

268b3(rgyud): byas te/ chos kyi dbyings su gyur pa'i yid kyis bdag rnam par snad mang de du de'i phyag ce dang gsang sngags kyis bsgyur tid dkyil 'khor bri'o// sngags pa gas thugs chog la//

270b3(rgyud): 'phrul du ma rnams kyang gzigs so// sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa du ma yang mngon par sprul par mdzad do// bkod pa chen po yang bskyed par mdzad do// mdor na thams cad gang dang gang

270b5(rgyud): gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje bdag gis sna tshogs du mi'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phyung
270b6(rgyud): nga yi ge du ma bkod pa sems can sna tshogs mgu bar byed pa/ phyag rgya dang sngags sna tshogs kyis rnam par mtshan par gyur pa/ 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi khyad par brjod pa/ sdug bsngal sa
270b7(rgyud): rabatun 'a byed / dbang phyug dum dang ldan zhing ging 'brog pa yig gcig da / sto phrag brgyad dang / grang med pa dang / bye baphrag gsum dang /  drug dang / ring po dang / thung
270b8(rgyud): ngangar dang / gsal byed kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings cu la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dpe dang / nyan tha dpa 'a rgya sangs rgyas dang / 'jin
271a1(rgyud): pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang / lha'i gnas la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / tsher 'gro ba dang / yi dag pa dang / dud 'gro 'gro ba la thub par phye zhing bcad pa rnams gang bad
271a2(rgyud): gis sems can rnams la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba phrag grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi sems can rnams kyi don du gsu la yin mo// yang gzhi dang me tog
271a3(rgyud): pos brgyan pa'i 'jig rtenam yag ni dang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i bdag po bye ba phrag grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa bdun po de rnams kun gyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
271a4(rgyud): ras pa gas dbang dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal la la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag gis thabs sna tshogs kyi cho ga'i sgra bstan te/ gsang ba'i bad
271a5(rgyud): rnams la ni mdag gzhug dang / mngag gzhug ma dang / po nya dang / pho nya mo la sogs pa de rnams kyi phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rtog pa'i cho ga yang rgyas par
271a6(rgyud): ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyang bstan to// sbab thabs sna tshogs yang dag ldan// ras ris tshig rnam par bskrun// yang na las kyi cho ga dbye// gang du stobs chen gas
271a7(rgyud): las// sbyin sreg dag ni bdag gis bstan// lhag mar bzhin yul gnas gzhan// de nas ma lus me thab dang // de bzhin zhi ba rgyas pa dang // dbang du bya dang mngon spyod dang // 
271a8(rgyud): dus kyi byed par dang // dkyil 'khor yang ding zhin bstan// phyag rgya dag kyang ma lus par// sa bon dang ni mtshan ma dang // gseng ba yi tshe grags nyid dang // rigs kyi mtshan mo de bzhin
271b1(rgyud): ma lus pa yi dbyibs dang yang // da lta bu la sogs pa'i las// de dag thamasasad bdag gas brtan// mig yo nas rgya rtog pa n-i// de ni slar yang bdag gis bshad// dag pa'i sems dpa
271b2(rgyud): ldan gyis// sngags pas gang zhig bsgrub bya yi// bsam gyis mi khyab sna tshogs las// gsang sngags kyi ni sgrub thab zhig/ rtog pa 'di ru mdor bsdus nas// de yi tshi ga yang dag bshad// 
271b3(rgyud): dag rdzogs sangs rgyas bsnyen cing // sgrub pas go 'phang thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi mchog/ chos shes bya bar skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus par// de ni
271b4(rgyud): dag par 'gyur// rtag par rgyun du rnam rtag med// nam ma' yin lam la gnas// gzugs can lungal brten nas su// sems can bye brag zugs su chud// sems cam zhi ba gdul
271b5(rgyud): / bge gA chen dang ni log par 'dren// de nas gdul ba bya ba'i phyir// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rtag tu sprul// mtshan ni mi g.yo ces bsgrags pa// khro bo 'jan rnya pa tha che// da
271b6(rgyud): na gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi sras// de 'dir rgyal mchog rnams dang ni// de bzhin rgyal sras kyis rtag par// phyag 'tshal tshangs pa la sogs dang // 
271b7(rgyud): na thams cad kun tu mchod// sangs rgyas rnams ni byas pa ga'o// de bzhin du ni sangs rgyas sras// 'di kun smon lam yongs rdzogs shing // bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes rdzogs// 
271b8(rgyud): zhes bya'i sa thob pa// mig yo 'di yang de yi mtshan// bdud rnams kun gyi mi mi g.yo bas// rtas pa'i la zhen dri med bzang // rtog pa'i rgyal ba ju'aphrul che// bshad kyis bu khyed kyir
272a1(rgyud): cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// chos kyi dbyings su rab gzhol bas// rtag tu cha dang nad med mchog dngos gru ba myur du gsol mdzad pa// rtag tu bkags
272a2(rgyud): nams gsol byed cing // de bzhin 'dud rnams rab tu 'joms// sems can rnams ni bde pa phyir// gas pas de ni rab tu bshad// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
272a3(rgyud): chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag mgrin gcig gi ngag gis gsol ba/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang bdag cag la thugs brtse ba bskyed de bcom ldan 'ad
272a4(rgyud): bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol// de skad ces ka rdal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
272a5(rgyud): thub pas gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa 'jig rten gyis khams 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas nas// dpal gyi be'u las byung ba zhes bya
272a6(rgyud): zer byu ste 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba byas nas gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas gzung ste/ ji srid brjod
272a7(rgyud): dmed pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa'i bar du de khyag nas galas phyogs nas
272a8(rgyud): bskor te/ de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / nub dang / lho dang / shar gyi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du khengs par byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams da rnams na
272b1(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' du thams cad kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// shAkya'i mgon pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang brjid chen po gang bzhugs pa// chos kyi dbyangs las rgya
272b2(rgyud): yi// rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad gshegs// de ru dri med dam chos nyon// gseng sngags spyod pa'i tshul dge ba// gang thob 'jig rten mgon pos ni// byang chub 'dus ma byas pa bsres// de nas
272b3(rgyud): zer des tshigs su gcad pa 'di thos nas slar lo na ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal beru nyid du zhugs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dri rnams 'jig rten gyi khams nas
272b4(rgyud): bo'i mthus// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pakal ba der lpags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis sems rtse gcig par mkhyen nas slar
272b5(rgyud): yang rdo rje bsgyings pa bsregs pa'i me lce kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pa
272b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ san tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs/ 
272b7(rgyud): tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab tu 'khrugs/ 'a ra/ ragutu 'a gyur/ kun tu rab tu 'ar 'ur/ che mcheg tu rgyu mtsham/ 'jig rten du shin tu snang ba dpag tu med par
272b8(rgyud): rab gyur to// gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab po'i tshe 'phrul mthong ngo // snyoms par zhugs pa 'di ni de ba na gshags pa thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
273a1(rgyud): / thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyu bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ chos kyi dbyings grangs med par sems can gyi khams/ 
273a2(rgyud): rnam par grol bar byed ga/ de bzhin gshegs sems cad kyi stong bshidan kyi rang zhin kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par rtog pa med pa'i ye shes kyi me yang dag par byung ba/ byang chub sems dpal
273a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po nye bar ston pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gsung gis 'kho lo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yag sems can nyon mongs pa'i mun nag tu
273a4(rgyud): bathams cad kyi sdang bar gyur pa/ ngan song dang / ran 'gror srung ba thams cad de dpon/ sdug bsngal bas nyams thag pa rnams kyi bde bar gyur pa/ mdo na sems can rnams kyi
273a5(rgyud): gang dang gang ldan pa de dang der rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir ro// nam sar+b+ba sha ba ri'u dge b+h+yaHsar+b+ba

273a7(rgyud): gang sems can thams cad mogasog par byas te/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde ba thams cad datsaldan par byed pa'i snang ba midzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
273a8(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par byas nams lus pa'i srid pa'i mingadag pa sa gzhi N+DI dul bar gyur ro// gzhan yang 'jig rten du bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i ngo mtsha rarab tu byung bar gyur to// de nas
273b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thug pas gsang ba'i phyagan rdong 'di skad cas bka' stsal to// lagan rdo rje bi ridi mi drwa 'a 'a rgyal pad bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchog gi de kho na nyid/ stong nyid 'di las gnan
273b2(rgyud): byung // chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid de// 'di gsal babyung ba thong // 'di ru rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs/ srid pa'i khams ni 'di la sprul// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang
273b3(rgyud): ra ba de de bzhin gzhan// thams cad 'di las yang dag byung // nam mkha ska bu'i dri ma med// zlos pa thams cad rnam par bral// dag gi spyod yul rnam 'ing srangs// rtag par spro ba med pa nyid// na
273b4(rgyud): bur gnas pa yin// bsnyad sngon du byas nas ni// gsang sdigs rjes su brjod pa yin// tha snyad kyang ni rtog pa ste// de ni du ni brjod pa med// thaskad la ni brten nas su// skyob pas de nyid gsungs pa
273b5(rgyud): sems can med de snyam bzhin/ yid kyi bsgom par bya ba yin skal pa par snu ma ci bzhin du// rang bzhin med par yang gyur te// stong nyid de yi rang bzhin du// tha snyad rnams ni togs par bya// de/ 
273b6(rgyud): ragasang sngags mgon po 'di// rang bzhin med par mnyam par mdzeg// 'ding ba'i don rnams stsol pa yang // thams cad kyang ni rdzogs par byed// de nas byang chub sems dpal sems dpa
273b7(rgyud): kun du bzang po la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / tshangs bdag dbang po ma sogs pa rnams shin tu ro mtshar mad du gyur cing snying po rnams spangs te/ de thams cad bcom ldan pas
273b8(rgyud): / thub pa la bltas nas/ tshig 'di dag mgrin gcig gi ngag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sngon chad mthos pa'i chos kyi gzhor lo 'di bsko 'a 'chol ldaldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bathag
274a1(rgyud): / pango mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mchog tu 'de ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tsham ldan 'das 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags sa// bcom ldan 'das 'din nyan thos thams cad
274a2(rgyud): dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig to can rnams dang / bgegs kyi gzugs can thams cad kyis bgom par mi nus lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di
274a3(rgyud): ni sems can thams cad kyi don dam pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bde bar 'dod pa'i don skong ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / 
274a4(rgyud): srungs ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni srin po dang grul bu la sogs pa thams cad kyis 'da' bar mi nus lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
274a5(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor de rnams la leg pa so zhes bya ba byin te/ gtsug la ga legs so
274a6(rgyud): go// slar yang gtsug la ga nges par lags so// de ltar gtsug lag 'di'i tshig brjod pa mdzes pa de ltar ji lta ba de bzhin du yin no// 'on kyang bsrung ba byed pa'i khro ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzhu
274a7(rgyud): bdag gis gti drug ni mun pas g.yogs pa'i sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la bltas nas gsungs te/ 'di ni nyan par ma nus pa'i// glo 'bang rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis/ ma na
274a8(rgyud): tsam phyir bdag gas// ye shes sgron me yang dag srung // byis pas sdug bsngal yang dag zeng sa// sa rgan nying ni 'di gnas/ ba'i rab tu mi shes pas// khyim gyi bcing bdam pa
274b1(rgyud): dmam ldan 'dun gang pa'i byadag byo logan rdo rje sums gnyis bru tshugs su bltas nas 'di skad ces smras pa to// bcom ldan 'das nga mtshar to// bad 'a gshegs pa mtshar te/ 
274b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mthu che lags so// bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po de'i snying pa'i gzi brjid dang mthu ni bdag gis mi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po 'di ni ga
274b3(rgyud): dka' 'dul ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po 'di ni ci skad du smra ba de bzhin no// 'on kyang gsang ba'i bdag po bdag ni gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di
274b4(rgyud): rdzus nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bdud ci snyed las rgyal lo// gsang ba'i bdag po gang yang bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dod pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams dga' bar byed
274b5(rgyud): gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa'i bsam pa tha dad pa rnams la bstan bde
274b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po dbang thang thams cad thob pa'i ye shes kyi stobs brtul pod pa mnyam pa 'di yang snying po byin gyis brlabs kyi yin no// gcig tu sems can don rab brtson/ 
274b7(rgyud): gnal na rnam par 'khrugs// sems can rnams la par dod pa la// sprul brnams kya byed par ma dang // mchod cing banyis partag tu ni// rgyal 'di nas ya dag bsregs// ji srid phyogs rnams
274b8(rgyud): gnas kyi bar// rtag par rgyun tu mchod 'gyur ba'i// sangs rgyas kun ni mnyam pa ru// byang chub ces bya 'di las bzhugs// rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams ni// skye ba dang ni 'gags pa yin/ 
275a1(rgyud): snyed la ni brten gnas su// gang zhig snga ma bzhin du gsungs// sgyu ma stong pa nyid yin ltar// chos rnams mtshan nyid de bzhin no// don kyang gsang ba'i bdag pa bdag
275a2(rgyud): gis bslal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag grangs med kyi bskal pa srid du sems can sna rdzogs kyi lus blangs nas sdug bsngal spyad de mgo dang / lag pa dang / 
275a3(rgyud): pa dang / mig dang / yan lag gi mchog dang chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / glang po dang / glang dang / shing rta la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang phyi rol gyi dngos po na byas yongs su btang
275a4(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa rnams kyi tshul gyis bsam po sna tshogs dang / 'dod pa sna tshogs pa
275a5(rgyud): dbyangs dang / tshig dang / yi ge bstan cing spyod lam sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma'i cha bya dang / dbyibs kyi khyad par can gyis bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don byas shing gang byang
275a6(rgyud): pagyi snying por bdud pa ni bcom pa de thams cad gsung sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i mthus byas so// 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams 'phel bar byed pa bdud lan kyang rgyal bar byed pa bsdu
275a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi don yod par byed pa/ gzhan yang sna tshogs ma lus pa'i bgegs las kyang rgyal bar byed pa ste/ 'di las gnyis pa gzhan yod min// sangs rgyas rnams kyis
275a8(rgyud): 'gyur sngags// de bas snying gar gzhag nas kyang // ci ltar bde par rnam par gnas// spang bar byed pa'i bgegs kyang med// glags tshol gzhan yang yang ma yin// rta
275b1(rgyud): yi 'jigs pa'ang med// rkun la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa'ang med// 'jigs pa kun las rnam par brel// de yi snying gar gnas bsgoms pas// bdag ni yun rings bsgral ba
275b2(rgyud): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs pa las// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sa bsngags pa'i gtso// go 'phang bdag gis ji ltar 'thob// bdag gis ci yang thob med par// tshul 'di las ni

276a3(rgyud): tshig gi nus pa med do// de nas nam mkhar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ngo mtshar 'di thos nas bcos
